The format of the AUDIT SQL.INI configuration parameter is AUDIT=[type],auditname,[directory],[size-value],[append-value], [keep-value],[OVERWRITE],[category-values (comma separated)] where the first argument can be a audit type, followed by the auditname, followed optionally by the destination directory name, followed optionally by the audit file size, followed optionally by the append file number, followed optionally by the KEEP value, followed optionally by the OVERWRITE keyword, and finally followed by the category numbers (comma separated). For more information on these parameters, please see the START AUDIT command documentation in the SQL Language Reference manual.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFEANF
member.summary: 03745 CFF ANF SQL.INI AUDIT parameter could not be found
member.remarks:
Reason: A SQL.INI configuration file AUDIT entry could not be found.
Remedy: Determine why the AUDIT entry could not be found.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFEAAE
member.summary: 03746 CFF AAE Specified AUDIT already exists in SQL.INI file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to start a new AUDIT and the existing AUDIT already exists in the SQL.INI file.
Remedy: Determine why the AUDIT entry already exists.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFEBSV
member.summary: 03747 CFF BSV Invalid SIZE value specified in AUDIT setting
member.remarks:
Reason: An AUDIT setting in the SQL.INI file contains an invalid SIZE value setting.
Remedy: Correct the SIZE value setting in the AUDIT setting.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFEIKV
member.summary: 03748 CFF IKV Invalid KEEP value
member.remarks:
Reason: AUDIT KEEP value is invalid.
Remedy: Correct KEEP value. An AUDIT configuration KEEP value is invalid. Valid values range from zero to 999. The format of the AUDIT SQL.INI configuration parameter is AUDIT=[type],auditname,[directory],[size-value],[append-value], [keep-value],[OVERWRITE],[category-values (comma separated)] where the first argument can be a audit type, followed by the auditname, followed optionally by the destination directory name, followed optionally by the audit file size, followed optionally by the append file number, followed optionally by the KEEP value, followed optionally by the OVERWRITE keyword, and finally followed by the category numbers (comma separated). For more information on these parameters, please see the START AUDIT command documentation in the SQL Language Reference manual.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFEOVR
member.summary: 03749 CFF OVR Invalid AUDIT OVERWRITE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: The AUDIT entry in the SQL.INI configuration contains an invalid entry for the OVERWRITE keyword.
Remedy: Correct the OVERWRITE keyword. Verify the spelling. The format of the AUDIT SQL.INI configuration parameter is AUDIT=[type],auditname,[directory],[size-value],[append-value], [keep-value],[OVERWRITE],[category-values (comma separated)] where the first argument can be a audit type, followed by the auditname, followed optionally by the destination directory name, followed optionally by the audit file size, followed optionally by the append file number, followed optionally by the KEEP value, followed optionally by the OVERWRITE keyword, and finally followed by the category numbers (comma separated). For more information on these parameters, please see the START AUDIT command documentation in the SQL Language Reference manual.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFEIAI
member.summary: 03750 CFF IAI Invalid ADAPTER_ID parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: An ADAPTER_ID= SQL.INI configuration parameter specified an adapter ID which is either too small or too large. Maximum size is 32 characters.
Remedy: Correct the ADAPTER_ID parameter to be from one to 32 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFEIMI
member.summary: 03751 CFF IMI Invalid MAIL_ID parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: A MAIL_ID= SQL.INI configuration parameter specified a mail ID which is either too small or too large. Maximum size is 32 characters.
Remedy: Correct the MAIL_ID parameter to be from one to 32 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFEIUI
member.summary: 03752 CFF IUI Invalid APP_ID parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: An APP_ID= SQL.INI configuration parameter specified a application ID which is either too small or too large. Maximum size is 32 characters.
Remedy: Correct the APP_ID parameter to be from one to 32 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFEINW
member.summary: 03753 CFF INW Invalid NETWORK_ID parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: A NETWORK_ID= SQL.INI configuration parameter specified a application ID which is either too small or too large. Maximum size is 32 characters.
Remedy: Correct the NETWORK_ID parameter to be from one to 32 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFEIAD
member.summary: 03754 CFF IAD Invalid NWAdvertiseMode parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: SQL.INI configuration parameter NWAdvertiseMode specified should be from 1 to 3. Default is 1 (Use SAP only).
Remedy: Correct the NWAdvertiseMode parameter to be from 1 to 3.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFENLS
member.summary: 03755 CFF NLS NDSLoginID not specified
member.remarks:
Reason: SQL.INI configuration parameter NDSLoginID and NDSLoginPassword are mandatory when NWAdvertiseMode specifies NDS use.
Remedy: Add NDSLoginID and NDSLoginPasword to the SQL.INI.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFEIPV
member.summary: 03756 CFF IPV The command line parameter value exceeds the maximum length
member.remarks:
Reason: The command line parameter value is too big.
Remedy: Please check values of your command line parameters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFEICP
member.summary: 03757 CFF ICP Invalid CHARACTER SET value
member.remarks:
Reason: The value must be a valid character set, e.g. ISO-8859-1 or CP1252
Remedy: Please check the value of your character set parameter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFEICO
member.summary: 03758 CFF ICO Invalid COLLATION value
member.remarks:
Reason: The value must be a valid collation, e.g. RU_CS_AS
Remedy: Please check the value of your collation parameter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFFEENE
member.summary: 03759 CFF ENE Configuration entry does not exist
member.remarks:
Reason: The configuration entry specified does not exist.
Remedy: Verify the configuration entry you wish to remove exists.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RSOEOOS
member.summary: 03801 RSO OOS Out of sessions
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RSOENEM
member.summary: 03802 RSO NEM Out of memory at the client
member.remarks:
Reason: The application has run out of memory at the client workstation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the client workstation. Attempt to make more memory available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RSOEINE
member.summary: 03803 RSO INE Fatal SQLBase System Failure (RSE INE)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RSOECFS
member.summary: 03804 RSO CFS Cannot find session
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RSOESNE
member.summary: 03805 RSO SNE Session does not exist
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RSOESCT
member.summary: 03806 RSO SCT Session closed/terminated
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGECCL
member.summary: 03901 LOG CCL Cannot create log file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to create a file and a failure has occurred.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the create failure. Run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the current operating system to verify the status of disk. Verify that sufficient disk space is available and verify that the number of files allowed open for the operating system permits the additional file, that is, check the FILES= configuration parameter setting.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGEILF
member.summary: 03902 LOG ILF Incompatible log file Format
member.remarks:
Reason: The log files being processed is not compatible with the current server version.
Remedy: Check if the log file is the correct one and try again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGECAL
member.summary: 03903 LOG CAL Out of memory at the database computer (LOG CAL)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGECAB
member.summary: 03904 LOG CAB Out of memory at the database computer (LOG CAB)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGECOL
member.summary: 03905 LOG COL NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGECRL
member.summary: 03906 LOG CRL NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGELNE
member.summary: 03907 LOG LNE Fatal SQLBase System Failure (LOG LNE)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGELRO
member.summary: 03908 LOG LRO Fatal SQLBase System Failure (LOG LRO)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGEBMP
member.summary: 03909 LOG BMP Fatal SQLBase System Failure (LOG BMP)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGEMIP
member.summary: 03910 LOG MIP Fatal SQLBase System Failure (LOG MIP)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGEPNP
member.summary: 03911 LOG PNP Fatal SQLBase System Failure (LOG PNP)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGEETS
member.summary: 03912 LOG ETS Exceed transaction span limit
member.remarks:
Reason: The transaction has exceeded the transaction span limit and therefore has been rolled back by the system.
Remedy: Long running transactions can pin down disk log files that could otherwise be deleted. The transaction span limit prevents logs from being pinned down by long running active transactions. To fix this problem, either modify the transactions so that they are not long running, that is, COMMIT more frequently, or increase or eliminate the transaction span limit.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGEOOM
member.summary: 03913 LOG OOM Out of memory at the database computer (LOG OOM)
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGEBOX
member.summary: 03914 LOG BOX INTERNAL USE ONLY - Boxcar event
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGECLF
member.summary: 03915 LOG CLF Fatal SQLBase System Failure (LOG CLF)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGEBLF
member.summary: 03916 LOG BLF Bad log file
member.remarks:
Reason: The database system has determined during recovery that the specified log file serial number does not match the database serial number.
Remedy: Verify that the correct log files are being used.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGEIOP
member.summary: 03917 LOG IOP Cannot open the log file for consistency check
member.remarks:
Reason: The log file consistency check mechanism cannot open the log file for its operation.
Remedy: None

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGEINB
member.summary: 03918 LOG INB Cannot read expected number of bytes from the log file.
member.remarks:
Reason: The log flush mechanism has detected a log file re-read failure.
Remedy: None: it is possible that the log file has been corrupted at the operating system level.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGEIOF
member.summary: 03919 LOG IOF The log file offset has become inconsistent
member.remarks:
Reason: The log flush mechanism has detected a corrupted log file offset.
Remedy: None: this is possibly a fatal SQLBase error.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGEIFB
member.summary: 03920 LOG IFB The log file does not match the log buffer
member.remarks:
Reason: The log flush mechanism has detected a mismatch between the log file and the log buffer just flushed.
Remedy: None: it is possible that the log file has been corrupted at the operating system level.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGEIFS
member.summary: 03921 LOG IFS The log file does not match the buffer saved
member.remarks:
Reason: The log flush mechanism has detected a mismatch between the log file and the log buffer saved for the purpose of matching.
Remedy: None: it is possible that the log file has been corrupted at the operating system level.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGEIBS
member.summary: 03922 LOG IBS The saved log buffer does not match the original
member.remarks:
Reason: The log flush mechanism has detected a mismatch between the log buffer and a copy saved for the purpose of matching.
Remedy: None: this is possibly a fatal SQLBase error.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGERFL
member.summary: 03923 LOG RFL A bad zero-filled log file length has been detected
member.remarks:
Reason: The length cannot be greater than a sector.
Remedy: None: the log file has been corrupted.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGERCS
member.summary: 03924 LOG RCS A bad log flush record checksum has been detected
member.remarks:
Reason: The bad log flush record checksum indicates corruption.
Remedy: None: the log file has been corrupted.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGERNB
member.summary: 03925 LOG RNB The number of bytes checksumed is wrong
member.remarks:
Reason: An incorrect number of flushed bytes indicates corruption.
Remedy: None: the log file has been corrupted.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LOGELSC
member.summary: 03926 LOG LSC Log disk space critically short
member.remarks:
Reason: Transaction rolled back due to LOW LOG DISK SPACE.
Remedy: Check log disk space immediately. Long running transactions pin down disk log files that could otherwise be deleted. SQLBase has determined that free log disk space is critically low and has forced this transaction to roll back since it is pinning log files that must be released to preserve the integrity of the database. SQLBase will be forced to shut down in the near future if this action does not successfully recover log disk space.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECECAR
member.summary: 04001 REC CAR Out of memory at the database computer (REC CAR)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECEBLC
member.summary: 04002 REC BLC Bad log record chain
member.remarks:
Reason: The transaction log file is corrupted.
Remedy: Recovery is only available up to this corrupted log file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECELRF
member.summary: 04003 REC LRF Log read failed
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to read a file and a disk read failure has occurred.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the disk read failure. Run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the current operating system to verify the status of the disk.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECEMBT
member.summary: 04004 REC MBT Missing begin transaction log record
member.remarks:
Reason: The transaction log file is corrupted.
Remedy: Recovery is only available up to this corrupted log file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECECOL
member.summary: 04005 REC COL Cannot open log file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to open an existing file and a failure has occurred.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the open file failure. Verify that the specified file exists. Verify the number of files allowed open for the operating system permits the additional file, that is, check the FILES= configuration parameter setting.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECEBLR
member.summary: 04006 REC BLR Bad log record
member.remarks:
Reason: The transaction log file is corrupted.
Remedy: Recovery is only available up to this corrupted log file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECEPUF
member.summary: 04007 REC PUF Physical undo of a de-allocation chain failed
member.remarks:
Reason: Physical undo for a de-allocation chain list head failed to find the desired record at the head of the list.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta technical support organization for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECESNF
member.summary: 04008 REC SNF Savepoint not found
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a ROLLBACK to a savepoint identifier and a savepoint with this identifier has not been set.
Remedy: Verify the savepoint identifier is correct and verify that the savepoint with the correctly specified identifier has been set.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECECRL
member.summary: 04009 REC CRL Out of memory at the database computer (REC CRL)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECEFNB
member.summary: 04010 REC FNB First log record not begin transaction
member.remarks:
Reason: The transaction log file is corrupted.
Remedy: Recovery is only available up to this corrupted log file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECECP1
member.summary: 04011 REC CP1 Missing first checkpoint log record
member.remarks:
Reason: The transaction log file is corrupted.
Remedy: Recovery is only available up to this corrupted log file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECECP2
member.summary: 04012 REC CP2 Missing second checkpoint log record
member.remarks:
Reason: The transaction log file is corrupted.
Remedy: Recovery is only available up to this corrupted log file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECETLO
member.summary: 04013 REC TLO Fatal SQLBase System Failure (REC TLO)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECECRC
member.summary: 04014 REC CRC Out of memory at the database computer (REC CRC)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECEDBT
member.summary: 04015 REC DBT Duplicate begin transaction record
member.remarks:
Reason: The transaction log file is corrupted.
Remedy: Recovery is only available up to this corrupted log file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECETMB
member.summary: 04016 REC TMB Rollforward time must be after online backup end
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting ROLLFORWARD database-name TO TIME and the specified time is after the time when the backup was taken.
Remedy: Correct the specified time.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECEMOB
member.summary: 04017 REC MOB Missing online backup begin log record
member.remarks:
Reason: The transaction log file is corrupted.
Remedy: Recovery is only available up to this corrupted log file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECEMOE
member.summary: 04018 REC MOE Missing online backup end log record
member.remarks:
Reason: The transaction log file is corrupted.
Remedy: Recovery is only available up to this corrupted log file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECEBTV
member.summary: 04019 REC BTV Fatal SQLBase System Failure (REC BTV)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECERFN
member.summary: 04020 REC RFN A Rollforward is not currently in progress
member.remarks:
Reason: User Error, rollforward has not been started before this OR the previous rollforward has been completed before this command.
Remedy: Make sure that a rollforward command is in progress before issuing a "rollforward [database] end" command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECERFA
member.summary: 04021 REC RFA Rollforward already started
member.remarks:
Reason: User error, rollforward has already been started.
Remedy: Finish the current rollforward process or reload from a backup.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECERFI
member.summary: 04022 REC RFI Rollforward interrupted - must restore database backup again
member.remarks:
Reason: The rollforward operation has been interrupted.
Remedy: Restore the database from a backup again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECECRF
member.summary: 04023 REC CRF Restore database first before rollforward
member.remarks:
Reason: Database is in a crash state.
Remedy: Restore database to previous backup before beginning rollforward procedure.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECERCO
member.summary: 04024 REC RCO Cannot rollforward through region where recovery was turned off
member.remarks:
Reason: User error; you cannot rollforward through a region where recovery is off.
Remedy: None. You cannot rollforward through RECOVERY OFF region.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECEITI
member.summary: 04025 REC ITI Fatal SQLBase System Failure (REC ITI)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECECLR
member.summary: 04026 REC CLR Fatal SQLBase System Failure (REC CLR)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.RECELCM
member.summary: 04027 REC LCM Fatal SQLBase System Failure (REC LCM)
member.remarks:
Reason: The checksum of log does not match the original checksum.
Remedy: None. The log has been corrupted.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.BMOEOOM
member.summary: 04101 BMO OOM Out of memory at the database computer (BMO OOM)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.BMOEEDA
member.summary: 04102 BMO EDA Compressed load file corrupt
member.remarks: Reason: The compressed load file hit end before all data was decompressed. Remedy:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.BMOEKIL
member.summary: 04103 BMO KIL Message has been killed
member.remarks: Reason: Message has been killed, buffer manager error set. The LOAD/UNLOAD has been aborted by frontend during transfer data. Remedy:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.BMOEOPE
member.summary: 04104 BMO OPE Cannot open the file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load or unload the database from a file but the named file cannot be opened.
Remedy: If the file name was specified, check that the file name is correct. If the file name is correct or if its not necessary to specify a file name, determine why the file could not be opened.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.BMOEFAE
member.summary: 04105 BMO FAE Unload file already exists.
member.remarks:
Reason: The user issued an UNLOAD command to unload to an existing file.
Remedy: An unload file of the specified name already exists in the path specified. If you want to overwrite this file, use the OVERWRITE option in the UNLOAD command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CPREOOM
member.summary: 04201 CPR OOM Out of memory at the database computer (CPR OOM)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CPREOVR
member.summary: 04202 CPR OVR INTERNAL USE ONLY - Internal error (CPR OVR)
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: Reason#18

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CPREINE
member.summary: 04203 CPR INE INTERNAL USE ONLY - Internal error (CPR INE)
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: Reason#18

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CPRECRP
member.summary: 04204 CPR CRP Cannot recognize compressed data in file
member.remarks:
Reason: File data does not conform to the UNLOAD compression format.
Remedy: Provide the original uncorrupted compressed UNLOAD file or do not specify the "load compress" option in the file which was not compressed during unload.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPECAL
member.summary: 04301 LDP CAL Out of memory at the database computer (LDP CAL)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPETMB
member.summary: 04302 LDP TMB Too much bind data
member.remarks:
Reason: The number of data items read exceeds the number of bind variables specified.
Remedy: Correct either the SQL statement or the bind data being read so that the number of bind variables matches the number of data elements.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEIQS
member.summary: 04303 LDP IQS Invalid quoted data field
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEIDT
member.summary: 04304 LDP IDT Invalid data type
member.remarks:
Reason: The $DATATYPES line specified an invalid datatype.
Remedy: Correct the $DATATYPES line so that the datatypes are valid.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEIDA
member.summary: 04305 LDP IDA Invalid data for specified datatype
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid data has been found for the specified datatypes.
Remedy: Correct data so that it matches the specified datatypes.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEUEF
member.summary: 04306 LDP UEF Unexpected end-of-file
member.remarks:
Reason: Load is reading input data or input from an input file and Load file has unexpectedly reached the end of the file being processed.
Remedy: Determine why the input data or input file has unexpectedly reached an end-of-file condition.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPENAP
member.summary: 04307 LDP NAP Data not specified for all columns in the last row
member.remarks:
Reason: The last row does not include all the columns.
Remedy: Determine why the last input row does not include all columns.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEMCM
member.summary: 04308 LDP MCM Missing comma separator
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEINF
member.summary: 04309 LDP INF Load long with file name not supported
member.remarks:
Reason: Using a file as long type column bind data is not supported.
Remedy: Use actual data instead of the file name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEILL
member.summary: 04310 LDP ILL Input too long for load buffer
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a load and the input is too long for the current load buffer.
Remedy: Modify the load file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEDTL
member.summary: 04311 LDP DTL Diff table name too long
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a LOAD DIF command and the table name is too long.
Remedy: Correct LOAD DIF command by specifying a valid table name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPETNM
member.summary: 04312 LDP TNM Table name missing from load file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load in DIF format and the load table name is missing from the DIF file.
Remedy: Correct load file to specify the load table name when loading in DIF format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEVCM
member.summary: 04313 LDP VCM Vector count missing on load file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load in DIF format and the vector count is missing from the load file.
Remedy: Correct load file to specify the vector count when loading in DIF format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEICO
member.summary: 04314 LDP ICO Invalid column number
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a LOAD DIF command and a column number in the DIF file format is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the DIF file attempting to be loaded.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEIDI
member.summary: 04315 LDP IDI Invalid load data item found
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load in DIF format and the load data type found in the load file is invalid.
Remedy: Correct load file to correctly specify the load data type when loading in DIF format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPESDI
member.summary: 04316 LDP SDI Special data item expected in load
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load in DIF format and a special data item is expected in the load file but is not found.
Remedy: Correct load file to correctly specify special data items when loading in DIF format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEINV
member.summary: 04317 LDP INV Invalid version string
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SET LOADVERSION command and an invalid version string has been found.
Remedy: Correct the SET LOADVERSION by specifying a valid version string.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEINE
member.summary: 04318 LDP INE Load file ended before you inserted command bind data
member.remarks:
Reason: The load file ended before command bind data was specified.
Remedy: Correct the load file to correctly specify the bind data.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEINB
member.summary: 04319 LDP INB Load file insert command does not specify bind data
member.remarks:
Reason: The load file insert command does not specify bind data.
Remedy: Correct the load file to correctly specify the bind data.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPESET
member.summary: 04320 LDP SET Invalid set command in load file
member.remarks:
Reason: The set command specified does not support the load.
Remedy: Correct the set command. The only set command supported is LOADVERSION.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPETNE
member.summary: 04321 LDP TNE Table does not exist
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load a specific table in ASCII format or unload a specific table in SQL format and the named table does not exist.
Remedy: Modify command to correctly specify an existing table.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEMEQ
member.summary: 04322 LDP MEQ Missing end quote
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEGON
member.summary: 04323 LDP GON Load process already gone
member.remarks:
Reason: Load process already terminated because of an error.
Remedy: Check the previous API call return code.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPENSV
member.summary: 04324 LDP NSV Single-user system tried to execute a server load command
member.remarks:
Reason: Server load process has been executed in a single-user system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPENEX
member.summary: 04325 LDP NEX Load command could not compile and execute twice
member.remarks:
Reason: Tried to execute the compiled load command twice.
Remedy: Executing a compiled load command twice is not supported.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPENVS
member.summary: 04326 LDP NVS Load command hit end-of-file before the start line number
member.remarks:
Reason: Load command start line number exceeds load file.
Remedy: Check the start line number.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEOOO
member.summary: 04327 LDP OOO Missing ON or OFF keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to set a SQLTalk option ON or OFF and the keyword is either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the command to specify ON or OFF correctly.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEMQN
member.summary: 04328 LDP MQN Missing query name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to ERASE, EXECUTE, RETRIEVE, or STORE a stored SQL statement and the statement name has not been specified.
Remedy: Correct command syntax so that the stored statement name is specified.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPECTL
member.summary: 04329 LDP CTL Creator name is too large
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a STORE command and the creator name exceeds 8 characters.
Remedy: Correct the STORE command by specifying a valid creator name that does not exceed 8 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPESTL
member.summary: 04330 LDP STL Stored command name is too large
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a STORE command and the command name exceeds 36 characters.
Remedy: Correct the STORE command by specifying a valid command name that does not exceed 36 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPETPC
member.summary: 04331 LDP TPC Tuple count missing in DIF load file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load in DIF format with missing/incorrect tuple count in the load file.
Remedy: Correct load file to correctly specify the tuple count when loading in DIF format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEICR
member.summary: 04332 LDP ICR Invalid COMMIT or ROLLBACK command in the load file
member.remarks:
Reason: A load file should not contain a COMMIT or ROLLBACK command. The SQLBase unload command never generates these commands in the unloaded SQL file.
Remedy: Remove the COMMIT/ROLLBACK command from the load file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPECLF
member.summary: 04333 LDP CLF Cannot create message log file
member.remarks:
Reason: SQLBase Loader was not able to create a message log file of a given name.
Remedy: Make sure that the given log file name is proper for the given operating system. Note that the log file will be created on the server machine in a multi-user SQLBase. Make sure that the the directory path specified (if any) for the log file is correct for the server's operating system. Also make sure that the log file name does not conflict with the load/unload file name on the same machine.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEILC
member.summary: 04334 LDP ILC Invalid LOAD or UNLOAD command in the load file
member.remarks:
Reason: A load file should not contain a LOAD or an UNLOAD command. The SQLBase UNLOAD command never generates these commands in the unloaded SQL file.
Remedy: Make sure that you have a valid unload file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEIKY
member.summary: 04335 LDP IKY Load failed - encrypted unload file needs the correct key
member.remarks:
Reason: An encrypted unload file needs the correct key to load successfully
Remedy: Enter the key used to creat the unload file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.LDPEICH
member.summary: 04336 LDP ICH Invalid Characterset string
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SET CHARACTERSET command and an invalid characterset string has been found.
Remedy: Correct the SET CHARACTERSET by specifying a valid characterset string.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.UNLEPNR
member.summary: 04401 UNL PNR Non-printable character found
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an UNLOAD and a non-printable data has been found in a column that prevents it from being unloaded.
Remedy: This column cannot be unloaded. Possibly create a view that excludes either this row or column and unload from that view.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.UNLECLF
member.summary: 04402 UNL CLF Cannot open the log file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempt to create the given log file failed.
Remedy: Make sure that the given log file name is proper for the given operating system. Note that the log file will be created on the server machine in a multi-user SQLBase. Make sure that the the directory path specified (if any) for the log file is correct for the server's operating system. Also make sure that the log file name does not conflict with the load/unload file name on the same machine.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.UNLETNE
member.summary: 04403 UNL TNE Fatal unload error
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a fatal error during Unload.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.UNLETNP
member.summary: 04404 UNL TNP Specified table does not exist in the database
member.remarks:
Reason: The table specified in the unload command does not exist.
Remedy: Make sure that the table name is spelled correctly and the specified table exists.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.UNLEIFV
member.summary: 04405 UNL IFV Fatal unload error
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a fatal error during Unload.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.UNLECUL
member.summary: 04406 UNL CUL Cannot unload long data
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to unload data in DIF or ASCII format and the data contains LONG VARCHAR data.
Remedy: Unload data in SQL format. LONG VARCHAR data cannot be unloaded in DIF or ASCII format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.UNLECUB
member.summary: 04407 UNL CUB Out of memory at the server (UNL CUB)
member.remarks:
Reason: The application has run out of memory at the client workstation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the client workstation. Attempt to make more memory available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.UNLECSC
member.summary: 04408 UNL CSC Cannot store the command if ON SERVER option is not specified
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempt is made to store an Unload/Load command having the "ON CLIENT" option (which is the default option). Unload/Load commands can be stored if and only if the Unload/Load file resides on the Server machine.
Remedy: Specify "ON SERVER" option in the Load/Unload command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.UNLECUS
member.summary: 04409 UNL CUS Unload of system table not allowed
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to UNLOAD a system table.
Remedy: Correct UNLOAD command. System tables cannot be unloaded.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.UNLECRM
member.summary: 04410 UNL CRM Cannot unload while in result set restriction mode
member.remarks:
Reason: Unload operation is not supported when result set restriction mode is on.
Remedy: Turn off the restriction mode and then re-execute the unload operation.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.UNLENSA
member.summary: 04411 UNL NSA Must be SYSADM to unload database or schema
member.remarks:
Reason: Only SYSADM can perform the UNLOAD DATABASE/UNLOAD SCHEMA command.
Remedy: None. You must have SYSADM database authority to UNLOAD an entire database or database schema.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CSVEMNI
member.summary: 04501 CSV MNI 003 - Fatal SQLBase System Failure (CSV MNI)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CSVEMNE
member.summary: 04502 CSV MNE MAIN database does not exist
member.remarks: Reason: Could not find the MAIN database. Remedy:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CSVEPNF
member.summary: 04503 CSV PNF 003 - Fatal SQLBase System Failure (CSV PNF)
member.remarks:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CSVEOOM
member.summary: 04507 CSV OOM 008 - Out of memory at the database computer
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.summary: 04508 CSV IST 003 - Fatal SQLBase System Failure (CSV IST)

member.remarks:

member.remarks:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CSVETCL
member.summary: 04513 CSV TCL Too many commit-server log records for transaction
member.remarks:
Reason: An inconsistency was detected in the database logs pertaining to the commit-server. It detected that a certain transaction had too many log commit-server log records.
Remedy: This error could be created if the incorrect log files are used during crash-recovery or rollforward restore. Please make sure that the log files are being correctly restored.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CSVECSN
member.summary: 04514 CSV CSN Commit-server feature not enabled
member.remarks:
Reason: The user tried to execute a command requiring the commit-server feature -- for example, the commit of a distributed transaction. This is not enabled on the current server.
Remedy: Enable the commit-server feature by setting COMMITSERVER=1 in SQL.INI or via the 'sqlset' API call or via the SQLTalk command SET COMMITSERVER ON.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CSVERDS
member.summary: 04515 CSV RDS Commit server recovery daemon has already been started (CSV RDS)
member.remarks:
Reason: The recovery daemon has already been started.
Remedy: The recovery daemon should be stopped and the command re-executed.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CSVECCD
member.summary: 04516 CSV CCD Commit Server cannot connect to participant database (CSV CCD)
member.remarks:
Reason: The commit server cannot connect to one of the participants in the distributed transaction.
Remedy: Ensure that the commit server can connect to all participants in the distributed transactions. Please make sure that the SQL.INI is properly configured so that the commit server can access all the databases involved.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CSVEISC
member.summary: 04517 CSV ISC Invalid command for single-user server.
member.remarks:
Reason: The commit server feature is not valid for a single-user server.
Remedy: Either this command is not necessary or an alternative command is sufficient. If this feature is necessary, start a multi-user server.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DTMEIST
member.summary: 04601 DTM IST 003 - Fatal SQLBase System Failure (DTM IST)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DTMEICF
member.summary: 04602 DTM ICF 003 - Fatal SQLBase System Failure (DTM ICF)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DTMECAC
member.summary: 04603 DTM CAC Out of memory at the database computer (DTM CAC)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DTMETLU
member.summary: 04604 DTM TLU Distributed transaction left unresolved
member.remarks:
Reason: A distributed transaction was left unresolved -- i.e., it was neither COMMITted nor ROLLBACKed. This is not allowed in the single-user database.
Remedy: A transaction is left in an unresolved state if the commit-server for the transaction (the MAIN database) was not accessible for some reason. Once you make sure that the MAIN DB is available, the next time you connect to this DB, the transaction will be resolved automatically.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DTMEUTS
member.summary: 04605 DTM UTS Unresolved distributed transactions found
member.remarks:
Reason: At the end of recovery, there were some unresolved distributed transactions. This is not allowed in the single-user database.
Remedy: If this database has only been accessed through a single-user system (e.g., SQLDEMO), make sure that the commit-server for the transactions (the MAIN database) is available. If this database has also been accessed through a multi-user system such as a server, then you can access it only via a server until all the unresolved transactions have been resolved.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DTMEITI
member.summary: 04606 DTM ITI 003 - Fatal SQLBase System Failure (DTM ITI)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DTMECRT
member.summary: 04607 DTM CRT Cannot resolve distributed transaction (DTM CRT)
member.remarks:
Reason: Either a distributed transaction has not been started or if it is, the transaction identifiers do not match.
Remedy: If you are committing or rolling back a distributed transaction, use the FORCE option.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DTMEVNM
member.summary: 04608 DTM VNM Database not set up properly (DTM VNM)
member.remarks:
Reason: The database has not been set up properly. The number of bind variables in a stored command does not match the number of bind variables.
Remedy: Recreate the database or store the commands necessary for executing distributed transactions.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DTMEUST
member.summary: 04609 DTM UST Unresolved single user distributed transaction found.
member.remarks:
Reason: At the end of recovery, there were some unresolved distributed transactions. These transactions were started in single-user mode. An attempt is being made to start this database as a multi-user server.
Remedy: This database should be accessed through a single-user system (e.g., SQLDEMO) to resolve the undecided transactions. Also make sure that the commit-server for the transactions (the MAIN database) is available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DTMEDTD
member.summary: 04610 DTM DTD Distributed transactions are no longer supported.
member.remarks:
Reason: SQLBase no longer supports distributed transactions.
Remedy: None.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CDNECAC
member.summary: 04701 CDN CAC 002 - Out of memory at the client
member.remarks:
Reason: The application has run out of memory at the client workstation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the client workstation. Attempt to make more memory available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CDNECCS
member.summary: 04702 CDN CCS 002 - Out of memory at the client
member.remarks:
Reason: The application has run out of memory at the client workstation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the client workstation. Attempt to make more memory available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CDNECAP
member.summary: 04703 CDN CAP 002 - Out of memory at the client
member.remarks:
Reason: The application has run out of memory at the client workstation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the client workstation. Attempt to make more memory available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CDNEMNI
member.summary: 04704 CDN MNI 003 - Fatal SQLBase System Failure (CDN MNI)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CDNENCS
member.summary: 04705 CDN NCS No commit-server available
member.remarks:
Reason: No commit-server is available to perform a two-phase commit of the distributed transaction.
Remedy: Ensure that at least one of the SQLBase servers you have connected to has COMMITSERVER=1 set in its SQL.INI.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CDNERBV
member.summary: 04706 CDN RBV Rollback vote from participant.
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CDNEI2P
member.summary: 04707 CDN I2P Invalid two-phase commit protocol specified.
member.remarks:
Reason: SQLSET was called with parameter SQLP2PP and an invalid value for the protocol.
Remedy: The value passed to SQLSET must be one of: SQL2STD -- standard protocol SQL2PRC -- presumed-commit protocol SQL2PRA -- presumed-abort protocol

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CDNEIFC
member.summary: 04708 CDN IFC Invalid function code.
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt was made to execute an invalid function against all participants.
Remedy: #3

member.summary: 04801 SLK CAS 008 - Out of memory at the database computer
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.
