Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEINR
member.summary: 05001 TLK INR Invalid number of rows
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a FETCH command and the number of rows specified is less than one or invalid.
Remedy: Correct the SQLTalk command. The FETCH command requires the number of rows to fetch. The syntax is FETCH n where n is the number of rows to fetch.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEQNS
member.summary: 05002 TLK QNS Result set restriction mode is not supported for this query
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECOL
member.summary: 05003 TLK COL Can't open long data file -- skipped
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to bind long data to a long data file and the file name specified cannot be opened.
Remedy: Verify that the specified filename is correct.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECOC
member.summary: 05004 TLK COC Can't open the cursor file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to open a cursor file and the open fails.
Remedy: Check that the cursor filename is correctly specified. If the cursor filename is correct, determine why the file could not be opened.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECNA
member.summary: 05005 TLK CNA Cursor is not active
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to DISCONNECT or USE a cursor by a number that is not active.
Remedy: Correct DISCONNECT or USE command to only use a cursor number that was previously connected to successfully.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEDNA
member.summary: 05006 TLK DNA Data not allowed with this command
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting some SQL statement other than INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, or SELECT with data following the command indicated by a backslash (\) to start the next line.
Remedy: Correct SQL statement. Data can only follow an SQL statement that is an INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, or SELECT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECTB
member.summary: 05007 TLK CTB Command too big -- ignored
member.remarks:
Reason: SQLTalk has found the input line too large to handle so it skips the input line.
Remedy: Modify the input line.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEICN
member.summary: 05008 TLK ICN Invalid cursor number
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to CONNECT or USE a cursor by a number that is not valid.
Remedy: Correct CONNECT or USE command to only use a cursor number that was previously connected to successfully.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMFR
member.summary: 05009 TLK MFR Missing FROM keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Missing FROM keyword.
Remedy: Correct the SQLTalk command syntax.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKETMC
member.summary: 05010 TLK TMC Too many columns
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a BREAK or COMPUTE command and the number of columns exceeds the limit.
Remedy: Correct BREAK or COMPUTE command. The number of columns is limited to 20.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECUL
member.summary: 05011 TLK CUL Can't unload long data
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to unload data in DIF or ASCII format and the data contains LONG VARCHAR data.
Remedy: Unload data in SQL format. LONG VARCHAR data cannot be unloaded in DIF or ASCII format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMBC
member.summary: 05012 TLK MBC Missing or misspelled CONNECTION keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: The keyword CONNECTION is missing or misspelled in a BEGIN CONNECTION command.
Remedy: Verify and correct the CONNECTION keyword in the BEGIN CONNECTION command. The syntax for the BEGIN CONNECTION is: BEGIN CONNECTION connection-name <database/username/password>.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEOPE
member.summary: 05013 TLK OPE Open file error
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load or unload the database from a file but the named file cannot be opened, or attempting a REORGANIZE command but the temporary file used by the reorganize routine cannot be opened for output on the unload step or opened for input on the reload step, or attempting to SAVE a report or SQL statement in a file for later use and the named file cannot be opened.
Remedy: If the file name was specified, check that the file name is correct. If the file name is correct or if its not necessary to specify a file name, determine why the file could not be opened.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECFE
member.summary: 05014 TLK CFE Close file error
member.remarks:
Reason: SQLTalk failed in its attempt to close a file after the RUN of a script file or, after the EDIT of the previous SQL statement or, during the REORGANIZE of a database or, at the end of an UNLOAD operation. This error can also occur when loading LONG VARCHAR data and the "//" terminator is missing.
Remedy: Determine why the operating system would not allow the closing of the file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEITL
member.summary: 05015 TLK ITL Identifier too long
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to define an ALIAS for a column number and the ALIAS name is exceeds 36 characters or more generally, SQLTalk is attempting to parse an identifier and the has found the identifier to exceed 36 characters.
Remedy: Correct identifier.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIVA
member.summary: 05016 TLK IVA Invalid argument
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to set the isolation mode and the mode setting is not RR (read repeatability), CS (cursor stability), RL (release lock), or RO (read only) or an argument specified on the SQLTalk command line is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the isolation mode setting or the argument specified on the command line when invoking SQLTalk.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIBC
member.summary: 05017 TLK IBC Invalid connection name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a BEGIN CONNECTION command and the specified connection name is either an invalid identifier or a valid identifier but too long (greater than 36 characters).
Remedy: Modify the BEGIN CONNECTION command by correctly specifying the connection name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMSL
member.summary: 05018 TLK MSL Missing slash (e.g.user/password)
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a connect command and the forward slash is missing or incorrect. A forward slash (/) is expected between the user name and password.
Remedy: Correct connect statement. The syntax for the connect command is: "CONNECT databasename N username/password" where N is the number assigned to this connection for later reference and username/password is optional. If username/password is not specified then SYSADM/SYSADM is assumed. If username/password is specified then both are required with a forward slash separating the two identifiers.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEISC
member.summary: 05019 TLK ISC Invalid SET command
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SET command and the keyword immediately following the SET keyword is not recognized as a valid SET option.
Remedy: Verify that the keyword following SET is a valid SET option.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECNE
member.summary: 05020 TLK CNE Command not properly ended
member.remarks:
Reason: SQLTalk has determined that the command being attempted is not properly ended.
Remedy: Verify that the command is properly ended.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEICS
member.summary: 05021 TLK ICS Invalid cursor size
member.remarks:
Reason: An invalid cursor size has been specified on a connect.
Remedy: Correct cursor size on connect command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIVP
member.summary: 05022 TLK IVP Invalid password
member.remarks:
Reason: An invalid password has been specified signing on to SQLTalk or attempting a connect command within SQLTalk.
Remedy: Correct password.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMRP
member.summary: 05023 TLK MRP Missing right parentheses
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting connect command and a right parentheses is missing.
Remedy: Correct connect command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMIC
member.summary: 05024 TLK MIC Missing or invalid cursor number
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a DISCONNECT a cursor by number that is not valid.
Remedy: Correct DISCONNECT command to only use a cursor number that has previously been successfully connected to.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECPS
member.summary: 05025 TLK CPS Invalid cache page size
member.remarks:
Reason: An invalid number has been specified for the number of cache pages.
Remedy: Correct the specified cache page size number.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKERFN
member.summary: 05026 TLK RFN Invalid run file name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to SAVE a report or SQL statement or attempting to run a script file and the file name is not valid.
Remedy: Correct file name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEEDB
member.summary: 05027 TLK EDB Expected database/username/password authentication string
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a BEGIN CONNECTION command and the authentication string (database/username/password) is expected immediately after the connection name.
Remedy: Correct the command. The BEGIN CONNECTION string syntax is: BEGIN CONNECTION connection-name <database/username/password>.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECOR
member.summary: 05028 TLK COR Can't open the run file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to PRINT or RUN a script file and the specified file name cannot be opened.
Remedy: Correct file name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEOOO
member.summary: 05029 TLK OOO Missing ON or OFF keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to set a SQLTalk option ON or OFF and the keyword is either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct command to specify ON or OFF correctly.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEQNE
member.summary: 05030 TLK QNE Quoted string not ended properly
member.remarks:
Reason: A quoted string has not been properly ended.
Remedy: Correct quoted string.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEQTL
member.summary: 05031 TLK QTL Quoted string is too long
member.remarks:
Reason: A quoted string is larger than 900 characters.
Remedy: Correct quoted string.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMQS
member.summary: 05032 TLK MQS Missing quoted string
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a COLUMN command and the quoted string expected after the keyword HEADING, PICTURE, or NULLS is missing. Or attempting to execute a DOS command using the syntax "$ 'dos command'" and the quoted string expected after the dollar sign ($) is missing. Or attempting to SET NULLS globally and the quoted string expected after the NULLS keyword is missing.
Remedy: Supply appropriate quoted string.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENTL
member.summary: 05033 TLK NTL Null string is too large
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to substitute a string for NULLS either for a particular column via the COLUMN command or globally via a SET NULLS command, and the substitute string is larger than ten characters.
Remedy: Reduce the size of the NULLS substitute string.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEISH
member.summary: 05034 TLK ISH Invalid show command
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SHOW command and the type of SHOW indicated by the keyword immediately following the SHOW is invalid or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the SHOW command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENSF
member.summary: 05035 TLK NSF No active spool file to close
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to SET SPOOL OFF and no active spool file exists.
Remedy: None. You cannot turn off a spool file if it does not exist.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKESFE
member.summary: 05036 TLK SFE Spool file is already active
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to set a spool file on and a spool file is already active.
Remedy: You must turn off the active spool file before starting a new spool file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECOS
member.summary: 05037 TLK COS Can't open the spool file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to open a spool file and the open is failing.
Remedy: Check that the spool file name was specified, and that the file name is correct. If the name was specified and is correct then determine why the file could not be opened.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIFN
member.summary: 05038 TLK IFN Invalid file name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to BACKUP, RESTORE, PRINT TO, SET SCROLL, SET FILTER, SET SPOOL, or UNLOAD and the specified file name is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the file name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMLP
member.summary: 05039 TLK MLP NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKETMA
member.summary: 05040 TLK TMA Too many arguments
member.remarks:
Reason: Too many arguments have been specified on the command line.
Remedy: Correct specified arguments.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENCF
member.summary: 05041 TLK NCF No command found to process
member.remarks:
Reason: SQLTalk is attempting to locate a command to process and cannot locate the command.
Remedy: Check source of commands and determine why no commands are found to process.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMBS
member.summary: 05042 TLK MBS Previous command must be a select
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a BACKWARDS command and the previous command was not a SELECT statement. A BACKWARDS must be preceded by the execution of a successful SELECT statement.
Remedy: Always fetch forward via a SELECT prior to attempting a BACKWARDS command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMQN
member.summary: 05043 TLK MQN Missing query name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to ERASE, EXECUTE, RETRIEVE, or STORE a stored SQL statement and the statement name has not been specified.
Remedy: Correct command syntax so that the stored statement name is specified.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECNS
member.summary: 05044 TLK CNS Command NOT stored
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to STORE an SQL statement and the store name already exists in the database. The user is prompted with: Command already exists. Overwrite it (Y/N)? If response is "N", user gets a "Command NOT stored", message.
Remedy: Use another store command name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIFT
member.summary: 05045 TLK IFT Invalid format type
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to LOAD in a format other than ASCII, DIF, SQL, or WKS, or attempting to UNLOAD other than ALL or DATABASE or in a format other than ASCII, DIF, or SQL.
Remedy: Correct LOAD or UNLOAD command to load only in ASCII, DIF, or SQL format and UNLOAD ALL or DATABASE in formats of ASCII, DIF, or SQL.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEOSF
member.summary: 05046 TLK OSF Only SQL format allow multi-tables
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to UNLOAD other than ALL, DATABASE, or in SQL format. Multi-table unloads are only allowed in an UNLOAD ALL, UNLOAD DATABASE, or UNLOAD in SQL format.
Remedy: Correct UNLOAD to specify a particular table, or use UNLOAD ALL or DATABASE or UNLOAD in SQL format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEULA
member.summary: 05047 TLK ULA Unload aborted
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to UNLOAD or REORGANIZE and the unload file cannot be opened.
Remedy: Determine why the unload file could not be opened.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECUS
member.summary: 05048 TLK CUS Unload of system table not allowed
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to UNLOAD a system table.
Remedy: Correct UNLOAD command. System tables cannot be unloaded.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKETNE
member.summary: 05049 TLK TNE Table does not exist
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load a specific table in ASCII format or unload a specific table in SQL format and the named table does not exist.
Remedy: Modify command to correctly specify an existing table.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEUEF
member.summary: 05050 TLK UEF Unexpected end of file
member.remarks:
Reason: SQLTalk is reading input data or input from an input file and SQLTalk has unexpectedly reached the end of the file being processed.
Remedy: Determine why the input data or input file has unexpectedly reached an end of file condition. Try increasing the SQLTalk LOADBUFFER size.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKETNM
member.summary: 05051 TLK TNM Table name missing from load file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load in DIF format and the load table name is missing from the DIF file.
Remedy: Correct LOAD file to correctly specify the load table name when loading in DIF format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEVCM
member.summary: 05052 TLK VCM Vector count missing on load file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load in DIF format and the vector count is missing from the load file.
Remedy: Correct LOAD file to correctly specify the vector count when loading in DIF format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEUDT
member.summary: 05053 TLK UDT NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKETTL
member.summary: 05054 TLK TTL NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIDI
member.summary: 05055 TLK IDI Invalid load data item found
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load in DIF format and the load data type found in the load file is invalid.
Remedy: Correct LOAD file to correctly specify the load data type when loading in DIF format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKESDI
member.summary: 05056 TLK SDI Special data item expected in load
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load in DIF format and a special data item is expected in the load file but is not found.
Remedy: Correct LOAD file to correctly specify special data items when loading in DIF format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEISN
member.summary: 05057 TLK ISN Invalid source file name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load from a file but the specified file name is not valid.
Remedy: Correct LOAD file name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEITP
member.summary: 05058 TLK ITP Invalid title parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: Setting a TTITLE (top title) or BTITLE (bottom title) on a SQLTalk report and the keyword immediately following the SET TTITLE or BTITLE keyword is invalid.
Remedy: Correct TTITLE or BTITLE set command. Immediately following TTITLE or BTITLE should be a title string, or the keyword ON, OFF, DATE, or PAGE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENTS
member.summary: 05059 TLK NTS No tables specified
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an unload, and no table names have been specified.
Remedy: Identify some table names or specify ALL in the UNLOAD command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKETEM
member.summary: 05060 TLK TEM Title exceeds max number of lines
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a TTITLE or BTITLE command and the command has specified more than three lines to the title.
Remedy: Modify title so that the title is not more than three lines.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEDTN
member.summary: 05061 TLK DTN Destination table not used with SQL format
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a LOAD SQL and specifying a source file name and a destination table name.
Remedy: Modify the LOAD SQL command. Destination table names are not allowed in SQL format. The SQL statements in the LOAD file identify the table names to be loaded.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMDT
member.summary: 05062 TLK MDT Missing destination table name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a LOAD ASCII and specifying a source file name but the destination table name is not specified.
Remedy: Modify the LOAD ASCII command. Destination table names are required when loading in ASCII format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEICI
member.summary: 05063 TLK ICI Invalid column identifier
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a BREAK, COMPUTE, COLUMN, or ALIAS name command and the column identifier is invalid or exceeds a count of 20.
Remedy: Modify command to correctly identify the column identifiers.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEHTL
member.summary: 05064 TLK HTL Header too long
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to define a column heading within a COLUMN command and the column heading exceeds 132 characters.
Remedy: Correct COLUMN command. Column headings must be 132 characters or less.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEHEM
member.summary: 05065 TLK HEM Header exceeds max lines allowed
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to define a column heading within a COLUMN command and the number of lines defined in the column heading exceeds three.
Remedy: Correct COLUMN command. Column headings are restricted to a maximum of three lines.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEICW
member.summary: 05066 TLK ICW Invalid column width
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to define a column WIDTH within a COLUMN command and the specified width is invalid, is less than one character, or greater than the current output line size.
Remedy: Correct COLUMN command. The WIDTH parameter must be defined from 1 to maximum output line size.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEICP
member.summary: 05067 TLK ICP Invalid column parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a COLUMN command and a specified parameter is invalid or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct COLUMN command. Identify and modify the invalid or misspelled COLUMN command parameter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKETIL
member.summary: 05068 TLK TIL Title too large
member.remarks:
Reason: Setting a TTITLE (top title) or BTITLE (bottom title) on a SQLTalk report and the title specified exceeds 132 characters.
Remedy: Correct TTITLE or BTITLE set command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEFCE
member.summary: 05069 TLK FCE FATAL CONNECT ERROR - EXIT NOW
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to set a cache size or set recovery on or off and SQLTalk performs a disconnect and a reconnect to accomplish these operations. Unfortunately, the reconnect operation has unexpectedly failed leaving SQLTalk in an unpredictable state.
Remedy: Exit SQLTalk immediately. Try again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECPT
member.summary: 05070 TLK CPT Cache page size too large
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to set a cache size too large.
Remedy: Modify SET CACHE to less cache pages than the previous attempt.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEUEV
member.summary: 05071 TLK UEV Invalid value
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting SET command and an invalid value has been specified.
Remedy: Correct SET command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECRU
member.summary: 05072 TLK CRU Can't remove unload file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an unload operation and the unload has failed and the system cannot remove the partially completed unload file.
Remedy: Erase unload and determine why unload failed.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEDNE
member.summary: 05073 TLK DNE Database does not exist
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to connect to database via SQLTalk and the specified database name is not found.
Remedy: Correct the database name or determine why the database name has not been found.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMEK
member.summary: 05074 TLK MEK Missing ERRORS keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a RUN command with DETECT ERRORS option and the ERRORS keyword is missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct SQLTalk command. The basic syntax when using the DETECT ERRORS syntax option is: RUN procedure-filename DETECT ERRORS

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIWS
member.summary: 05075 TLK IWS Out of memory at the client (TLK IWS)
member.remarks:
Reason: The application has run out of memory at the client workstation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the client workstation. Attempt to make more memory available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEPTL
member.summary: 05076 TLK PTL Picture too long
member.remarks:
Reason: A picture string has exceeded 40 characters.
Remedy: Correct picture string. Picture strings are limited to a maximum of 40 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIPI
member.summary: 05077 TLK IPI NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIAP
member.summary: 05078 TLK IAP Invalid adjust parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: An ADJUST parameter has been specified in a COLUMN command and the ADJUST type is invalid.
Remedy: Correct ADJUST parameter type. Valid keywords allowed after the ADJUST keyword are LEFT, CENTER, RIGHT, or OFF.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKESAV
member.summary: 05079 TLK SAV Invalid SAVE command parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: A SAVE command has been specified with an invalid SAVE type.
Remedy: Correct the SAVE command. Valid keywords allowed immediately after the SAVE keyword are SQL, REPORT, or FILTER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIBP
member.summary: 05080 TLK IBP Invalid BREAK command parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid keyword immediately after BREAK command keyword.
Remedy: Correct the BREAK command. Valid BREAKs are either BREAK OFF or BREAK ON [REPORT] column-list.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENBS
member.summary: 05081 TLK NBS No breaks specified
member.remarks:
Reason: A BREAK command has been specified without specifying any columns to break on.
Remedy: Correct the BREAK command. A list of break columns must be listed or the keyword REPORT must be listed.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECMP
member.summary: 05082 TLK CMP Invalid COMPUTE command parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: A COMPUTE command has been specified with an invalid aggregate keyword.
Remedy: Correct the COMPUTE command. A COMPUTE command must specify an aggregate computation of either MAX, MIN, SUM, AVG, or COUNT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMOF
member.summary: 05083 TLK MOF Missing OF keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: A COMPUTE command has been specified and the keyword OF is missing after the aggregate computation keyword of MAX, MIN, SUM, AVG, or COUNT.
Remedy: Correct the COMPUTE command. The OF keyword is immediately followed by a list of columns to operate on. See the SQLTalk Command Reference Manual for a complete explanation of the COMPUTE command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMON
member.summary: 05084 TLK MON NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENBC
member.summary: 05085 TLK NBC No break exists for this column
member.remarks:
Reason: A COMPUTE command has specified a break-list but the columns specified in the break-list have not been set as break columns.
Remedy: Perform BREAK command on any columns to break on. The COMPUTE command can only specify columns in the break-list that have been established as a break column.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEINC
member.summary: 05086 TLK INC Invalid number of columns
member.remarks:
Reason: The RIGHT or LEFT command has been specified and an invalid number has been specified for the number of columns to shift right or left.
Remedy: Correct the RIGHT or LEFT command. A valid numeric value must be specified after the RIGHT or LEFT keyword to shift the displayed output of a SELECT command to the right or left of the first column.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEAAE
member.summary: 05087 TLK AAE Alias already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: The specified ALIAS name already exists.
Remedy: Correct the COLUMN command to specify a new and unique ALIAS name for the column indicated.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENPF
member.summary: 05088 TLK NPF No previous file found for $DATA
member.remarks:
Reason: A $DATA keyword has been found but no previous file exists.
Remedy: The keyword $DATA is used to signal input from another source. This source is always a previous file, which can be a text file or the keyboard. When this keyword is counted, SQLTalk looks for a backslash, followed by data lines, in the previous file. Correct the scenario so that a previous file exists.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENDF
member.summary: 05089 TLK NDF No data found in previous file
member.remarks:
Reason: A $DATA keyword has been found but no data was found in the previous file.
Remedy: The keyword $DATA is used to signal input from another source. This source is always a previous file, which can be a text file or the keyboard. When this keyword is encountered, SQLTalk looks for a backslash, followed by data lines, in the previous file. Correct the previous file referenced so that a backslash exists followed by the data lines.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECOP
member.summary: 05090 TLK COP Cannot open printer for report
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a PRINT command and the printer cannot be opened for the printing of the report.
Remedy: Verify that the printer is on and enabled. Retry.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKESTS
member.summary: 05091 TLK STS Size smaller than column width
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to set the linesize smaller than a largest specified column WIDTH.
Remedy: Reduce size of largest column width to accommodate new linesize. The column width is set with the COLUMN command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECCD
member.summary: 05092 TLK CCD Cursor number conflicts with database name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to disconnect a cursor from a database and the database name specified does not correspond to the cursor number specified.
Remedy: Correct the DISCONNECT command. Verify that the database name is correct for the specified cursor number.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECIF
member.summary: 05093 TLK CIF Cannot open input file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to open an existing file and a failure has occurred.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the open file failure. Verify that the specified file exists. Verify the number of files allowed open for the operating system permits the additional file, that is, check the FILES= configuration parameter setting.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMST
member.summary: 05094 TLK MST Missing source or destination table name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a COPY command and the specified source or destination table does not exist.
Remedy: Verify that the source table exists and is correctly specified. If the source table is correct, verify that the destination table exists and is correctly specified. The COPY command does not create the destination table, it must previously exist.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEISI
member.summary: 05095 TLK ISI NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMTO
member.summary: 05096 TLK MTO Missing TO keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: The TO keyword is missing in a COPY command.
Remedy: Correct COPY command. The general syntax is COPY source-table TO destination-table. See the SQLTalk Command Reference Manual for more information on the COPY command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENPC
member.summary: 05097 TLK NPC No previous command found
member.remarks:
Reason: The specified LIST command should display the most recently entered SQL statement but no previous command can be found.
Remedy: None. No previous command exists to be listed.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKELNF
member.summary: 05098 TLK LNF Line number not found
member.remarks:
Reason: The LIST command specified a non-existent line number.
Remedy: Correct the LIST command. Specify a valid line number.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECDC
member.summary: 05099 TLK CDC NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECEF
member.summary: 05100 TLK CEF Cannot open edit file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to EDIT a file and the specified file cannot be opened.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the open file failure. Verify that the specified file exists. Verify the number of files allowed open for the operating system permits the additional file, that is, check the FILES= configuration parameter setting.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEEDI
member.summary: 05101 TLK EDI Editor not available
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to EDIT a file and an editor is not available.
Remedy: An editor can be made available by setting the environment variable EDITOR. See the SQLTalk Command Reference Manual for more information on the EDIT command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEDEE
member.summary: 05102 TLK DEE OS command execution error
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to execute an OS command from within SQLTalk and the operation has failed.
Remedy: Correct the OS command operation.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMJK
member.summary: 05103 TLK MJK NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEJFN
member.summary: 05104 TLK JFN NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEFIL
member.summary: 05105 TLK FIL Scroll mode already active
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to set SCROLL mode on and it is already on.
Remedy: None. Cannot turn on SCROLL mode if SCROLL mode is already active.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKESSS
member.summary: 05106 TLK SSS NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECSM
member.summary: 05107 TLK CSM Cannot set cache pages with multi-user database
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to set the cache size with a multi-user database.
Remedy: None. The database cache size can only be set at the database server. The database cache size cannot be set from a remote client workstation, and it can only be set on a single user version of the database.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKESP1
member.summary: 05108 TLK SP1 Cannot set cache pages if connected more than once
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to set the database cache size and you are connected to the database more than once.
Remedy: Disconnect all cursors but your current cursor. You can only set the database cache while being connected once to a single user database.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEDCC
member.summary: 05109 TLK DCC Cannot disconnect current cursor
member.remarks:
Reason: Cannot disconnect your currently connected cursor.
Remedy: USE a different cursor before attempting to disconnect the specified cursor. You cannot disconnect your last remaining cursor. To perform database operation without a connection, exit SQLTalk and restart SQLTalk with the NOCONNECT option.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEBND
member.summary: 05110 TLK BND Bind variables with no bind data
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to execute a command that has bind variables but data after the command was found to be bound.
Remedy: Verify that a backslash after the command exists. The backslash indicates the start of the data to be bound.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMBD
member.summary: 05111 TLK MBD NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECTS
member.summary: 05112 TLK CTS Command size too small
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to set the command size too small.
Remedy: None. The command size should not be modified.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECAC
member.summary: 05113 TLK CAC Out of memory at the client (TLK CAC)
member.remarks:
Reason: The application has run out of memory at the client workstation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the client workstation. Attempt to make more memory available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEILL
member.summary: 05114 TLK ILL Input too long for load buffer
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a load and the input is too long for the current load buffer.
Remedy: Increase the SQLTalk LOADBUFFER size or modify the load file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECAL
member.summary: 05115 TLK CAL Out of memory at the client (TLK CAL)
member.remarks:
Reason: The application has run out of memory at the client workstation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the client workstation. Attempt to make more memory available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEDTL
member.summary: 05116 TLK DTL Diff table name too long
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a LOAD DIF command and the table name is too large.
Remedy: Correct LOAD DIF command by specifying a valid table name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECUB
member.summary: 05117 TLK CUB Out of memory at the client (TLK CUB)
member.remarks:
Reason: The application has run out of memory at the client workstation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the client workstation. Attempt to make more memory available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMCK
member.summary: 05118 TLK MCK Missing CURSOR or FILE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: The keyword CURSOR or FILE is missing in the SQLTalk syntax for a GET or PUT command.
Remedy: The SQLTalk keyword CURSOR or FILE is mandatory and must immediately follow either the GET or PUT keyword.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIDN
member.summary: 05119 TLK IDN Invalid database name
member.remarks:
Reason: The specified database name is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the command by specifying a valid database name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEITN
member.summary: 05120 TLK ITN Invalid table name
member.remarks:
Reason: The specified table name is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the command by specifying a valid table name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENSC
member.summary: 05121 TLK NSC Out of memory at the client (TLK NSC)
member.remarks:
Reason: The application has run out of memory at the client workstation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the client workstation. Attempt to make more memory available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECPO
member.summary: 05122 TLK CPO Cannot turn print off for subtitle
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to turn off PRINT for a column that has been specified with SUBTITLE on.
Remedy: None. Columns defined with SUBTITLE on must be printed, that is, they must defined with PRINT on.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKETND
member.summary: 05123 TLK TND Table not found in dictionary
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to unload a non-existent table.
Remedy: Verify the correct spelling of the table and verify that the table exists.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMDB
member.summary: 05124 TLK MDB Missing DATABASE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CHECK DATABASE, INSTALL DATABASE, or DEINSTALL DATABASE and the DATABASE keyword is missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the command by properly specifying the DATABASE keyword.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKESRV
member.summary: 05125 TLK SRV Missing SERVER keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SHOW DATABASES ON SERVER server-id command and the SERVER keyword is missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the command by properly specifying the SERVER keyword.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEISV
member.summary: 05126 TLK ISV NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMDS
member.summary: 05127 TLK MDS Missing DATABASES keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SHOW DATABASES command and the DATABASES keyword is missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the command by properly specifying the DATABASES keyword.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENSA
member.summary: 05128 TLK NSA Must be SYSADM to unload database
member.remarks:
Reason: Only SYSADM can perform the UNLOAD DATABASE command.
Remedy: None. You must have SYSADM database authority to UNLOAD an entire database.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENCD
member.summary: 05129 TLK NCD NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKE001
member.summary: 05130 TLK 001 NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKESCN
member.summary: 05131 TLK SCN Select list element is not a simple column name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SHOW SELECTLISTNAME command and the select list elements are not simple column names, but rather an expression or constant, and therefore it cannot be displayed.
Remedy: None. Expressions and constants cannot be displayed with the SHOW SELECTLISTNAME command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMFC
member.summary: 05132 TLK MFC Missing FROM <directory> clause
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a RESTORE command and the FROM directory-name clause is missing.
Remedy: Correct RESTORE command by properly specifying the FROM directory-name clause.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMTC
member.summary: 05133 TLK MTC Missing TO <database> clause
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a RESTORE command and the TO dataname-name clause is missing.
Remedy: Correct RESTORE command by properly specifying the TO database-name clause.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKESSC
member.summary: 05134 TLK SSC SET SERVER command must precede this operation
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to perform a database administrative function and a database server connection has not been established.
Remedy: Perform a SET SERVER command to establish connection to a remote database server before attempting any database administrative function.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKE002
member.summary: 05135 TLK 002 NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKE003
member.summary: 05136 TLK 003 NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEBDT
member.summary: 05137 TLK BDT Bad datetime, expected: MM/DD/YY HH:MM:SS
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a ROLLFORWARD command to a specified date and time that does not conform to the form of "mm/dd/yy hh:mm:ss".
Remedy: Correct the ROLLFORWARD command by specifying a date and time that conforms to the format of "mm/dd/yy hh:mm:ss".

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEBTE
member.summary: 05138 TLK BTE BACKUP, TIME, or END expected
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a ROLLFORWARD command and the keyword BACKUP, TIME, or END is expected immediately after the TO keyword.
Remedy: Correct the ROLLFORWARD command by specifying a valid keyword after the TO keyword or either BACKUP, TIME, or END.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIVS
member.summary: 05139 TLK IVS Invalid server name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SET SERVER command and the specified server name is either invalid or larger than 8 characters.
Remedy: Correct the SET SERVER command by specifying a valid server name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKERLE
member.summary: 05140 TLK RLE RELEASE LOG expected
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a RELEASE LOG command and the mandatory LOG keyword is either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the RELEASE LOG command by properly specifying the command as RELEASE LOG.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEDOV
member.summary: 05141 TLK DOV NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEOOS
member.summary: 05142 TLK OOS Only ON SERVER or ON CLIENT allowed
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a BACKUP or RESTORE command and the keyword after the ON keyword can only be SERVER or CLIENT.
Remedy: Correct the BACKUP or RESTORE command by properly specifying the ON clause as either ON SERVER or ON CLIENT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMPE
member.summary: 05143 TLK MPE NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKERSM
member.summary: 05144 TLK RSM Result set mode must be in effect to set restriction
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to SET RESTRICTION mode while not in SCROLL mode.
Remedy: Restriction mode can only be set after turning on scroll mode, that is, SET SCROLL ON.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKETMB
member.summary: 05145 TLK TMB Too much bind data
member.remarks:
Reason: The number of data items read exceeds the number of bind variables specified.
Remedy: Correct either the SQL statement or the bind data being read so that the number of bind variables matches the number of data elements.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIDT
member.summary: 05146 TLK IDT Invalid data type
member.remarks:
Reason: The $DATATYPES line specified an invalid data type.
Remedy: Correct the $DATATYPES line so that the data types are valid.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIDA
member.summary: 05147 TLK IDA Invalid data for specified data type
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid data has been found for the specified data types.
Remedy: Correct data so that it matches the specified data types.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIUN
member.summary: 05148 TLK IUN Invalid user name
member.remarks:
Reason: A user name has been entered that exceeds 8 characters.
Remedy: Correct the user name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENOF
member.summary: 05149 TLK NOF NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEPWN
member.summary: 05150 TLK PWN NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIQS
member.summary: 05151 TLK IQS Invalid quoted data field
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECNL
member.summary: 05152 TLK CNL Set cursor is no longer supported
member.remarks:
Reason: The SET CURSOR command is no longer supported.
Remedy: None. The SET CURSOR command is not supported.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEICO
member.summary: 05153 TLK ICO Invalid column number
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a LOAD DIF command and a column number in the DIF file format is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the DIF file attempting to be loaded.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKESTL
member.summary: 05154 TLK STL Stored command name is too large
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a STORE command and the command name exceeds 36 characters.
Remedy: Correct the STORE command by specifying a valid command name that does not exceed 36 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECTL
member.summary: 05155 TLK CTL Creator name is too large
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a STORE command and the creator name exceeds 8 characters.
Remedy: Correct the STORE command by specifying a valid creator name that does not exceed 8 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEJOR
member.summary: 05156 TLK JOR NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEENM
member.summary: 05157 TLK ENM Expecting a number
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SET statement and the integer-constant that was expected is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the SET statement by specifying a valid integer-constant.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEINV
member.summary: 05158 TLK INV Invalid version string
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SET LOADVERSION command and an invalid version string has been found.
Remedy: Correct the SET LOADVERSION by specifying a valid version string.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEDLS
member.summary: 05159 TLK DLS DATABASE, LOGS, or SNAPSHOT expected
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a RESTORE command and the keyword DATABASE, LOGS, or SNAPSHOT was not specified after the RESTORE keyword.
Remedy: Correct the RESTORE command by specifying either a RESTORE of DATABASE, LOGS, or SNAPSHOT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENPR
member.summary: 05160 TLK NPR Non-printable character found
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an UNLOAD and non-printable data was found in a column that prevents it from being unloaded.
Remedy: This column cannot be unloaded. Try creating a view that excludes either this row or column and unload from that view.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEOOD
member.summary: 05161 TLK OOD Missing ON, OFF or DEFAULT keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to SET READONLY to something other than ON, OFF, or DEFAULT.
Remedy: Correct the SET READONLY command by properly specifying either ON, OFF, or DEFAULT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMSN
member.summary: 05162 TLK MSN Missing server name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SHOW DATABASES command with the ON SERVER clause and the server name was been found.
Remedy: Correct the SHOW DATABASES command by properly specifying a valid server name such as "SHOW DATABASE ON SERVER myserver".

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENCN
member.summary: 05163 TLK NCN No CONNECTs done yet: this command requires a database connection
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SQLTalk command that requires a valid connection to a specific database.
Remedy: Perform a connect operation or enter SQLTalk by entering the database name, user name, and password to establish a connection to a database. To get this error, you probably entered SQLTalk with the SQLTalk NOCONNECT option and are now attempting a command that requires a valid connection.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECAB
member.summary: 05164 TLK CAB Command aborted due to user's instruction
member.remarks:
Reason: Command has been terminated via user intervention.
Remedy: None. Informational only. The command was stopped at the user's request.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEPEP
member.summary: 05165 TLK PEP Prepare expected before fetch
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to fetch data and no SQL statement has been compiled.
Remedy: PREPARE an SQL statement before doing a PERFORM or FETCH operation.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENOP
member.summary: 05166 TLK NOP NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEUWF
member.summary: 05167 TLK UWF NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEFWF
member.summary: 05168 TLK FWF File write failure
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to write to a file and a disk write failure has occurred.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the disk write failure. Most commonly, it may be because you have run out of available disk space. If sufficient disk space is available, then run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the current operating system to verify the status of the disk.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEICH
member.summary: 05169 TLK ICH Invalid character
member.remarks:
Reason: An invalid character has been found in the input stream.
Remedy: Correct invalid character.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENIW
member.summary: 05170 TLK NIW This feature is not supported in Windows
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a DOS ($) command or attempting to EDIT a file from within SQLTalk and these features are not supported under the Microsoft Windows environment.
Remedy: None. DOS commands and the EDIT command are not supported from SQLTalk under Microsoft Windows.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEUDS
member.summary: 05171 TLK UDS UNLOAD DATABASE only supported for SQLBase
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMEQ
member.summary: 05172 TLK MEQ Missing end quote
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMCM
member.summary: 05173 TLK MCM Missing comma separator
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIVC
member.summary: 05174 TLK IVC Code page is not same, check your SQL.INI file and country.sql
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMSF
member.summary: 05175 TLK MSF Database session not exist, must have spool file name
member.remarks:
Reason: Invoked SQLTalk with the NOCONNECT option (i.e., the database connection does not exist) and the spool file name is not specified.
Remedy: Specify spool file name or make a database connection before issuing the command SET SPOOL ON.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKERCV
member.summary: 05176 TLK RCV Database is active with RECOVERY ON
member.remarks:
Reason: RECOVERY can be disabled only before the database has been changed.
Remedy: SET RECOVERY must be the first command in an SQLTALK session.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEICL
member.summary: 05177 TLK ICL Invalid client name
member.remarks:
Reason: The specified client name is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the command by specifying a valid client name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIPN
member.summary: 05178 TLK IPN Invalid process number
member.remarks:
Reason: The specified process number is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the command by specifying a valid process number.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEISE
member.summary: 05179 TLK ISE Invalid sqlset command
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an SQLSET command and the command type indicated by the keyword immediately following the SQLSET is invalid or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the SQLSET command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIGE
member.summary: 05180 TLK IGE Invalid sqlget command
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an SQLGET command and the command type indicated by the keyword immediately following the SQLGET is invalid or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the SQLGET command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIGS
member.summary: 05181 TLK IGS Invalid sqlgsi flag
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an SQLGSI command and the flag type indicated by the keyword immediately following the SQLGSI is invalid or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the SQLGSI command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKELIM
member.summary: 05182 TLK LIM Transaction outcome is unknown.
member.remarks:
Reason: The user attempted to COMMIT a distributed transaction. But due to an error that occurred during a very narrow window in the distributed commit protocol, the transaction state is unknown -- it may have either committed or aborted.
Remedy: None. The final arbitrator for the transaction state is the commit-server. The individual databases involved in the transaction will automatically contact the commit-server and resolve the status of the transaction one way or the other -- but they will be consistent with each other.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEIPT
member.summary: 05183 TLK IPT Invalid participant name
member.remarks:
Reason: The user attempted to set FIRSTPARTICIPANT to a non-existent participant.
Remedy: Ensure that the participant is part of a distributed transaction.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEDTS
member.summary: 05184 TLK DTS Distributed transaction not started.
member.remarks:
Reason: The user attempted to execute a command without starting a distributed transaction.
Remedy: Ensure that a distributed transaction is started.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMSC
member.summary: 05185 TLK MSC Stored command cannot be found.
member.remarks:
Reason: Command is missing from SYSCOMMANDS.
Remedy: Check spelling of command name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEPER
member.summary: 05186 TLK PER Perform must come after a prepare with planonly on
member.remarks:
Reason: Perform must be issued with planonly off
Remedy: Set planonly off

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEBCI
member.summary: 05187 TLK BCI Syntax for BEGIN CONNECTION is invalid.
member.remarks:
Reason: BEGIN CONNECTION must have a connection name optionally followed by dbname/userid/password.
Remedy: Reenter as BEGIN CONNECTION <connection> [dbname/uid/pwd]

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEBCE
member.summary: 05188 TLK BCE Connection Handle exists.
member.remarks:
Reason: BEGIN CONNECTION must specify a Connection Handle already exists.
Remedy: Provide a different Connection Handle name or end existing Connection name and reenter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKELTL
member.summary: 05189 TLK LTL Identifier too long
member.remarks:
Reason: This identifier cannot exceed 64 characters in length.
Remedy: Correct identifier.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKENIL
member.summary: 05190 TLK NIL This feature is not supported in Linux
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a command which is not supported under the Linux environment.
Remedy: None. This command is not supported from SQLTalk under Linux.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEUBC
member.summary: 05191 TLK UBC Conversion to Unicode Failed
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to read a line of input data and the data fails conversion to Unicdoe.
Remedy: Examine the data and correct any invalid data.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECHS
member.summary: 05192 TLK CHS Invalid characterset string
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SET CHARACTERSET command and an invalid characterset name has been found.
Remedy: Correct the SET CHARACTERSET by specifying a valid characterset name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECLL
member.summary: 05193 TLK CLL Invalid collation string
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SET COLLATION command and an invalid collation name string has been found.
Remedy: Correct the SET COLLATION by specifying a valid collation name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKECSN
member.summary: 05194 TLK CSN Commented string not ended properly
member.remarks:
Reason: A commented string has not been properly ended.
Remedy: Correct commented string.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLKEMTB
member.summary: 05195 TLK MTB Missing table name
member.remarks:
Reason: Table name was not specified.
Remedy: Specify the table name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE001
member.summary: 07001 NET 001 Illegal buffer length
member.remarks:
Reason: A SEND BROADCAST or SEND DATAGRAM cannot sent more than 512 bytes. For ADAPTER and SESSION STATUS, the buffer length specified was less than the minimum required.
Remedy: This buffer length is controlled by SQLBase and this problem should not occur. Report this problem to your local Unify certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE003
member.summary: 07003 NET 003 Invalid command
member.remarks:
Reason: The command code used was incorrect.
Remedy: Re-issue the correct command code.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETETMO
member.summary: 07005 NET TMO Command timed out
member.remarks:
Reason: This error has the following meanings: (1) For a CALL or for (2) ADAPTER STATUS, the system timeout period has elapsed. (3) For a SEND or for (4) RECEIVE, the timeout period specified for the CALL or LISTEN has elapsed. (5) For a HANG UP, the timeout period has expired for an outstanding SEND to complete.
Remedy: (1) For a CALL, try again later. (2) For an ADAPTER STATUS, make sure you are using a correct name. (3) For a SEND, the session has been terminated abnormally. Establish another session and re-issue a SEND. (4) For a RECEIVE, re-issue the command. (5) For a HANG UP, the session has been terminated abnormally.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE006
member.summary: 07006 NET 006 Message incomplete
member.remarks:
Reason: You received part of a message because your specified buffer length is not big enough to receive the full message.
Remedy: You must reissue another RECEIVE or RECEIVE ANY command to get the rest of the message before the remote computer times out. For ADAPTER STATUS, SESSION STATUS, RECEIVE DATAGRAM, and RECEIVE BROADCAST DATAGRAM, the remaining data is lost.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETEISN
member.summary: 07008 NET ISN Illegal local session number
member.remarks:
Reason: The session number (normally from the workstation) specified is not one of the active sessions.
Remedy: Specify an active session number when you issue a command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE009
member.summary: 07009 NET 009 No resource available
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough space available in the adapter for the session.
Remedy: Reboot the computer. This error has probably occurred because there are not enough sessions and commands specified for NETBios.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETECLO
member.summary: 07010 NET CLO Session closed
member.remarks:
Reason: The session has been closed from either the local or remote computer.
Remedy: None required. Informational only. This is notification for a pending SEND or RECEIVE command that the session has been closed. For a HANG UP, the session was closed by the remote computer.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE011
member.summary: 07011 NET 011 Command cancelled
member.remarks:
Reason: Notification received that the command was cancelled. If the command that was cancelled was a SEND or a CHAIN SEND, the session is abnormally terminated.
Remedy: No action is required.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETEDPL
member.summary: 07013 NET DPL Duplicate name in local name table
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to specify a name that is already in the local name table.
Remedy: Specify another name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE014
member.summary: 07014 NET 014 Name table is full
member.remarks:
Reason: Up to 16 names have already been added.
Remedy: Wait until a delete name is issued so an entry will become available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE015
member.summary: 07015 NET 015 Command completed, name has active sessions and is now de-registered
member.remarks:
Reason: The name to be deleted is active in a session now, but is de-registered. When the name is marked de-registered and has active sessions, it still occupies a slot in the table. Name is unusable.
Remedy: Close all sessions using this name for the DELETE command to complete.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETESTF
member.summary: 07017 NET STF Local session table full
member.remarks:
Reason: There are no available entries in the session table. The number of sessions is user-specified.
Remedy: The number of commands must be greater than the number of sessions. Use NETRESET /SHOW to verify the number. SQLBase needs one NETBios session for each database it is listening on, and one for each client workstation. It also needs a free session available when a user switches from one cursor to another.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETESOR
member.summary: 07018 NET SOR Session open rejected
member.remarks:
Reason: No LISTEN command is outstanding on the remote computer. This problem may stem from using the Novell NETBios and Microsoft Windows. You may be able to connect to SQLBase from Microsoft Windows in standard mode but not when in enhanced mode.
Remedy: Wait until a LISTEN is issued on the remote computer. Many variables may be involved including the network card (type and brand), IRQ, client workstation computer speed, database server computer speed and which versions of network drivers. If you slow down the database server computer, you can verify that this is the problem. Changing network cards and/or IRQ's might solve the problem. The best solution for Novell customers is to get Novell's NETBios 3.01 rev F or later and the latest versions of IPX and NET3 (at least rev d). Moving to MS Windows 3.0A or later may also help.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE019
member.summary: 07019 NET 019 Illegal name number
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid name number.
Remedy: You must use the original name number that was assigned to the name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETECFN
member.summary: 07020 NET CFN Cannot find name called or no answer
member.remarks:
Reason: The call name specified cannot be found or did not answer. This problem may stem from using the Novell NETBios and Microsoft Windows. You may be able to connect to SQLBase from Microsoft Windows in standard mode but not when in enhanced mode.
Remedy: Verify that the call name used is correct. Retry with the correct or a different call name or reissue if the remote computer is busy. Many variables may be involved including the network card (type and brand), IRQ, client workstation computer speed, database server computer speed and which versions of network drivers. If you slow down the database server computer, you can verify that this is the problem. Changing network cards and/or IRQ's might solve the problem. The best solution for Novell customers is to get Novell's NETBios 3.01 rev F or later and the latest versions of IPX and NET3 (at least rev d). Moving to MS Windows 3.0A or later may also help.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE021
member.summary: 07021 NET 021 Name not found, cannot specify *, or 00H
member.remarks:
Reason: The specified name was not in the table or an asterisk or 00H was in column 1 of the name field.
Remedy: An asterisk or 00H in column 1 is not allowed. Retry with another name and verify that it is the correct name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE022
member.summary: 07022 NET 022 Name in use on remote adapter
member.remarks:
Reason: Unique names can only be used once on the network.
Remedy: Specify another name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE023
member.summary: 07023 NET 023 Name was deleted
member.remarks:
Reason: This occurs when a name is deleted and there are no outstanding LISTEN, RECEIVE ANY, RECEIVE DATAGRAM, or RECEIVE BROADCAST DATAGRAM commands for that name.
Remedy: No action required.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETESEA
member.summary: 07024 NET SEA Session ended abnormally
member.remarks:
Reason: Either the remote computer is powered off, the cable link is broken, the session SEND or CHAIN SEND has timed out, or the SEND or CHAIN SEND was cancelled, or a HANG UP timed out waiting for a SEND to complete.
Remedy: Check the remote end for status and check the cable. For a SEND or CHAIN SEND, or RECEIVE or RECEIVE ANY, re-establish the session.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE025
member.summary: 07025 NET 025 Name conflict detected
member.remarks:
Reason: Network protocol has detected two or more identical names on the network.
Remedy: Everyone on the network should delete that name immediately.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE026
member.summary: 07026 NET 026 Incompatible remote device
member.remarks:
Reason: Unexpected protocol packet received.
Remedy: Verify that all units on the network agree with the network protocols.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE033
member.summary: 07033 NET 033 Interface busy
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to call the BIOS out of an interrupt handler routine in process.
Remedy: Return from the interrupt handler and try again later.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE034
member.summary: 07034 NET 034 Too many commands outstanding
member.remarks:
Reason: The maximum number of commands are outstanding.
Remedy: If not at maximum number, refer to RESET. If at maximum number, retry at a later time.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE035
member.summary: 07035 NET 035 Invalid adapter number
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to specify a number other than 00H or 01H.
Remedy: Specify either 00H for the first adapter or 01H if you have and want to use the second adapter. Correct the number and try again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETECDC
member.summary: 07036 NET CDC Command completed while cancel occurring
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to cancel a command that already completed, or never existed.
Remedy: No action required.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE037
member.summary: 07037 NET 037 Reserved name specified
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE038
member.summary: 07038 NET 038 Command not valid to cancel
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to cancel a command that is invalid to cancel.
Remedy: See CANCEL command for the list of commands not valid to cancel.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETENPR
member.summary: 07255 NET NPR In progress
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETENNF
member.summary: 07257 NET NNF Network not functioning
member.remarks:
Reason: A network adapter has not been found.
Remedy: Verify that the network adapter is available in this computer. Check that the network adapter is properly installed. Is this computer connected to a network? Try increasing the number of NETBios sessions and commands.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETEINP
member.summary: 07258 NET INP Invalid network pointer
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE500
member.summary: 07500 NET 500 DBGATEWY local session table full. Call systems programmer.
member.remarks:
Reason: There are not enough NETBios sessions to keep all of the database name listens outstanding.
Remedy: Verify that enough sessions and commands have configured on the gateway machine.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE501
member.summary: 07501 NET 501 APPC/PC allocation failure, no retry possible
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE502
member.summary: 07502 NET 502 APPC/PC allocation failure, try again later
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.summary: 07503 NET 503 APPC/PC allocation failure, bad userid/password
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.summary: 07505 NET 505 APPC/PC attach PU failure
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.summary: 07507 NET 507 APPC/PC receive data failure

member.summary: 07509 NET 509 APPC/PC attach DLC failure

Reason: This error is currently undocumented.

member.summary: 07510 NET 510 APPC/PC transaction program ending failure
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.summary: 07511 NET 511 APPC/PC transaction program initiating failure
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.summary: 07512 NET 512 APPC/PC change number of sessions failure
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.summary: 07513 NET 513 APPC/PC detach LU failure

Reason: This error is currently undocumented.

member.summary: 07515 NET 515 APPC/PC deallocate failure
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.

member.summary: 07516 NET 516 APPC/PC unknown failure; turn on verbose tracing
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.summary: 07517 NET 517 APPC/PC not dialed to a host
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.
