member.summary: 07518 NET 518 APPC/PC no more host sessions available
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETE519
member.summary: 07519 NET 519 APPC/PC Unrecoverable error encountered with the host
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETECAA
member.summary: 07600 NET CAA Cannot allocate adapter status structure
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETECAN
member.summary: 07601 NET CAN Cannot allocate network control block
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETENBS
member.summary: 07602 NET NBS Network buffer is too small
member.remarks:
Reason: Mostly likely caused by a lack of real memory at the client workstation computer.
Remedy: Provide more real memory at the client workstation computer. This could be accomplished by physically adding more memory to the client workstation computer or by removing other resources that are using the real memory of the client workstation computer.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NETECRM
member.summary: 07603 NET CRM Cannot allocate real memory
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough real memory to hold network adapter information.
Remedy: Check available real memory at the failing computer. Attempt to make more real memory available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOECCF
member.summary: 08001 FIO CCF Cannot commit file
member.remarks:
Reason: The database system is attempting to flush a file and update its directory but a file error has been detected.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOECAD
member.summary: 08002 FIO CAD NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOEFME
member.summary: 08003 FIO FME INTERNAL USE ONLY - Max file map entries exceeded
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOEOOM
member.summary: 08004 FIO OOM Out of memory at the database computer
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOECGD
member.summary: 08005 FIO CGD NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOECFN
member.summary: 08006 FIO CFN Cannot find file
member.remarks:
Reason: Using DIRECTIO the database server cannot find a database file.
Remedy: Determine why the database file cannot be found.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOEIFN
member.summary: 08007 FIO IFN Invalid file name
member.remarks:
Reason: Using DIRECTIO the database server has determined that the database file name is invalid.
Remedy: Correct database file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOECFD
member.summary: 08008 FIO CFD Cannot find directory
member.remarks:
Reason: Using DIRECTIO the database server cannot find the database subdirectory.
Remedy: Determine why the database subdirectory cannot be found.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOECOF
member.summary: 08009 FIO COF Cannot open file
member.remarks:
Reason: Using DIRECTIO the database server cannot open the database file.
Remedy: Determine why the database file cannot be opened.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOEICN
member.summary: 08010 FIO ICN Invalid cluster number
member.remarks:
Reason: Using DIRECTIO the database server detected an invalid cluster number.
Remedy: Determine why a bad cluster was read. For more detailed information, see the DOS technical reference about clusters and cluster numbers.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOENMS
member.summary: 08011 FIO NMS Not in map space
member.remarks:
Reason: Using DIRECTIO the database server is attempting to look up the logical sector requested in the file map to determine the physical sector equivalent and run length in number of sectors and the logical sector requested has not been found in the map space. Each map entry contains the relative and physical sector number.
Remedy: Determine why the logical sector is not in the map space. For more detailed information, see the DOS technical reference about logical sectors and map space.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOECRD
member.summary: 08012 FIO CRD Cannot retrieve disk buffer
member.remarks:
Reason: Using DIRECTIO the database server is attempting to retrieve the next FAT (File Allocation Table) entry from the FAT table and it cannot find the disk buffer. DIRECTIO works with 12-bit and 16-big FATs. Depending on whether a 12-bit or 16-bit FAT is in the sector, it extracts the FAT entry.
Remedy: Determine why the disk buffer cannot be retrieved. For more detailed information on FAT tables, see the DOS technical reference on how to access the FAT. Also, if you are redirecting your files to a network drive, do not load the redirectors and try again without using the network drive.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOECGI
member.summary: 08013 FIO CGI Cannot get information
member.remarks:
Reason: Using DIRECTIO the database server is trying to get directory information on an open file and the system cannot obtain the necessary information. The database is attempting to determine the file size, attributes, and starting cluster number.
Remedy: Determine why the required information could not be obtained. For more detailed info, see the DOS technical reference on how to obtain this information. This error has frequently occurred when upgrading from one operating system to another. If you have upgraded your operating system lately, DIRECTIO may not be compatible with this version of your new operating system.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOEITG
member.summary: 08014 FIO ITG Integrity error
member.remarks:
Reason: SQLBase has detected a security CRC error in the database.
Remedy: The database is in a secure mode, and is protected against tampering. The database appears to have been illicitly modified.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOEDME
member.summary: 08015 FIO DME Disk mapping error
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOECID
member.summary: 08016 FIO CID NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOEDIW
member.summary: 08017 FIO DIW Unable to use DIRECTIO
member.remarks:
Reason: The database system has determined DIRECTIO cannot be used on the database server computer. More generally, this means that SQLBase has examined the specified disk drive, and SQLBase cannot determine what the file structure looks like. This could potentially happen by having a non-standard disk extender installed such as SPEEDSTORE. Also, the file structure may be corrupted and can be fixed by running CHKDSK.
Remedy: Determine why the database server computer cannot use DIRECTIO. Set the configuration DIRECTIO off, that is, DIRECTIO=0.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOECTF
member.summary: 08018 FIO CTF Cannot create DIRECTIO test file
member.remarks:
Reason: The database system is testing whether DIRECTIO can be used on the database server computer and a test file cannot be created.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the create failure. Run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the current operating system to verify the status of disk. Verify that sufficient disk space is available and verify that the number of files allowed open for the operating system permits the additional file, that is, check the FILES= configuration parameter setting.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOEWTF
member.summary: 08019 FIO WTF Cannot write DIRECTIO test file
member.remarks:
Reason: The database system is testing whether DIRECTIO can be used on the database server computer and a test file cannot be written.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the disk write failure. Most commonly, it may be because you have run out of available disk space. If sufficient disk space is available, then run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the current operating system to verify the status of the disk.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOERTF
member.summary: 08020 FIO RTF NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOELTF
member.summary: 08021 FIO LTF Cannot close DIRECTIO test file
member.remarks:
Reason: The database system is testing whether DIRECTIO can be used on the database server computer and a test file cannot be closed.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the CLOSE file error. Run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the database server computer operating system to verify the status of the disk.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.FIOESTF
member.summary: 08022 FIO STF Cannot seek in DIRECTIO test file
member.remarks:
Reason: The database system is testing whether IRECTIO can be used on the database server computer and a seek within a test file has failed.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the seek file error. Run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the database server computer operating system to verify the status of the disk.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MEMEOUT
member.summary: 08101 MEM OUT Out of memory for allocation
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MEMEBIG
member.summary: 08102 MEM BIG Requested memory size too big for allocation
member.remarks:
Reason: Involved string would require too much memory for concatenation.
Remedy: Reduce memory requirement to less than 64K bytes.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PCGENPC
member.summary: 08201 PCG NPC No procedure command found
member.remarks:
Reason: The procedure does not have any command in it.
Remedy: Add appropriate commands in the ACTIONS section.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PCGECFF
member.summary: 08202 PCG CFF Cannot find function
member.remarks:
Reason: Cannot find internal function.
Remedy: This error should not occur. Call Gupta Technical support for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PCGEDOC
member.summary: 08203 PCG DOC Duplicate ON clause
member.remarks:
Reason: Duplicate ON clause was seen.
Remedy: This error should not occur. Call Gupta Technical support for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PCGENLD
member.summary: 08204 PCG NLD No LOOP defined
member.remarks:
Reason: BREAK command is used without a prior defined LOOP.
Remedy: Check the program and make sure that the LOOP command is used before BREAK command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PCGENPW
member.summary: 08205 PCG NPW No password can be retrieved for connecting to database
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempts to read the user's password failed.
Remedy: Check the password to the database and retry.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PCGENCS
member.summary: 08206 PCG NCS Only constant-string commands are allowed in STATIC procedure
member.remarks:
Reason: Embedded commands cannot be composed dynamically. They must be constant strings.
Remedy: Change offending command to a constant string.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PCGENDD
member.summary: 08207 PCG NDD No DDL statement allowed in the static stored procedure
member.remarks:
Reason: Putting a DDL (Data Definition Language) statement in static stored procedure is not allowed.
Remedy: Remove the DDL statement from the static stored procedure.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEINT
member.summary: 08301 SPE INT Internal error occurred in stored procedure execution
member.remarks:
Reason: An internal error has been detected.
Remedy: None.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEECAL
member.summary: 08302 SPE CAL Cannot allocate cursor array
member.remarks:
Reason: The stored procedure executor failed to allocate space for cursors.
Remedy: None.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEECOR
member.summary: 08303 SPE COR Cursor (number) out of range (connection probably never made)
member.remarks:
Reason: Large cursor number indicates no prior connection.
Remedy: Check for proper connection.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEECIS
member.summary: 08304 SPE CIS Cursor in invalid state
member.remarks:
Reason: The stored procedure executor detected an operation that is incompatible with the cursor's current state.
Remedy: Check proper use of cursors.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEECNN
member.summary: 08305 SPE CNN Cursor has no name and cannot be closed
member.remarks:
Reason: A cursor not opened cannot be closed.
Remedy: Check proper cursor usage.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEECNU
member.summary: 08306 SPE CNU Cursor not in use
member.remarks:
Reason: A cursor that is not in use cannot be operated on.
Remedy: Check proper cursor usage.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEECNM
member.summary: 08307 SPE CNM Cursor name is missing
member.remarks:
Reason: Cursor name must be supplied for an open operation.
Remedy: Check all SqlOpen statements.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEECIL
member.summary: 08308 SPE CIL Invalid cursor name length is detected
member.remarks:
Reason: The length of a cursor name must be within bounds.
Remedy: Check all cursor names.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEECOT
member.summary: 08309 SPE COT Cursor opened twice
member.remarks:
Reason: A cursor cannot be opened twice.
Remedy: Check proper use of all SqlOpen statements.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEECNE
member.summary: 08310 SPE CNE Cursor name already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: A cursor name must be unique.
Remedy: Check for duplicate cursor names in all SqlOpen statements.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEECIQ
member.summary: 08311 SPE CIQ Cursor in invalid query state
member.remarks:
Reason: A cursor operation must satisfy the current query state.
Remedy: Check proper use of cursor operations: e.g., SqlOpen must be preceded by SqlPrepare or SqlRetrieve.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEMNN
member.summary: 08331 SPE MNN Static embedded command has no name
member.remarks:
Reason: A static embedded command has its name missing, an internal error condition.
Remedy: None.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEOIO
member.summary: 08341 SPE OIO Addition/subtraction involving datetime failed
member.remarks:
Reason: A datetime addition or subtraction failed.
Remedy: Check all such additions or subtractions.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEOIU
member.summary: 08342 SPE OIU Invalid operand update detected
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempt to update a non-variable.
Remedy: Check for update of non-variables.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEOIZ
member.summary: 08343 SPE OIZ Insufficient operand size detected
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempt to update an operand of smaller size.
Remedy: Probably an internal error.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEOMD
member.summary: 08344 SPE OMD Missing operand detected
member.remarks:
Reason: Insufficient number of operands detected.
Remedy: (This is an internal error.)

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEOZL
member.summary: 08345 SPE OZL Zero length operand/result buffer detected
member.remarks:
Reason: All operands must have a valid length.
Remedy: (This is an internal error.)

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEDND
member.summary: 08350 SPE DND Procedure data does not meet the DATE/TIME format
member.remarks:
Reason: Data that is either being passed into a procedure as a parameter or is being returned from an external function does not conform to the required DATE/TIME format.
Remedy: Properly format such data for presenting to the procedure.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEENIR
member.summary: 08351 SPE NIR DATE/TIME parameter data not in allowed range
member.remarks:
Reason: DATE/TIME data is either too small or too large.
Remedy: Correct the value to fall between January 1, 0001 and December 31, 9999.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWBZ
member.summary: 08361 SPE WBZ Invalid buffer size detected
member.remarks:
Reason: A buffer must be large enough for receiving data.
Remedy: Check all buffer sizes used in stored procedure.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWDT
member.summary: 08362 SPE WDT Invalid database parameter type detected in Sql(Get|Set)Parameter
member.remarks:
or Sql(Get|Set)ParameterAll.
Reason: Only defined database parameters can be set.
Remedy: Check for proper use of Sql(Get|Set)Parameter(All).

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWDP
member.summary: 08363 SPE WDP Invalid database parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: Database parameters can only be set to predefined values.
Remedy: Check if proper values are provided for Sql(Get|Set)Parameter(All).

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWFN
member.summary: 08364 SPE WFN Number has a fractional part
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempt to use a fractional number instead of an integer.
Remedy: Correct the offending number.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWIE
member.summary: 08365 SPE WIE Invalid SqlExecute detected
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempt to execute without a successfully compiled command.
Remedy: Make sure the preceding command compiles correctly.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWII
member.summary: 08366 SPE WII Invalid INTO (variables) in command
member.remarks:
Reason: INTO variables are not allowed in command.
Remedy: Remove INTO and variables from command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWIL
member.summary: 08367 SPE WIL Invalid string length detected
member.remarks:
Reason: The length of a string must be within bounds.
Remedy: Check all strings used in stored procedure.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWIO
member.summary: 08368 SPE WIO Invalid operand detected
member.remarks:
Reason: Assignment must be done to a variable
Remedy: Possibly an internal error failing to detect above problem.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWIP
member.summary: 08369 SPE WIP Invalid numeric precision detected
member.remarks:
Reason: A variable's numeric precision does not match that of the corresponding SELECT column.
Remedy: Check all INTO variables used in stored procedure.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWIQ
member.summary: 08370 SPE WIQ Invalid command type detected
member.remarks:
Reason: SQLExists is not executing a SELECT query.
Remedy: None since this is an internal error.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWIS
member.summary: 08371 SPE WIS Invalid numeric scale detected
member.remarks:
Reason: A variable's numeric scale does not match that of the corresponding SELECT column.
Remedy: Check all INTO variables used in stored procedure.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWIT
member.summary: 08372 SPE WIT Invalid data type detected
member.remarks:
Reason: Assignment requires compatible types.
Remedy: Check for proper assignment.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWNG
member.summary: 08373 SPE WNG Number cannot be negative
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempt to use a negative number.
Remedy: Correct the offending number.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWNH
member.summary: 08374 SPE WNH Operand is not a sql handle
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempt to use a non-handle parameter.
Remedy: Correct the offending parameter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWMI
member.summary: 08375 SPE WMI Missing item after ':'
member.remarks:
Reason: Variable name is expected to follow a ':'.
Remedy: Check all bind or into lists in stored procedure.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWNI
member.summary: 08376 SPE WNI There is no immediate cursor
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt to perform an SqlClearImmediate without a prior SqlImmediate.
Remedy: Make sure an SqlClearImmediate is preceded by an SqlImmediate.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWNN
member.summary: 08377 SPE WNN Cursor has no name
member.remarks:
Reason: A cursor that has no name cannot be closed.
Remedy: Check all SqlClose statements for correctness.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWNP
member.summary: 08378 SPE WNP Cannot open a cursor without a prepared query
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempt to open a cursor without a prior prepared query.
Remedy: Check all SqlOpen statements for correctness.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWNS
member.summary: 08379 SPE WNS Cannot open a cursor on a non-select query
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempt to open a cursor without a prior prepared SELECT query.
Remedy: Check all SqlOpen statements for correctness.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWNV
member.summary: 08380 SPE WNV Named variable cannot be found
member.remarks:
Reason: The named variable has not been declared.
Remedy: Declare the variable.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWPZ
member.summary: 08381 SPE WPZ SQL function (number) parameter size is too big
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempt to use a (number) parameter whose size is too large.
Remedy: Correct the offending number.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWTM
member.summary: 08382 SPE WTM Type mismatch
member.remarks:
Reason: Assignment requires matching types
Remedy: Check for proper use of Sql(Get|Set)Parameter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWMV
member.summary: 08383 SPE WMV INTO variables are expected for executing given stored procedure
member.remarks:
Reason: INTO variables are not supplied as expected.
Remedy: Supply the INTO variables as required by the stored procedure.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWOB
member.summary: 08384 SPE WOB No or insufficient BIND variables
member.remarks:
Reason: BIND list does not supply enough variables..
Remedy: Correct BIND list to supply the required number of variables.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWTB
member.summary: 08385 SPE WTB Too many BIND variables
member.remarks:
Reason: Too many variables are found in BIND list.
Remedy: Correct BIND list to match the required number of variables.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWOI
member.summary: 08386 SPE WOI No or insufficient INTO variables
member.remarks:
Reason: INTO list does not supply enough variables..
Remedy: Correct INTO list to supply the required number of variables.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWTI
member.summary: 08387 SPE WTI Too many INTO variables
member.remarks:
Reason: Too many INTO variables are found in SELECT list.
Remedy: Correct INTO list to match the required number of variables.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEXIV
member.summary: 08388 SPE XIV Invalid parameter value detected
member.remarks:
Reason: Parameter value must be within bounds.
Remedy: Check parameter data for invalid value.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEXNS
member.summary: 08389 SPE XNS No space available for allocation
member.remarks:
Reason: Space is exhausted for allocation.
Remedy: None.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEXID
member.summary: 08390 SPE XID Invalid date/time value
member.remarks:
Reason: Parameter value cannot be recognized.
Remedy: Check data for invalid value.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWDD
member.summary: 08391 SPE WDD DDL construct not allowed in STATIC procedure
member.remarks:
Reason: DDL effects can only happen in DYNAMIC procedure.
Remedy: Remove the DDL construct or change to use DYNAMIC procedure.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEWWB
member.summary: 08392 SPE WWB Boolean value does not match parameter usage
member.remarks:
(Sql(Get|Set)ParameterAll)
Reason: TRUE is expected for number and FALSE for string.
Remedy: Correct the function's last (boolean) parameter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEEOT
member.summary: 08393 SPE EOT Procedure terminated by system or application rollback
member.remarks:
Reason: A system deadlock or application rollback terminated the procedure.
Remedy: Change the application or eliminate the deadlock problem.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEESIL
member.summary: 08394 SPE SIL Cannot change isolation level from within stored procedure
member.remarks:
Reason: A change in isolation level requires that active cursors be cleaned up including the cursor on which the stored procedure is being executed. This will not allow the stored procedure to continue executing.
Remedy: Change isolation level before executing the stored procedure.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEFPN
member.summary: 08395 SPE FPN NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEESTL
member.summary: 08396 SPE STL String too large
member.remarks:
Reason: The string variable has exceeded 64K in size. Currently SQLBase stored procedures support a maximum string size of 64K.
Remedy: Do not exceed 64K string size.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEDNN
member.summary: 08397 SPE DNN Procedure parameter data is not numeric
member.remarks:
Reason: Data provided for a numeric parameter is expected to be SMALLINT, INTEGER, DECIMAL, FLOAT, or NUMBER.
Remedy: Make sure the data is numeric.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEINR
member.summary: 08398 SPE INR Procedure numeric parameter data not in range
member.remarks:
Reason: An integer value is not within the acceptable range of INTEGER values.
Remedy: Correct integer value so that it is within the range of an acceptable INTEGER value. An INTEGER value can have up to 10 digits of precision: -2,147,483,648 to +2,147,483,647

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEMPV
member.summary: 08399 SPE MPV Data not fully supplied for all procedure parameter(s)
member.remarks:
Reason: (Initial/default) data must be provided for all parameters.
Remedy: Make sure all parameter data is presented at time of invocation.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEECNA
member.summary: 08400 SPE CNA LOAD/UNLOAD on CLIENT not allowed.
member.remarks:
Reason: LOAD/UNLOAD on CLIENT is currently not supported for stored procedures. Be aware that the default is 'on CLIENT'.
Remedy: Use LOAD/UNLOAD on SERVER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETGX
member.summary: 08401 EX2 TGX Trigger already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: Trying to execute a CREATE TRIGGER and the trigger name already exists.
Remedy: Modify the CREATE TRIGGER statement by using a unique name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETGD
member.summary: 08402 EX2 TGD Trigger does not exist
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to execute a DROP TRIGGER and the trigger name does not exist.
Remedy: Modify the DROP TRIGGER statement to use correct trigger name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EVNX
member.summary: 08403 EX2 VNX Event already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: Trying to execute a CREATE EVENT and the event name already exists.
Remedy: Modify the CREATE EVENT statement by using a unique name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EVND
member.summary: 08404 EX2 VND Event does not exist
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to execute a DROP EVENT and the event name does not exist.
Remedy: Modify the DROP EVENT statement to use correct event name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EMUT
member.summary: 08405 EX2 MUT Too many triggers for event/time/frequency
member.remarks:
Reason: Trying to exceed the maximum allowed triggers on a table for the same event (Insert, Update, Delete) time (before, after) and frequency (Row, Statement). The current limit is 16.
Remedy: Drop one of the triggers defined on this table.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETGA
member.summary: 08406 EX2 TGA Identical trigger already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: A trigger already exists on this table for the same event (Insert, Update, Delete), time (before, after) and frequency (Row, Statement) and ORDER value.
Remedy: Change the value of the ORDER clause.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETGC
member.summary: 08407 EX2 TGC Message deleted - Multiple trigger support
member.remarks:
Reason: Should never occur.
Remedy: None.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETGE
member.summary: 08408 EX2 TGE Message deleted - Multiple trigger support
member.remarks:
Reason: Should never occur.
Remedy: None.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EVN2
member.summary: 08409 EX2 VN2 Event already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: Trying to execute a CREATE EVENT and the event name already exists.
Remedy: Modify the CREATE EVENT statement by using a unique name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EVNM
member.summary: 08410 EX2 VNM Event does not exist
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to execute a DROP EVENT and the event name does not exist.
Remedy: Modify the DROP EVENT statement to use correct event name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETGK
member.summary: 08411 EX2 TGK Trigger defined on column
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to drop a column upon which one or more triggers are defined.
Remedy: Drop the dependent triggers before dropping the column.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETGL
member.summary: 08412 EX2 TGL Delete Cascade constraint already defined on table
member.remarks: Reason: Cannot create a Delete trigger on a table that has a Delete Cascade constraint defined on it. Remedy:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETGM
member.summary: 08413 EX2 TGM Delete Null constraint already defined on table
member.remarks: Reason: Cannot create an Update trigger on a column that has a Delete Null constraint defined on it. Remedy:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETGN
member.summary: 08414 EX2 TGN Delete trigger already defined on table
member.remarks: Reason: Cannot create a Delete Cascade constraint on a table that has a Delete trigger defined on it. Remedy:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETGO
member.summary: 08415 EX2 TGO Update trigger already defined on table
member.remarks: Reason: Cannot create a Delete Null constraint on a column if an Update trigger is already defined on it. Remedy:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETGP
member.summary: 08416 EX2 TGP Commit/Rollback/Savepoint not allowed from within triggered
member.remarks:
command
Reason: If an Insert/Delete/Update action in a transaction causes a trigger to be activated, the trigger is not allowed to do a commit/rollback/savepoint in that transaction.
Remedy: Commit/Rollback/Savepoint after Insert/Delete/Update completes.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETGQ
member.summary: 08417 EX2 TGQ Maximum nesting level exceeded
member.remarks:
Reason: The maximum number of nested levels has been exceeded. It is possible that a trigger is recursing on itself or is in a cycle.
Remedy: Check for cyclic or recursive triggers. Increase the maximum nesting level using the MAXNESTINGLEVEL keyword in SQL.INI.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EVGZ
member.summary: 08418 EX2 VGZ The value being set should be greater than zero
member.remarks:
Reason: This statistics column accepts a value that is greater than zero.
Remedy: Check the expression on the righthand side of the statistics column for possible errors in values of constants or bind variables. Correct it and retry.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EVPK
member.summary: 08419 EX2 VPK The columns inside parenthesis do not form a valid prefix key
member.remarks:
Reason: The columns inside the parenthesis following the keyword DISTCOUNT must form a valid ordered partial or full subset of columns that constitute an ordered list of the index key columns.
Remedy: Check the names of columns and the order of occurrence inside the parenthesis against the index definition. Correct it and retry.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ENSC
member.summary: 08420 EX2 NSC This is a non-modifiable statistics column
member.remarks:
Reason: The columns inside the parenthesis following the keyword DISTCOUNT must form a valid ordered partial or full subset of columns that constitute an ordered list of the index key columns.
Remedy: Check the names of columns and the order of occurrence inside the parenthesis against the index definition. Correct it and retry.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EVEZ
member.summary: 08421 EX2 VEZ The value being set should be greater than or equal to zero
member.remarks:
Reason: This statistics column accepts a value greater than or equal to zero.
Remedy: Check the expression on the righthand side of statistics column for possible errors in values of constants or bind variables. Correct it and retry.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EOHM
member.summary: 08422 EX2 OHM Out of heap memory during execution of the command.
member.remarks:
Reason: The command is unable to acquire heap memory to process.
Remedy: Re-submit when more memory is available

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EODB
member.summary: 08423 EX2 ODB You are not an owner, or a creator, or a DBA.
member.remarks:
Reason: UPDATE STATISTICS on TABLE or INDEX requires you to be the owner of the base table or have DBA privileges.
Remedy: Request a DBA or the creator of the base table to execute the command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETRT
member.summary: 08424 EX2 TRT The table cannot be renamed since a trigger references it.
member.remarks:
Reason: A trigger is referencing this table and hence cannot be renamed.
Remedy: Drop all triggers and rename the table. Recreate all the triggers after renaming the table.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETRC
member.summary: 08425 EX2 TRC Column cannot be renamed since a trigger exists on the table.
member.remarks:
Reason: The column belongs to a table on which a trigger is defined.
Remedy: Drop all triggers and rename the column. Recreate all the triggers after renaming the column.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETMC
member.summary: 08426 EX2 TMC Column cannot be modified since a trigger exists on the table.
member.remarks:
Reason: The column belongs to a table on which a trigger is defined.
Remedy: Drop all triggers and modify the column. Recreate all the triggers after modifying the column.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETDC
member.summary: 08427 EX2 TDC Column cannot be dropped since a trigger exists on the table.
member.remarks:
Reason: The column belongs to a table on which a trigger is defined.
Remedy: Drop all triggers and drop the column. Recreate all the triggers after dropping the column.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETFF
member.summary: 08428 EX2 TFF Trigger fetch failed.
member.remarks:
Reason: There was failure in fetching the output values from the triggered procedure.
Remedy: Make sure the output values match the column datatype and size correctly.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EDOP
member.summary: 08429 EX2 DOP Cannot delete function, dependent object <name> present.
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt has been made to delete an object with the DELETE RESTRICT rule and there are dependent objects. Hence the delete cannot succeed.
Remedy: Either change the delete rule or drop the dependent object first.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ESAC
member.summary: 08430 EX2 SAC Cannot modify statistics column, active statistics present.
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt has been made to modify the TABLESCAN or USECOUNT statistics columns, but active statistic data is still in memory.
Remedy: Disconnect all users from the database, then reconnect and try again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETMI
member.summary: 08431 EX2 TMI Too many indexes
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to create an index on a table, but there are already 255 indexes on this table.
Remedy: None. You cannot have more than 255 indexes per table.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ETMF
member.summary: 08432 EX2 TMF Too many foreign keys defined
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to add a foreign key to a table, but there are already 255 foreign keys defined on this table. Alternatively, attempting to create a foreign key dependency on a table and 255 such dependencies are already defined.
Remedy: None. You cannot have more than 255 foreign or dependant foreign keys per table.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ENLN
member.summary: 08433 EX2 NLN Can only change datatype of column from LONG VARCHAR<->LONG VARBINARY
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to change the datatype of a column to LONG VARCHAR or LONG VARBINARY, but the column is not of type LONG VARBINARY or LONG VARCHAR respectively.
Remedy: None. You can only change the datatype of a LONG VARCHAR column to LONG VARBINARY or vice versa.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EXRU
member.summary: 08434 EX2 XRU A user with name <name> already exists - cannot create a role with the same name as an existing user
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt was made to create a role with the same name as an existing user. A user and a role cannot have the same name.
Remedy: Use a different name for the new role.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EXUR
member.summary: 08435 EX2 XUR A role with name <name> already exists - cannot create a user with the same name as an existing role
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt was made to create a user with the same name as an existing role. A user and a role cannot have the same name.
Remedy: Use a different name for the new user.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ERAE
member.summary: 08436 EX2 RAE Role <name> already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt was made to create a role with the same name as an existing role.
Remedy: Use a different name for the new role.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ERNU
member.summary: 08437 EX2 RNU <name> is a role, not a user
member.remarks:
Reason: The name of an existing role was specified without using the ROLE keyword. The ROLE keyword must be used when identifying a role.
Remedy: Add the ROLE keyword or specify the name of a user.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EUNR
member.summary: 08438 EX2 UNR <name> is a user, not a role
member.remarks:
Reason: The name of an existing user was specified following the ROLE keyword. Only role names can follow the ROLE keyword.
Remedy: Remove the ROLE keyword or specify the name of a role.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ERCR
member.summary: 08439 EX2 RCR <name> is a role - cannot REVOKE CONNECT from a role
member.remarks:
Reason: REVOKE CONNECT cannot be used to drop roles, only users.
Remedy: Use DROP ROLE to drop a role.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ERNE
member.summary: 08440 EX2 RNE Role <name> does not exist
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to refer to a role that does not exist.
Remedy: Modify the statement to use an existing role.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ERNO
member.summary: 08441 EX2 RNO Cannot revoke non-granted execute privilege from role <name>
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to execute a REVOKE execute privilege from a role and the role does not have the specific named privilege granted.
Remedy: None. You cannot revoke an execute privilege from a role who does not have the specific named privilege.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EPNO
member.summary: 08442 EX2 PNO Privileges not owned for this role <name>
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to execute a REVOKE table privilege from a specific role and the role does not have the name privileges.
Remedy: None. You cannot revoke a table privilege that does not exist.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ENRG
member.summary: 08443 EX2 NRG The user <user> has not been granted role <role>
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to revoke a role from a user, but that role has not previously been granted to the user.
Remedy: None. You cannot revoke a non-granted role from a user.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2ERGU
member.summary: 08444 EX2 RGU The role <role> is currently granted to a user - cannot drop the role
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to drop a role, but the role has been granted to a user.
Remedy: Revoke the role from all users before dropping the role.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EUGR
member.summary: 08445 EX2 UGR The role <role> is currently granted to user <user> - cannot revoke connect from the user
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to drop a user, but the user has been granted a role.
Remedy: Revoke all roles from the user before revoking connect from the user.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EPER
member.summary: 08446 EX2 PER Privileges exist for role <name>
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to execute a DROP ROLE of a specific role and the named role has been granted table privileges.
Remedy: Revoke the role's privileges before attempting to drop the role.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EX2EDEU
member.summary: 08447 EX2 DEU Duplicate external user definition.
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to grant connect to an externally authenticated user with a duplicate external user name.
Remedy: External user names must be unique.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EVMEUIN
member.summary: 08501 EVM UIN INTERNAL USE ONLY - Event manager not initialized
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EVMEAIN
member.summary: 08502 EVM AIN INTERNAL USE ONLY - Event manager already initialized
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EVMEUEV
member.summary: 08503 EVM UEV INTERNAL USE ONLY - Unknown event
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EVMENEV
member.summary: 08504 EVM NEV INTERNAL USE ONLY - Event not allowed
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIETMO
member.summary: 09005 GCI TMO Command timed-out
member.remarks:
Reason: This error has the following meanings: (1) For a CALL or (2) for an ADAPTER STATUS, the system timeout period has elapsed. (3) For a SEND or (4) for a RECEIVE, the timeout period specified for the CALL or LISTEN has elapsed. (5) For a HANG UP, the timeout period has expired for an outstanding SEND to complete.
Remedy: (1) For a CALL, try again later. (2) For an ADAPTER STATUS, make sure you are using a correct name. (3) For a SEND, the session has been terminated abnormally. Establish another session and re-issue a SEND. (4) For a RECEIVE, re-issue the command. (5) For a HANG UP, the session has been terminated abnormally.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIEISN
member.summary: 09008 GCI ISN Illegal local session number
member.remarks:
Reason: The session number (normally from the workstation) specified is not one of the active sessions.
Remedy: Specify an active session number when you issue a command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIENRA
member.summary: 09009 GCI NRA No resource available
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: If you are using a 3Com LAN Manager, there is a file called \3OPEN\OS2WRKSTA\LANMAN\LANMAN.INI (fully qualified) that has a section in it like: [workstation] maxcmds=nn maxthreads=nn Make maxcmds=64 and maxthreads=32 and it may solve your problem. Another file that possibly is important is the file: \3OPEN\OS2WRKSTA\LANMAN\DRIVERS\ADAPTER\LDR.CFG (fully qualified) that has a line like: "program= c:\3open\os2wrksta\lanman\drivers\adapter\nba.exe /s32 /n32" where the /s is important because it tells the adapter card the number of session and the /n tells the adapter card the number of commands.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIECLO
member.summary: 09010 GCI CLO Session closed
member.remarks:
Reason: The session has been closed from either the local or remote computer.
Remedy: This notification can originate from SQLBase refusing a connection attempt due to an inappropriate level of security used in the transmission of messages between the client and the server. Check the SQL.INI declaration 'SECUREAPI' for both server and client.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIECMC
member.summary: 09011 GCI CMC Command cancelled
member.remarks:
Reason: Notification received that the command was cancelled. If the cancelled command was a SEND or a CHAIN SEND, the session is abnormally terminated.
Remedy: No action is required.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIEDPL
member.summary: 09013 GCI DPL Duplicate name in local name table
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to specify a name that is already in the local name table.
Remedy: Specify another name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIENDR
member.summary: 09015 GCI NDR Command completed, name has active sessions and is now de-registered
member.remarks:
Reason: The name to be deleted is active in a session now, but is de-registered. When the name is marked de-registered and has active sessions, it still occupies a slot in the table. Name is unusable.
Remedy: Close all sessions using this name for the DELETE command to complete.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIESOR
member.summary: 09018 GCI SOR Session open rejected
member.remarks:
Reason: No LISTEN command is outstanding on the remote computer. This is caused by network communication problems at the server.
Remedy: Check the network card, software, etc., at the remote server. Attempt to 'ping' the server address or access the server via the network, as appropriate for the network protocol and operating system(s) involved.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIECFN
member.summary: 09020 GCI CFN Cannot find name called or no answer
member.remarks:
Reason: The call name specified cannot be found or did not answer. This is caused by network communication problems at the server.
Remedy: Check the network card, software, etc., at the remote server. Attempt to 'ping' the server address or access the server via the network, as appropriate for the network protocol and operating system(s) involved.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIENMF
member.summary: 09021 GCI NMF Name not found, cannot specify *, or 00H
member.remarks:
Reason: The specified name was either not in the table or an asterisk in column 1 of the name field or 00H.
Remedy: An asterisk or 00H in column 1 is not allowed. Retry with another name and verify that it is the correct name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIENUR
member.summary: 09022 GCI NUR Name in use on remote adapter
member.remarks:
Reason: Unique names can only be used once on the network.
Remedy: Specify another name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIESEA
member.summary: 09024 GCI SEA Session ended abnormally
member.remarks:
Reason: Either the remote computer is powered off, the cable link is broken, the session SEND or CHAIN SEND has timed out, or the SEND or CHAIN SEND was cancelled, or a HANG UP timed out waiting for a SEND to complete.
Remedy: Check the remote end for status and check the cable. For a SEND or CHAIN SEND, or RECEIVE or RECEIVE ANY, re-establish the session.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIENMC
member.summary: 09025 GCI NMC Name conflict detected
member.remarks:
Reason: Network protocol has detected two or more identical names on the network.
Remedy: Everyone on the network should delete that name immediately.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIEIRD
member.summary: 09026 GCI IRD Incompatible remote device
member.remarks:
Reason: Unexpected protocol packet received.
Remedy: Verify that all units on the network agree with the network protocols. Check the SQL.INI 'secureapi' settings for both the server and client.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIESEN
member.summary: 09028 GCI SEN Session ended normally
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIECDC
member.summary: 09036 GCI CDC Command completed during cancel
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to cancel a command that already completed, or never existed.
Remedy: No action required.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIERNS

member.remarks:

Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIENVC
member.summary: 09038 GCI NVC Command not valid to cancel
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to cancel a command that is invalid to cancel.
Remedy: See CANCEL command for the list of commands not valid to cancel.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIEPND
member.summary: 09255 GCI PND Pending completion
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIENNF
member.summary: 09256 GCI NNF Network not functioning
member.remarks:
Reason: A network adapter has not been found.
Remedy: Verify that the network adapter is available in this computer. Check that the network adapter is properly installed. Is this computer connected to a network? Try increasing the number of NETBios sessions and commands.

member.remarks:

Remedy: Start the server. If the condition persists, check your client and server sql.ini and make sure the same communication DLLs are being loaded.

member.remarks:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIENCD
member.summary: 09275 GCI NCD No COMDLL configuration parameter specified
member.remarks:
Reason: No COMDLL specification has been found in SQL.INI. At least one COMDLL entry is required for Windows and NetWare environments.
Remedy: Insert the appropriate configuration file parameters which identify at least one communication protocol. For example, COMDLL=SQLWS32 is used for NT and Windows 98 and COMDLL=SQLWSOCK is used for Windows 3.x to identify WinSock as the communication protocol to be used. The location of these configuration parameters is dependent on the environment and platform. Please see documentation for further details.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIEOOS
member.summary: 09278 GCI OOS Out of sessions
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIEEOR
member.summary: 09279 GCI EOR Cannot find specified protocol entry
member.remarks:
Reason: The protocol name on the DBNAME or SERVERNAME entry in the SQL.INI configuration file has a misspelling of a protocol name when it is compared to the entry in the [xxxxx.DLL] section of the SQL.INI file. Or, the protocol name on the DBNAME or SERVERNAME entry in the SQL.INI file was not specified at all in the [xxxxx.DLL] section of the SQL.INI file.
Remedy: Verify the spelling of the protocol name on the DBNAME or SERVERNAME entry in the SQL.INI configuration file as compared to the entry in the [xxxxx.DLL] section of the SQL.INI file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIEGEN

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIEIVL
member.summary: 09283 GCI IVL Incorrect version of library
member.remarks:
Reason: The application program failed to load the correct version of the SQLBase API dynamic link library.
Remedy: Verify the correct SQL.INI is being loaded, and the CLIENTRUNTIMEDIR specifies a directory that matches the version of the API being loaded.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIEOBJ
member.summary: 09337 GCI OBJ NDS Object error
member.remarks:
Reason: It could be that adding or deleting or reading NDS object could have failed.
Remedy: Check the searchcontext (for client) or login ID and login Password or insertioncontext (for server) in SQL.INI.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIEPIU
member.summary: 09340 GCI PIU TCP/IP port has already been used
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to start SQLBase using winsock protocol and IP port is already in use by another SQLBase instance or some other process.
Remedy: Specify another valid port number inside ini file. (f.e [dbntsrv.ws32] listenport = 2157).

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIESSL
member.summary: 09341 GCI SSL The client requires SSL to connect via TCP
member.remarks:
Reason: SSL=FORCE was specified on the client, but the server is not configured for SSL connectivity.
Remedy: Configure the server for SSL connectivity or set SSL=OFF or SSL=NEGOTIATE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIERBK
member.summary: 09342 GCI RBK Woken for rollback
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GCIEEAF
member.summary: 09343 GCI EAF External authentication error.
member.remarks:
Reason: External authentication was attempted but failed.
Remedy: If authenticating against a domain user ensure that there is network connectivity to the domain controller.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GRPEBSI
member.summary: 09401 GRP BSI CHECK Failure (GRP BSI): <group page corrupted>
member.remarks:
Reason: CHECK DATABASE has discovered a problem in the database.
Remedy: If the CHECK DATABASE displays a message saying that a database object is damaged, drop that object. Otherwise, try unloading and reloading the database or restore from a backup copy of the database. You might also try unloading table by table to save as much of the database as possible.
