member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.IDXEBKL
member.summary: 09605 IDX BKL CHECK Failure (IDX BKL): <index page corrupted>
member.remarks:
Reason: CHECK DATABASE has discovered a problem in the database.
Remedy: If the CHECK DATABASE displays a message saying that a database object is damaged, drop that object. Otherwise, try unloading and reloading the database or restore from a backup copy of the database. You might also try unloading table by table to save as much of the database as possible.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.IDXEBEO
member.summary: 09606 IDX BEO CHECK Failure (IDX BEO): <index page corrupted>
member.remarks:
Reason: CHECK DATABASE has discovered a problem in the database.
Remedy: If the CHECK DATABASE displays a message saying that a database object is damaged, drop that object. Otherwise, try unloading and reloading the database or restore from a backup copy of the database. You might also try unloading table by table to save as much of the database as possible.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.IDXEDKU
member.summary: 09607 IDX DKU CHECK Failure (IDX DKU): <index page corrupted>
member.remarks:
Reason: CHECK DATABASE has discovered a problem in the database.
Remedy: If the CHECK DATABASE displays a message saying that a database object is damaged, drop that object. Otherwise, try unloading and reloading the database or restore from a backup copy of the database. You might also try unloading table by table to save as much of the database as possible.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.IDXESDT
member.summary: 09608 IDX SDT CHECK Failure (IDX SDT): <index page corrupted>
member.remarks:
Reason: CHECK DATABASE has discovered a problem in the database.
Remedy: If the CHECK DATABASE displays a message saying that a database object is damaged, drop that object. Otherwise, try unloading and reloading the database or restore from a backup copy of the database. You might also try unloading table by table to save as much of the database as possible.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.IDXEKIF
member.summary: 09609 IDX KIF CHECK Failure (IDX KIF): <index page corrupted>
member.remarks:
Reason: CHECK DATABASE has discovered a problem in the database.
Remedy: If the CHECK DATABASE displays a message saying that a database object is damaged, drop that object. Otherwise, try unloading and reloading the database or restore from a backup copy of the database. You might also try unloading table by table to save as much of the database as possible.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.IDXEWNE
member.summary: 09610 IDX WNE CHECK Failure (IDX WNE): <index page corrupted>
member.remarks:
Reason: CHECK DATABASE has discovered a problem in the database.
Remedy: If the CHECK DATABASE displays a message saying that a database object is damaged, drop that object. Otherwise, try unloading and reloading the database or restore from a backup copy of the database. You might also try unloading table by table to save as much of the database as possible.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.IDXELNS
member.summary: 09611 IDX LNS CHECK Failure (IDX LNS): <index page corrupted>
member.remarks:
Reason: CHECK DATABASE has discovered a problem in the database.
Remedy: If the CHECK DATABASE displays a message saying that a database object is damaged, drop that object. Otherwise, try unloading and reloading the database or restore from a backup copy of the database. You might also try unloading table by table to save as much of the database as possible.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.IDXEBOA
member.summary: 09612 IDX BOA CHECK Failure (IDX BOA): <index page corrupted>
member.remarks:
Reason: CHECK DATABASE has discovered a problem in the database.
Remedy: If the CHECK DATABASE displays a message saying that a database object is damaged, drop that object. Otherwise, try unloading and reloading the database or restore from a backup copy of the database. You might also try unloading table by table to save as much of the database as possible.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.IDXENLC
member.summary: 09613 IDX NLC CHECK Failure (IDX NLC): <index page corrupted>
member.remarks:
Reason: CHECK DATABASE has discovered a problem in the database.
Remedy: If the CHECK DATABASE displays a message saying that a database object is damaged, drop that object. Otherwise, try unloading and reloading the database or restore from a backup copy of the database. You might also try unloading table by table to save as much of the database as possible.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.IDXEIRF
member.summary: 09614 IDX IRF Database or object in the database is corrupt (IDX IRF)
member.remarks:
Reason: The database or an object in the database has been discovered to be inconsistent or lacking integrity.
Remedy: Run a CHECK DATABASE command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.IDXEIDF
member.summary: 09615 IDX IDF Database or object in the database is corrupt (IDX IDF)
member.remarks:
Reason: The database or an object in the database has been discovered to be inconsistent or lacking integrity.
Remedy: Run a CHECK DATABASE command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.IDXERTY
member.summary: 09616 IDX RTY Please retry
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.IDXEBKR
member.summary: 09617 IDX BKR CHECK Failure (IDX BKR): <index page corrupted>
member.remarks:
Reason: CHECK DATABASE has discovered a bad key range in a index page. This error is reported when the child index page key range violates the key range dictated by the parent index entry.
Remedy: The index is damaged and should be dropped and recreated. Or, try unloading and reloading the database, or restoring a backup copy of the database.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CHKEBAS
member.summary: 09701 CHK BAS CHECK Failure (CHK BAS): <page has bad allocation status>
member.remarks:
Reason: CHECK DATABASE has discovered a problem in the database.
Remedy: If the CHECK DATABASE displays a message saying that a database object is damaged, drop that object. Otherwise, try unloading and reloading the database or restore from a backup copy of the database. You might also try unloading table by table to save as much of the database as possible.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CHKELOP
member.summary: 09702 CHK LOP CHECK Failure (CHK LOP): <page has been lost> (REPAIRABLE)
member.remarks:
Reason: CHECK DATABASE has discovered a problem in the database.
Remedy: If the CHECK DATABASE displays a message saying that a database object is damaged, drop that object. Otherwise, try unloading and reloading the database or restore from a backup copy of the database. You might also try unloading table by table to save as much of the database as possible.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CHKEREP
member.summary: 09703 CHK REP Lost page reclaimed (CHK REP) - please run CHECK DATABASE again
member.remarks:
Reason: CHECK DATABASE WITH REPAIR has reclaimed at least one lost page.
Remedy: Run CHECK DATABASE again to ensure that the reclaim was successful.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSETMT
member.summary: 09801 PRS TMT Too many tables to join
member.remarks:
Reason: The number of tables attempting to be joined exceeds the SQLBase limit of 17 tables.
Remedy: Modify SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIST
member.summary: 09802 PRS IST Invalid statistics type
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to UPDATE STATISTICS and a keyword of INDEX, TABLE, or DATABASE is expecting immediately after UPDATE STATISTICS and it is missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the UPDATE STATISTICS command by properly specifying the keyword of INDEX, TABLE, or DATABASE immediately after UPDATE STATISTICS.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEICO
member.summary: 09803 PRS ICO Invalid object to CHECK
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CHECK command and the keyword immediately following the keyword CHECK is either missing or misspelled and should be either DATABASE, INDEX, or TABLE.
Remedy: Correct the CHECK command by properly specifying the keyword DATABASE, INDEX, or TABLE immediately after the keyword CHECK.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMEK
member.summary: 09804 PRS MEK Missing EXISTS keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SQL UPDATE statement and the CHECK EXISTS clause is being used but the keyword EXISTS is either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the UPDATE statement by properly specifying the keyword EXISTS immediately after the keyword CHECK.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSECNH
member.summary: 09805 PRS CNH Only CLUSTERED HASHED indexes supported
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE INDEX statement and the keyword CLUSTERED has been found but the keyword HASHED is either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the CREATE INDEX statement by properly specifying the keyword HASHED immediately after the keyword CLUSTERED. SQLBase currently only supports CLUSTERED HASHED indexes and does not support CLUSTERED indexes or HASHED indexes.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMUK
member.summary: 09806 PRS MUK Missing DEFAULT keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Trying a CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE statement and a column is attempting to be defined with possibly the NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT clause but the keyword DEFAULT is either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE statement by properly specifying the keyword DEFAULT immediately after the keywords NOT NULL WITH.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMDB
member.summary: 09807 PRS MDB Missing database name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE TABLE statement and the IN DATABASE clause is being used but the database name is missing.
Remedy: Correct the CREATE TABLE statement by properly specifying a valid database name immediately after the IN DATABASE keywords.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMTS
member.summary: 09808 PRS MTS Missing tablespace name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE TABLE statement and the IN clause is being used but the tablespace name is missing.
Remedy: Correct the CREATE TABLE statement by properly specifying a valid tablespace name immediately after the keyword IN.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEFUU
member.summary: 09809 PRS FUU FOR UPDATE OF not allowed with UNION
member.remarks:
Reason: The SELECT statement contains a FOR UPDATE OF clause within a UNION. A UNION cannot be specified for a SELECT statement that is to be used for update.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. A SELECT statement that is to be used for update cannot be defined with a UNION.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEFUO
member.summary: 09810 PRS FUO FOR UPDATE OF not allowed with ORDER BY
member.remarks:
Reason: The SELECT statement contains both a FOR UPDATE OF clause and an ORDER BY clause. An ORDER BY clause cannot be specified for a SELECT statement that is to be used for update.
Remedy: Correct the SQL SELECT statement. The implied function is not supported by DB2 or SQLBase. A SELECT statement that is to be used for update cannot be defined to fetch the rows of the object table in a specific order.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEFUP
member.summary: 09811 PRS FUP Invalid FOR UPDATE OF clause
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SELECT statement with possibly the FOR UPDATE OF clause but the keywords UPDATE or OF are either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the SELECT statement by properly specifying the FOR UPDATE OF clause.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSESFU
member.summary: 09812 PRS SFU SELECT FOR UPDATE must reference a single table
member.remarks:
Reason: The SELECT statement contains a FOR UPDATE OF clause and references more than one table. Multiple tables cannot be specified for a SELECT statement that is to be used for update.
Remedy: Correct the SQL SELECT statement. A SELECT statement that is to be used for update cannot be defined to fetch rows from multiple tables.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEUNA
member.summary: 09813 PRS UNA UNION ALL required for all SELECT statements
member.remarks:
Reason: UNION ALL indicates that all duplicate rows will not be eliminated. If UNION ALL is used on one SELECT statement it must be repeated for every SELECT statement in the entire statement.
Remedy: Correct the SELECT statement by properly specifying UNION ALL for all select statements.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSERCT
member.summary: 09814 PRS RCT Result column name can only be specified with top select statement
member.remarks:
Reason: The result column name can only be specified with the top SELECT statement.
Remedy: Correct the SQL SELECT statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSERCI
member.summary: 09815 PRS RCI Result column name must be identifier
member.remarks:
Reason: The result column name must be an identifier.
Remedy: Correct the SQL SELECT statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEETC
member.summary: 09816 PRS ETC Expression is too big
member.remarks:
Reason: A specified expression is too large.
Remedy: Modify the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMKY
member.summary: 09817 PRS MKY Missing KEY keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to use either the PRIMARY KEY or FOREIGN KEY clauses and the keyword KEY is either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the PRIMARY KEY or FOREIGN KEY clauses by properly specifying the keyword KEY.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIPC
member.summary: 09818 PRS IPC Invalid primary key column name
member.remarks:
Reason: The primary key column name is an invalid identifier.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by properly specifying a valid primary key column name identifier.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSECPK
member.summary: 09819 PRS CPK Column already defined for primary key
member.remarks:
Reason: The specified column is already defined for a primary key.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by properly specifying each column of a primary key only once.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSECNN
member.summary: 09820 PRS CNN Primary key column must be NOT NULL or NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT
member.remarks:
Reason: A primary key column has not been defined as NOT NULL or NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT. Each column in the primary key must be defined as either NOT NULL or NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT.
Remedy: Define all columns of the primary as either NOT NULL or NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEPCN
member.summary: 09821 PRS PCN Primary key column not defined
member.remarks:
Reason: A primary key column is not defined or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the primary key column specification my properly stating valid columns.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIFK
member.summary: 09822 PRS IFK Invalid foreign key name
member.remarks:
Reason: An invalid foreign key name has been specified.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by properly specifying a valid foreign key.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIFC
member.summary: 09823 PRS IFC Invalid foreign key column name
member.remarks:
Reason: An invalid foreign key column name has been specified.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by properly specifying a valid foreign key column name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEFKA
member.summary: 09824 PRS FKA Foreign key <name> already defined
member.remarks:
Reason: The specified foreign key name is already defined.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by properly specifying a unique foreign key name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSECFK
member.summary: 09825 PRS CFK Column already defined for foreign key
member.remarks:
Reason: The specified column is already defined for a foreign key.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by properly specifying each column of a foreign key only once.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEFCN
member.summary: 09826 PRS FCN Foreign key column not defined
member.remarks:
Reason: A foreign key column is not defined or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the foreign key column by properly stating valid columns.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMRK
member.summary: 09827 PRS MRK Missing REFERENCE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: A foreign key clause has a missing or misspelled REFERENCES keyword.
Remedy: Correct the foreign key clause by properly specifying the REFERENCES keyword.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIRN
member.summary: 09828 PRS IRN Invalid reference table name
member.remarks:
Reason: A foreign key clause has referenced an invalid table name.
Remedy: Correct the foreign key clause by properly specifying a reference to a valid table name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMFR
member.summary: 09829 PRS MFR Missing FOREIGN keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to ALTER a table and add a foreign key but the keyword FOREIGN is missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the ALTER TABLE statement by properly specifying the FOREIGN keyword.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEACN
member.summary: 09830 PRS ACN At least one column in the foreign key needs to allow a NULL value
member.remarks:
Reason: A FOREIGN KEY definition with the SET NULL option has not specified at least one column in the foreign key where NULL values are allowed.
Remedy: The ON DELETE SET NULL foreign key delete rule states that when a parent row is deleted, the foreign key values in all of its dependent rows should automatically be set to NULL. Specify at least one column in the foreign key that allows NULL values for the ON DELETE SET NULL foreign key delete rule to be specified. Or, change the foreign key delete rule.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSESRC
member.summary: 09831 PRS SRC Self-reference foreign key must have CASCADE delete rule
member.remarks:
Reason: A self-referencing foreign key must be specified with the CASCADE delete rule.
Remedy: Change the foreign key delete rule in the FOREIGN KEY clause.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEFDN
member.summary: 09832 PRS FDN Foreign key column data type not matching primary key column
member.remarks:
Reason: Each column definition of a foreign key does not match each column definition of the corresponding column in the primary key of the parent table.
Remedy: Correct the definition of the foreign key or primary so that each column definition of the foreign key matches each column definition of the corresponding column in the primary key of the parent table.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEFNC
member.summary: 09833 PRS FNC Foreign key number of columns not matching primary key
member.remarks:
Reason: The number of columns of a foreign key does not match the number of columns in the primary key of the parent table.
Remedy: Correct the definition of the foreign key or primary so that the number of columns in the foreign key is equal to the number columns in the primary key of the parent table and the data types of each corresponding column match.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSESDN
member.summary: 09834 PRS SDN Distinct paths must have same delete rules and cannot be SET NULL
member.remarks:
Reason: The delete rules cannot be different or cannot be SET NULL. This error is used to report that the delete rules specified in two FOREIGN KEY clauses of the CREATE TABLE statement are invalid because the table would be delete-connected to the same table through multiple paths involving relationships with different delete rules or with delete rules of SET NULL.
Remedy: Change the delete rule.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIDR
member.summary: 09835 PRS IDR Invalid delete rule
member.remarks:
Reason: An invalid, missing, or misspelled delete rule has been specified in a foreign key clause.
Remedy: Correct the foreign key clause by properly specifying a valid delete rule of RESTRICT, CASCADE, or SET NULL.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSETKF
member.summary: 09836 PRS TKF Too many concatenated key fields
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE INDEX, or definition of a PRIMARY or FOREIGN key and the number of key fields exceeds or matches the maximum allowed of 16 columns.
Remedy: Modify the key so that the number of columns is less than 16.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMDL
member.summary: 09837 PRS MDL Missing DELETE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to define a foreign key with the ON DELETE clause but the keyword DELETE is either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the foreign key definition ON DELETE clause by properly specifying the DELETE keyword.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEPND
member.summary: 09838 PRS PND Parent table not defined yet
member.remarks:
Reason: Defining a foreign key and the specified parent table does not exist.
Remedy: Create the parent table before defining the foreign key.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEPTI
member.summary: 09839 PRS PTI Parent table in incomplete state
member.remarks:
Reason: Defining a foreign key and specified parent table is still in an incomplete state. A parent table is considered incomplete until you generate its unique index.
Remedy: Create the parent table's unique index before attempting to create any foreign keys.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEPKA
member.summary: 09840 PRS PKA Primary key already specified
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to define a second primary key for a table.
Remedy: None. A table can only have one primary key.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEPKN
member.summary: 09841 PRS PKN Primary key not defined in parent table
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to define a foreign key and the primary key of the parent table is not defined.
Remedy: Define the primary key for the parent table before attempting to create a foreign key.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEEMP
member.summary: 09842 PRS EMP Exceeding maximum primary key length
member.remarks:
Reason: The specified primary key exceeds the maximum length (1200) allowed for a primary key.
Remedy: Modify the primary key so that it does not exceed the maximum allowable length of 1200.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEATS
member.summary: 09843 PRS ATS Use ALTER TABLE to create self-referencing foreign key
member.remarks:
Reason: A self-referencing foreign key can only be created with the ALTER TABLE statement.
Remedy: Use the ALTER TABLE statement to create a self-referencing foreign key.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSETDS
member.summary: 09844 PRS TDS Adding foreign key causes table delete-connected to itself
member.remarks:
Reason: Any table that is involved in a delete operation is delete-connected. If a referential cycle involves more than one table, any table in the cycle must not be delete-connected to itself. This restriction guarantees that the CASCADE rule will not cause widespread deletion of data.
Remedy: None. A foreign key cannot be specified that causes a table to delete-connect to itself.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSESFD
member.summary: 09845 PRS SFD Same column list in different foreign keys cannot have same parent
member.remarks:
Reason: The foreign key is not a unique foreign key reference. The specified foreign key has the same columns as an existing foreign key for the same table.
Remedy: Modify the foreign key table. If two foreign keys have the same columns, they must reference different tables.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEFRS
member.summary: 09846 PRS FRS Foreign key cannot reference system table
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to define a foreign key that references a system catalog table.
Remedy: None. Foreign keys cannot reference a system catalog table.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEICR
member.summary: 09847 PRS ICR Invalid cursor name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SQL INSERT statement with the ADJUSTING clause and the specified cursor name is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the SQL INSERT statement by providing a valid cursor name in the ADJUSTING clause of a cursor that has been properly named or opened.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEOOL
member.summary: 09848 PRS OOL Number of operands over system limitation
member.remarks:
Reason: Maximum number of operands in a function exceeds the SQLBase system limit of 256.
Remedy: Modify the SQL statement so that the SQLBase system limit of 256 operands is not exceeded.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEISV
member.summary: 09849 PRS ISV Invalid server command
member.remarks:
Reason: Most likely attempting an INSTALL DATABASE or DEINSTALL DATABASE command and the keyword DATABASE is either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the INSTALL or DEINSTALL command by properly specifying a valid DATABASE keyword immediately after the INSTALL or DEINSTALL keyword.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIDN
member.summary: 09850 PRS IDN Invalid database name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an ALTER DATABASE, CREATE DATABASE, INSTALL DATABASE, or DEINSTALL DATABASE and the specified database name is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by specifying a valid database name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIAR
member.summary: 09851 PRS IAR Invalid dbarea name <name>
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an ALTER DBAREA, ALTER STOGROUP, CREATE DBAREA, CREATE STOGROUP, or DELETE DBAREA and the specified dbarea name is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by specifying a valid dbarea name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIAF
member.summary: 09852 PRS IAF Invalid dbarea file name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an ALTER STOGROUP, CREATE DBAREA, or CREATE STOGROUP and the specified dbarea file name is not valid.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by specifying a valid file name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMZK
member.summary: 09853 PRS MZK Missing SIZE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an ALTER DBAREA or CREATE DBAREA and the expected SIZE keyword is either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by properly specifying the SIZE keyword.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEISG
member.summary: 09854 PRS ISG Invalid stogroup name <name>
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an ATLER DATABASE, ALTER STOGROUP, CREATE DATABASE, CREATE STOGROUP, DELETE STOGROUP, or SET DEFAULT STOGROUP and the storage group name is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by properly specifying a valid storage group name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEUSK
member.summary: 09855 PRS USK Missing USING keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE STOGROUP statement and the mandatory USING keyword is either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the CREATE STOGROUP statement by properly specifying the USING keyword. The correct syntax is: CREATE STOGROUP stogroup-name USING dbarea1, dbarea2, ...

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEISK
member.summary: 09856 PRS ISK Invalid SET type
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SET command with an incorrect set type.
Remedy: Correct the SET command by properly specifying the SET type.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSESGK
member.summary: 09857 PRS SGK Missing STOGROUP keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a SET DEFAULT STOGROUP statement and the mandatory keyword STOGROUP is either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the SET DEFAULT STOGROUP statement by properly specifying the mandatory keyword STOGROUP. The correct syntax is: SET DEFAULT STOGROUP [stogroup-name] where the stogroup-name is optional.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEASO
member.summary: 09858 PRS ASO Invalid ALTER STOGROUP option
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a ALTER STOGROUP statement and the keyword ADD or DROP has not been found.
Remedy: Correct the ALTER STOGROUP statement by properly specifying either ADD dbarea or DROP dbarea. The correct syntax is: ALTER STOGROUP stogroup-name ADD dbarea or: ALTER STOGROUP stogroup-name DROP dbarea

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEADO
member.summary: 09859 PRS ADO Invalid ALTER DATABASE option
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a ALTER DATABASE statement and the keyword STOGROUP or LOG has not been found.
Remedy: Correct the ALTER DATABASE statement by properly specifying either STOGROUP stogroup-name or LOG stogroup-name. The correct syntax is: ALTER DATABASE database-name STOGROUP stogroup-name or: ALTER DATABASE database-name LOG stogroup-name

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIDE
member.summary: 09860 PRS IDE Invalid DELETE command
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a DELETE and the delete object keyword is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the DELETE statement by properly specifying a valid delete object keyword to be deleted.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEABO
member.summary: 09861 PRS ABO System exit from abort command
member.remarks:
Reason: An ABORT command has forced a system exit.
Remedy: None. Informational only.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENDQ
member.summary: 09862 PRS NDQ DBAREA filename should not be specified in double quotes
member.remarks:
Reason: The DBAREA file name must not be specified in double quotes.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by properly specifying the DBAREA file name without double quotes.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEASL
member.summary: 09863 PRS ASL DBAREA size too large
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE DBAREA or ALTER DBAREA and the specified size in megabytes exceeds the maximum allowable size of 2048 megabytes.
Remedy: Correct the CREATE DBAREA or ALTER DBAREA statement to properly specify a valid size in megabytes not greater than 2048.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEUMI
member.summary: 09864 PRS UMI User error number must be greater than 0 and less than 32767
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an ALTER TABLE statement to add or modify a user defined error and the specified user error number is not a valid positive integer value greater than 0 and less than 32,767.
Remedy: Correct the ALTER TABLE statement by properly specifying a valid positive integer value when adding or modifying a user defined error greater than 0 and less than 32,767.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIUC
member.summary: 09865 PRS IUC Invalid user error class
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an ALTER TABLE statement to add, drop, or modify a user-defined error and the specified user error class is not a valid quoted string indicating that the error class is either 'DELETE_PARENT', 'UPDATE_PARENT', 'INSERT_DEPENDENT', or 'UPDATE_DEPENDENT'.
Remedy: Correct the ALTER TABLE statement by properly specifying a valid quoted string indicating a user define error class of either 'DELETE_PARENT', 'UPDATE_PARENT', 'INSERT_DEPENDENT', or 'UPDATE_DEPENDENT'.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMFN
member.summary: 09866 PRS MFN Missing foreign key name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an ALTER TABLE statement to add, drop, or modify a user-defined error and the foreign key name in the FOREIGN KEY clause is missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the ALTER TABLE statement by properly specifying a valid foreign key name in the FOREIGN KEY clause.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMPF
member.summary: 09867 PRS MPF Missing FOREIGN or PRIMARY keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an ALTER TABLE statement to add, drop, or modify a user defined error and the keyword PRIMARY or FOREIGN is missing or misspelled in the PRIMARY KEY or FOREIGN KEY clause.
Remedy: Correct the ALTER TABLE statement by properly specifying the keyword PRIMARY or FOREIGN in either the PRIMARY KEY or FOREIGN KEY clauses.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEEFN
member.summary: 09868 PRS EFN Foreign key name cannot exceed 36 characters
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to use a foreign key with a name greater than 36 characters.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by properly specifying a valid foreign key name that does not exceed 36 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSECOU
member.summary: 09869 PRS COU No check option allowed with UNION
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEVCR
member.summary: 09870 PRS VCR View column names required with UNION
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSECNS
member.summary: 09871 PRS CNS Command no longer supported
member.remarks:
Reason: The specified command is no longer supported.
Remedy: Use another command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSETMB
member.summary: 09872 PRS TMB Too many booleans in query
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the query parsing.
Remedy: Reduce the number of boolean expressions in the query, especially the size of any IN list.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMEX
member.summary: 09873 PRS MEX Missing Expression before [NOT] IN predicate
member.remarks:
Reason: An expression should precede the IN [NOT IN] predicate.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. The IN predicate has the general syntax of : expression [NOT] IN ....

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEITI
member.summary: 09874 PRS ITI Invalid global transaction ID
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMPT
member.summary: 09875 PRS MPT Missing PARTICIPANT keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMEN
member.summary: 09876 PRS MEN Missing END keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEDBK
member.summary: 09877 PRS DBK Missing DATABASE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMCO
member.summary: 09878 PRS MCO Missing COMMA keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEPTS
member.summary: 09879 PRS PTS Missing PARTICIPANTS keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBPT
member.summary: 09880 PRS BPT Bad protocol name
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSESLK
member.summary: 09881 PRS SLK Missing SLASH keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIPN
member.summary: 09882 PRS IPN Invalid number of participants
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSETMU
member.summary: 09883 PRS TMU Too many participants specified
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENEU
member.summary: 09884 PRS NEU Not enough participants specified
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEOOM
member.summary: 09885 PRS OOM Out of memory
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBOS
member.summary: 09886 PRS BOS Bad option specified
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEFMB
member.summary: 09887 PRS FMB Failure ID must be a positive non-zero number.
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.summary: 09888 PRS EWT Expecting keyword WITH
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.summary: 09889 PRS IET Invalid failure error type
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSECDN
member.summary: 09890 PRS CDN Event code must be a positive non-zero number
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMIN
member.summary: 09891 PRS MIN Missing IN keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: The IN keyword is missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBES
member.summary: 09892 PRS BES Bad error scope specified
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBEV
member.summary: 09893 PRS BEV Bad error event specified
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMCT
member.summary: 09894 PRS MCT Missing COUNT keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEECP
member.summary: 09895 PRS ECP EVERY <n-times> must be a positive non-zero number
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMCS
member.summary: 09896 PRS MCS Missing CSV keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIDS
member.summary: 09897 PRS IDS Invalid DB specification
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.
