member.summary: 09898 PRS MBA Missing ON, BEFORE or AFTER keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMAL
member.summary: 09899 PRS MAL Missing ALL keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMTR
member.summary: 09900 PRS MTR Missing TRANSACTIONS keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMFE
member.summary: 09901 PRS MFE Missing FORCE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEISS
member.summary: 09902 PRS ISS Invalid SET command
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid server SET command.
Remedy: Correct the statement to the SET DEFAULT STOGROUP statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMOT
member.summary: 09903 PRS MOT More than one source table specified in the unload/load command
member.remarks:
Reason: More than one source table is specified in the unload/load command when the unload/load format is ASCII or DIF.
Remedy: Only one source table can be unloaded at a time in ASCII or DIF format. Remove the extra tables from the command. These tables can be unloaded by calling the unload command repeatedly, with one table at a time.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENTB
member.summary: 09904 PRS NTB No table should be specified, if the load format is SQL
member.remarks:
Reason: If the load format is SQL, no table names should be specified.
Remedy: Remove the table name from the command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIFT
member.summary: 09905 PRS IFT Invalid load/unload format
member.remarks:
Reason: Load/Unload format should be one of SQL/ASCII/DIF format.
Remedy: Specify the correct format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENTU
member.summary: 09906 PRS NTU No table name(s) specified in unload
member.remarks:
Reason: If unload format is defined as one of SQL/ASCII/DIF format and ALL tables are not being unloaded, specific table names should be provided in the unload command.
Remedy: Give specific table name(s) to unload.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEICP
member.summary: 09907 PRS ICP Invalid compress option.
member.remarks:
Reason: If unload format is defined as one of ASCII/DIF format, COMPRESS option can not be specified. COMPRESS option is valid only when the unload format is SQL.
Remedy: Remove the COMPRESS option.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMIA
member.summary: 09908 PRS MIA Missing AT keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: The AT keyword is missing from a LOAD command START clause
Remedy: Correct SQL statement. LOAD command START clause is " LOAD ... START AT lineno".

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMLN
member.summary: 09909 PRS MLN Missing LINE number
member.remarks:
Reason: The line number is missing from a LOAD command START clause.
Remedy: Correct SQL statement. LOAD command START clause is " LOAD ... START AT lineno".

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMDT
member.summary: 09910 PRS MDT Missing destination table name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a LOAD ASCII and specifying a source file name but the destination table name is not specified.
Remedy: Modify the LOAD ASCII command. Destination table names are required when loading in ASCII format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEDVN
member.summary: 09911 PRS DVN Duplicate variable name
member.remarks:
Reason: A duplicate variable name is found.
Remedy: Check and change the duplicated variable name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIVE
member.summary: 09912 PRS IVE INTO variable already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: A duplicate INTO variable name is found.
Remedy: Check and change the duplicated INTO variable name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMLD
member.summary: 09913 PRS MLD Missing line delimiter
member.remarks:
Reason: A line delimiter is missing.
Remedy: Add a line delimiter after the line.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEDPS
member.summary: 09914 PRS DPS Duplicate PARAMETERS section
member.remarks:
Reason: A duplicate PARAMETERS section is found.
Remedy: Check and remove the duplicated PARAMETERS section.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENPS
member.summary: 09915 PRS NPS PARAMETERS section not allowed here
member.remarks:
Reason: A PARAMETERS section is not allowed here.
Remedy: Check and change the location of the PARAMETERS section.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEDLS
member.summary: 09916 PRS DLS Duplicate LOCAL section
member.remarks:
Reason: A duplicate LOCAL section is found.
Remedy: Check and remove the duplicated LOCAL section.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENLS
member.summary: 09917 PRS NLS LOCAL section not allowed here
member.remarks:
Reason: A LOCAL section is not allowed here.
Remedy: Check and change the location of the LOCAL section.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIPI
member.summary: 09918 PRS IPI Invalid indentation in PARAMETERS section
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid indentation is found in the PARAMETERS section.
Remedy: Check and change the indent in the PARAMETERS section.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEDAS
member.summary: 09919 PRS DAS Duplicate ACTIONS section
member.remarks:
Reason: A duplicate ACTIONS section is found.
Remedy: Check and remove the duplicated ACTIONS section.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEILI
member.summary: 09920 PRS ILI Invalid indentation in LOCAL section
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid indentation is found in the LOCAL section.
Remedy: Check and change the indent in the LOCAL section.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIAI
member.summary: 09921 PRS IAI Invalid indentation in ACTIONS section
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid indentation is found in the ACTIONS section.
Remedy: Check and change the indent in the ACTIONS section.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEUPC
member.summary: 09922 PRS UPC Unknown procedure command
member.remarks:
Reason: Unknown procedure command.
Remedy: Check and change the command in the procedure.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBMF
member.summary: 09923 PRS BMF BEGIN must be the first one
member.remarks:
Reason: BEGIN must be the first one in a command block.
Remedy: Check and move the BEGIN to the beginning of the command block.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSETMG
member.summary: 09924 PRS TMG Too many BEGINs
member.remarks:
Reason: Too many BEGINs in a command block.
Remedy: Check and remove the unnecessary BEGINs.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSETME
member.summary: 09925 PRS TME Too many ENDs
member.remarks:
Reason: Too many ENDs in the command block.
Remedy: Check and remove the unnecessary ENDS.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENAG
member.summary: 09926 PRS NAG No aggregate function
member.remarks:
Reason: An aggregate function is not allowed.
Remedy: Check and change the aggregate function.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEILN
member.summary: 09927 PRS ILN Invalid LOOP name
member.remarks:
Reason: An invalid LOOP name is found.
Remedy: Check and change the LOOP name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBVN
member.summary: 09928 PRS BVN Bad variable name
member.remarks:
Reason: An invalid variable name is found.
Remedy: Check and change the variable name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMCL
member.summary: 09929 PRS MCL Must be a variable
member.remarks:
Reason: The INTO clause must have variables.
Remedy: Check and change to variable names.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMHP
member.summary: 09930 PRS MHP Must have PROCEDURE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Missing PROCEDURE keyword.
Remedy: Check and add PROCEDURE keyword after ON.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEUPS
member.summary: 09931 PRS UPS Unknown procedure state
member.remarks:
Reason: An unknown procedure state is found.
Remedy: Check and change procedure state keyword after ON PROCEDURE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSECFF
member.summary: 09932 PRS CFF Cannot find function handler
member.remarks:
Reason: Cannot find the function handler.
Remedy: This is an internal error.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMVR
member.summary: 09933 PRS MVR Missing VARIABLES keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Missing VARIABLES keyword.
Remedy: Check and add the VARIABLE keyword.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBPN
member.summary: 09934 PRS BPN Invalid procedure name
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid procedure name.
Remedy: Check and change the procedure name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMNM
member.summary: 09935 PRS MNM Missing NAME keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Missing NAME keyword.
Remedy: Check and add the NAME keyword after PROCEDURE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEUVN
member.summary: 09936 PRS UVN Undefined variable name
member.remarks:
Reason: The variable name being referenced is not defined.
Remedy: Check and add the variable name to appropriate section.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBMP
member.summary: 09937 PRS BMP BEGIN keyword must be used before END
member.remarks:
Reason: An END is encountered before a BEGIN.
Remedy: Check and add a BEGIN keyword to the beginning of the block.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIPS
member.summary: 09938 PRS IPS Procedure section (name) expected
member.remarks:
Reason: Expecting a new procedure section name here.
Remedy: It is possible that the indent level has changed from that of the last statement. Check that the indentation is correct.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMIF
member.summary: 09939 PRS MIF Missing IF keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: An ELSE is used without an IF keyword.
Remedy: Check and add an IF keyword to the appropriate place.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIOU
member.summary: 09940 PRS IOU Invalid ON usage
member.remarks:
Reason: The ON keyword can be used on the first level in ACTIONS section.
Remedy: Check and move the ON command to the appropriate place on the first level.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEDLN
member.summary: 09941 PRS DLN Duplicate loop name
member.remarks:
Reason: Loop name has been defined.
Remedy: Check and change the loop name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEULN
member.summary: 09942 PRS ULN Unknown loop name
member.remarks:
Reason: Loop name is not defined.
Remedy: Check and change to the correct loop name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBBC
member.summary: 09943 PRS BBC Bad boolean constant
member.remarks:
Reason: The constant is not a boolean constant.
Remedy: Check and use the correct boolean constant.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEICI
member.summary: 09944 PRS ICI Invalid command indentation
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid command indentation.
Remedy: Check and change the indent of the command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEOBS
member.summary: 09945 PRS OBS Function <name> is now obsolete
member.remarks:
Reason: This function is now obsolete.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement and do not use this function.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEVTT
member.summary: 09946 PRS VTT STATIC procedure must be stored first
member.remarks:
Reason: A static procedure must be stored before execution.
Remedy: Store the procedure or change it to DYNAMIC.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMSQ
member.summary: 09947 PRS MSQ Missing SQLERROR keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: SQLERROR keyword is missing.
Remedy: Check the command and enter again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEHIH
member.summary: 09948 PRS HIH Error handler declared inside an error handler
member.remarks:
Reason: An error handler has been declared inside another error handler.
Remedy: Check the command and make sure that the error handler is not declared inside an error handler.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENRK
member.summary: 09949 PRS NRK No RECEIVE keyword here
member.remarks:
Reason: Illegal use of RECEIVE keyword outside the PARAMETERS section.
Remedy: Check the command and make sure the RECEIVE keyword is used only in the PARAMETERS section.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENSH
member.summary: 09950 PRS NSH No SQL HANDLE or FILE HANDLE in PARAMETERS section
member.remarks:
Reason: Illegal use of SQL HANDLE or FILE HANDLE in PARAMETERS section.
Remedy: Check the command and make sure that the SQL HANDLE and FILE HANDLE keywords are only used in the LOCAL VARIABLES section.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMDS
member.summary: 09951 PRS MDS Missing keyword DYNAMIC or STATIC after IS
member.remarks:
Reason: Keyword DYNAMIC or STATIC must be supplied after IS.
Remedy: Supply DYNAMIC or STATIC or remove IS after the procedure name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEDVC
member.summary: 09952 PRS DVC Duplicate values for correlation names detected
member.remarks:
Reason: OLD and NEW value correlation names must be distinct.
Remedy: Correct SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE TRIGGER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIVT
member.summary: 09953 PRS IVT Event name expected
member.remarks:
Reason: The event name specified in a CREATE EVENT or DROP EVENT statement is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. An event name can be a qualified or unqualified long identifier. The qualified form is a user ID followed by a period and a long identifier. An unqualified handler name in a SQL statement is implicitly qualified by the ID of the user who issues the statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEITG
member.summary: 09954 PRS ITG Trigger name expected
member.remarks:
Reason: The trigger name specified in CREATE TRIGGER or DROP TRIGGER statement is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. An event name can be a qualified or unqualified long identifier. The qualified form is a user ID followed by a period and a long identifier. An unqualified handler name in a SQL statement is implicitly qualified by the ID of the user who issues the statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIVP
member.summary: 09955 PRS IVP Procedure name expected
member.remarks:
Reason: The procedure name specified in an EXECUTE clause is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the EXECUTE clause. A procedure name can be a qualified or unqualified long identifier. The qualified form is a user ID followed by a period and a long identifier. An unqualified handler name in a SQL statement is implicitly qualified by the ID of the user who issues the statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMXK
member.summary: 09956 PRS MXK Missing EXECUTE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: EXECUTE clause must be supplied in the statement.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information of CREATE TRIGGER or CREATE EVENT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMIV
member.summary: 09957 PRS MIV Number of input values does not match number required by
member.remarks:
procedure.
Reason: The number of values specified in the EXECUTE procedure clause does not match the number of parameters expected by the procedure.
Remedy: Correct the EXECUTE clause to provide the expected number of values.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEVPP
member.summary: 09958 PRS VPP Invalid identifier provided as procedure parameter or part of
member.remarks:
such a parameter
Reason: Procedure parameters must be composed of constants.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE EVENT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMRA
member.summary: 09959 PRS MRA Missing RAISE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: CREATE EVENT statement must supply the keyword RAISE.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE EVENT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMVY
member.summary: 09960 PRS MVY Missing EVERY keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: CREATE EVENT statement must supply the keyword AT.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE EVENT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENBA
member.summary: 09961 PRS NBA Need BEFORE or AFTER keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: CREATE TRIGGER statement must supply either keyword.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE TRIGGER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMVA
member.summary: 09962 PRS MVA Missing event action
member.remarks:
Reason: CREATE TRIGGER statement must specify DELETE, INSERT or UPDATE.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE TRIGGER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIVV
member.summary: 09963 PRS IVV Invalid values correlation name
member.remarks:
Reason: The name is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE TRIGGER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMNO
member.summary: 09964 PRS MNO Missing OLD or NEW keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: The CREATE TRIGGER statement must supply either keyword.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE TRIGGER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSERED
member.summary: 09965 PRS RED Redundant OLD or NEW keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Only one occurrence of either keyword is allowed in a CREATE TRIGGER statement.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE TRIGGER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMEA
member.summary: 09966 PRS MEA Missing EACH keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: The CREATE TRIGGER statement must supply EACH (ROW or STATEMENT) after FOR.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE TRIGGER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMRS
member.summary: 09967 PRS MRS Missing ROW or STATEMENT keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: The CREATE TRIGGER statement must supply either keyword.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE TRIGGER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIRF
member.summary: 09968 PRS IRF Invalid REFERENCING keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: REFERENCING is valid only if the trigger action is UPDATE.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE TRIGGER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBXN
member.summary: 09969 PRS BXN Prefixing table name does not match the subject table.
member.remarks:
Reason: The syntax allows only the subject table name.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE TRIGGER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBCN
member.summary: 09970 PRS BCN Table name does not match OLD or NEW values correlation name
member.remarks:
Reason: Table name prefixing a column name in a parameter list must be a values correlation name.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE TRIGGER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIVI
member.summary: 09971 PRS IVI Invalid identifier
member.remarks:
Reason: Identifier is not recognized or allowed.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information of CREATE TRIGGER or CREATE EVENT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIAG
member.summary: 09972 PRS IAG Invalid aggregate
member.remarks:
Reason: AGGREGATE is not allowed.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information of CREATE TRIGGER or CREATE EVENT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIFU
member.summary: 09973 PRS IFU Invalid function
member.remarks:
Reason: This function is not allowed.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information of CREATE TRIGGER or CREATE EVENT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMPB
member.summary: 09974 PRS MPB Missing PROCEDURE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Either the keyword is missing or the INLINE procedure is not specified.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement to supply the INLINE procedure specification. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE TRIGGER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEICV
member.summary: 09975 PRS ICV Column value not allowed as procedure parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: Column values have no meaning for a STATEMENT trigger.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE TRIGGER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENNE
member.summary: 09976 PRS NNE Not enough END keywords
member.remarks:
Reason: Keyword END must be used in pair with BEGIN and not enough ENDs are seen.
Remedy: Supply the missing ENDs and try again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMTP
member.summary: 09977 PRS MTP Missing terminating right parenthesis after INLINE procedure
member.remarks:
Reason: An INLINE procedure must be terminated by a right parenthesis.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEVVN
member.summary: 09978 PRS VVN Invalid interval specification
member.remarks:
Reason: An interval must be no less than 1.0 minutes to be meaningful.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE EVENT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEVPM
member.summary: 09979 PRS VPM Invalid identifier for procedure parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: User-defined identifier cannot be used as procedure parameter.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE EVENT.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEVRI
member.summary: 09980 PRS VRI Invalid row ID for procedure parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: Row ID cannot be used as procedure parameter.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. See the SQL Language Reference Manual for syntax information on CREATE EVENT or TRIGGER.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMTX
member.summary: 09981 PRS MTX Missing TRANSACTION keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIEP
member.summary: 09982 PRS IEP Invalid grant execute privilege options
member.remarks:
Reason: User specifies invalid options when granting execute privilege.
Remedy: Correct the statement. Make sure only the creator or grantee is specified and try again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMPS
member.summary: 09983 PRS MPS Missing PRIVILEGES keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: PRIVILEGES keyword is expected and the keyword is missing.
Remedy: Correct the syntax and try again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEITC
member.summary: 09984 PRS ITC Invalid audit category
member.remarks:
Reason: Trying to start an audit and the specified category type is not valid for the specified audit type.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. Specify valid categories for the specified audit type.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSESSC
member.summary: 09985 PRS SSC Administrative server connection required
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to perform a database administrative function and a database server connection has not been established.
Remedy: Establish a connection to a remote database server before attempting any database administrative function. See the SQLTalk command SET SERVER or the API function call sqlcsv().

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSESAS
member.summary: 09986 PRS SAS Invalid START AUDIT SIZE value
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to perform a START AUDIT operation and the specified SIZE value is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the SIZE value. This numeric value should be specified in kilobytes.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIAP
member.summary: 09987 PRS IAP Invalid APPEND file number
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to perform a START AUDIT operation and the specified APPEND file number is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the APPEND file number. Valid file number can be from zero to 999.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIKV
member.summary: 09988 PRS IKV Invalid KEEP value
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to perform a START AUDIT operation and the specified KEEP file number value is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the KEEP file number value. You can keep anywhere from zero to 999 files beyond the current audit file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEDFN
member.summary: 09989 PRS DFN Invalid AUDIT directory name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to perform a START AUDIT operation and the specified directory name is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the specified directory name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMAI
member.summary: 09990 PRS MAI Missing AUDIT name identifier
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to perform a START AUDIT operation and the audit name identifier has not been specified.
Remedy: Specify a valid audit name identifier.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMSG
member.summary: 09991 PRS MSG MESSAGE keyword is missing or misspelled
member.remarks:
Reason: The MESSAGE keyword is missing or misspelled in the AUDIT MESSAGE command. The command syntax is: AUDIT MESSAGE 'string-content'
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEDMM
member.summary: 09992 PRS DMM Datatype mismatch.
member.remarks:
Reason: The source and target types of an assignment are not the same.
Remedy: Change the type of either the source or the target.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSERNA
member.summary: 09993 PRS RNA REFERENCING clause not allowed in FOR EACH STATEMENT trigger.
member.remarks:
Reason: A REFERENCING clause is allowed only with a FOR EACH ROW trigger.
Remedy: Change the trigger type to FOR EACH ROW or remove the REFERENCING clause.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEARC
member.summary: 09994 PRS ARC Keyword AUTORECOMPILE is expected
member.remarks:
Reason: AUTORECOMPILE cannot be omitted.
Remedy: Correct the ALTER COMMAND command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEOPT
member.summary: 09995 PRS OPT Keyword ON or OFF is expected
member.remarks:
Reason: ON or OFF must be supplied.
Remedy: Correct the ALTER COMMAND command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMBS
member.summary: 09996 PRS MBS Keyword STATIC is expected
member.remarks:
Reason: An INLINE procedure must be static.
Remedy: Specify the INLINE procedure to be static after the procedure name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEVOT
member.summary: 09997 PRS VOT Future time expected for a one-time event
member.remarks:
Reason: It is recommended that the action time be far in the future.
Remedy: Advance the action time or default it.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEVVE
member.summary: 09998 PRS VVE Time element cannot be an expression
member.remarks:
Reason: The current syntax does not allow expressions.
Remedy: Replace the offending expressions with time constants.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEVCN
member.summary: 09999 PRS VCN Invalid command name
member.remarks:
Reason: Command name cannot be recognized.
Remedy: Provide a proper command name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSESET
member.summary: 10000 PRS SET Keyword SET is expected
member.remarks:
Reason: SET cannot be omitted.
Remedy: Correct the ALTER COMMAND command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MTHE001
member.summary: 10001 MTH 001 MATH LIB: argument domain error (DOMAIN)

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MTHE002
member.summary: 10002 MTH 002 MATH LIB: argument singularity error (SING)

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MTHE003
member.summary: 10003 MTH 003 MATH LIB: overflow range error (OVERFLOW)

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MTHE004
member.summary: 10004 MTH 004 MATH LIB: underflow range error (UNDERFLOW)

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MTHE005
member.summary: 10005 MTH 005 MATH LIB: total loss of precision (TLOSS)

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MTHE006
member.summary: 10006 MTH 006 MATH LIB: partial loss of precision (PLOSS)

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DSMEIMT
member.summary: 10101 DSM IMT INTERNAL USE ONLY - Invalid message type
member.remarks:
Reason: A GSA server application, such as SQLBase or a gateway, issued the dsmLogSQLMLI function with an incorrect parameter value for the type of SQL/API message. This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error should not occur. If it does, it represents a logic error in the GSA server code. This error code should never occur in an application program. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DSMEMNF
member.summary: 10102 DSM MNF INTERNAL USE ONLY - Message text not found
member.remarks:
Reason: The Display Manager function dsmStatIndirect (or dsmDialog) was unable to retrieve a message from the internal message table (not error.sql). The message could not be retrieved because it could not be found. This is error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error should not occur. If it does, it represents a logic error in the GSA server code. This error code should never occur in an application program. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DSMEOOM
member.summary: 10103 DSM OOM Out of memory at the database computer (DSM OOM)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.KBDEKOR
member.summary: 10201 KBD KOR INTERNAL USE ONLY
member.remarks:
Reason: A GSA server application, such as SQLBase or a gateway, issued the kdbSetKeyboardFunc function with an incorrect parameter value for the keystroke number. This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur in an application program. If it does, it represents a logic error in the GSA server code. It is not an error that a client application can produce. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MCIEIES
member.summary: 10301 MCI IES INTERNAL USE ONLY - invalid export size
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MCIEIIS
member.summary: 10302 MCI IIS INTERNAL USE ONLY - invalid import size
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MCIEIAT
member.summary: 10303 MCI IAT Invalid architecture type
member.remarks:
Reason: The database server does not recognize the hardware architecture type of the client requesting a connection - this could happen because Gupta is supporting a new architecture type and the client workstation with this new architecture connects to a database server that has not been updated.
Remedy: Obtain and install an updated database server that supports the new architecture type from Gupta.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLENLD
member.summary: 10401 SQL NLD No local databases
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to get a listing of available databases on the local client workstation and no local databases exist.
Remedy: None. Informational only. No local databases exist.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEINM
member.summary: 10402 SQL INM Invalid cursor name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to name a cursor and the specified name is missing or invalid.
Remedy: Correct the command by properly specifying a valid cursor name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLECAO
member.summary: 10403 SQL CAO Out of memory at the client (SQL CAO)
member.remarks:
Reason: The application has run out of memory at the client workstation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the client workstation. Attempt to make more memory available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEMSE
member.summary: 10404 SQL MSE Describe must follow a successful Select Execute
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLENDE
member.summary: 10405 SQL NDE No Describe information is available for this cursor
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEBCS
member.summary: 10407 SQL BCS Cannot execute a chained cmd with SELECT in bulk execute mode
member.remarks:
Reason: Chained commands which are executed in bulk execute mode may not include SELECT commands.
Remedy: Remove the SELECT command from chained command or turn bulk execute mode off.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEFCH
member.summary: 10408 SQL FCH Fetch backwards not allowed with chained commands
member.remarks:
Reason: Fetch backward with a chained command is not allowed.
Remedy: Turn fetch backward off or don't execute the chained command while in bulk execute command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEIBF
member.summary: 10409 SQL IBF Invalid backup file
member.remarks:
Reason: Could not read data from a backup file.
Remedy: Check to make sure that the files being restored were created by doing an online backup.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLENEU
member.summary: 10410 SQL NEU Not a recently executed UPDATE
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt was made to retrieve the ROWID with the SQLPRID sqlget() parameter on a cursor which does not contain an executed UPDATE command.
Remedy: Successfully execute an UPDATE command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLENFQ
member.summary: 10411 SQL NFQ No fully qualified name
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt was made to retrieve the fully qualified name and the fully qualified name is not available.
Remedy: Check if backend engine provides the name. If backend engine does not provide fully qualified names, do not try to get the name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLERSV
member.summary: 10412 SQL RSV NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLELIP
member.summary: 10413 SQL LIP 003 - Fatal SQLBase System Failure (SQL LIP)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLECAQ
member.summary: 10414 SQL CAQ Out of memory at the client (SQL CAQ)
member.remarks:
Reason: The application has run out of memory at the client workstation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the client workstation. Attempt to make more memory available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEANT
member.summary: 10415 SQL ANT API nested too deep
member.remarks:
Reason: API calls were nested too deep.
Remedy: Make sure your code does not make recursive API calls.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLESTO
member.summary: 10416 SQL STO Out of stack space - command rolled back
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is usually caused by the user executing a stored procedure or trigger that recurses heavily on execution, causing the stack in which it is executing to overflow.
Remedy: If you are executing a stored procedure, examine it and recode if necessary to ensure that you are not recursing too deeply. If you are executing a DML command that has a trigger, examine the code executed for the trigger. Modify the maximum nesting level using the SQL.INI keyword MAXNESTINGLEVEL. If neither of the above cases is true, report this bug to your Gupta Technical Support representative.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEACN
member.summary: 10417 SQL ACN Already connected in non-distributed transaction mode
member.remarks:
Reason: Cannot connect to this database in distributed transaction mode. You already have connected to this database in ordinary (i.e., non-distributed) transaction mode.
Remedy: Disconnect from the database completely and then connect again in distributed transaction mode.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEACD
member.summary: 10418 SQL ACD Already connected in distributed transaction mode
member.remarks:
Reason: Cannot connect to this database in non-distributed transaction mode. You already have connected to this database in distributed transaction mode.
Remedy: Disconnect from the database completely and then connect again in non-distributed transaction mode.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLECRD
member.summary: 10419 SQL CRD Cannot explicitly turn off distributed transaction mode
member.remarks:
Reason: Tried to turn off distributed transaction mode using SQLSET.
Remedy: Currently, you cannot turn off the distributed transaction mode explicitly. This means that once you begin connecting in distributed transaction mode, it applies to all future connections.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLECSD
member.summary: 10420 SQL CSD Cannot start distributed transaction
member.remarks:
Reason: Failed to start distributed transaction mode.
Remedy: You cannot use distributed transactions.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLECOF
member.summary: 10421 SQL COF Cannot open Load or Unload file
member.remarks:
Reason: The Load/Unload file could not be opened by SQLBase.
Remedy: Check the directory path, filename and write protections of the file to make sure that they are legal.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEFAE
member.summary: 10422 SQL FAE Load or unload file already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: The Load/Unload file already exists.
Remedy: A load/unload file of the specified name already exists in the path specified. If you want to overwrite this file, use OVERWRITE option in the Load/Unload command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLENNB
member.summary: 10423 SQL NNB No name buffer specified
member.remarks:
Reason: Name buffer is not specified.
Remedy: Specify a buffer large enough for the name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEIVN
member.summary: 10424 SQL IVN Invalid number of INTO variables
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid number of INTO variables.
Remedy: The number of INTO variables must match the number of projected items in a select statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLECAX
member.summary: 10425 SQL CAX 008 - Out of memory at the database computer (SQL CAX)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce the size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEFNP
member.summary: 10426 SQL FNP Feature not allowed on a procedure cursor
member.remarks:
Reason: This feature is not allowed on a procedure cursor.
Remedy: Do not use this feature on a procedure cursor.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEITH
member.summary: 10427 SQL ITH Invalid task handle
member.remarks:
Reason: The task handle does not represent a valid SQL task.
Remedy: Ensure that the task handle is valid.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLESNE
member.summary: 10428 SQL SNE SQLTrace not enabled
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt was made to access SQLTrace data when the sqltrace parameter in the SQL.INI is set to FALSE.
Remedy: Enable the sqltrace setting in the SQL.INI file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLECNL
member.summary: 10429 SQL CNL Invalid Client name
member.remarks:
Reason: A client name was specified which is either too small or too large. Maximum size is 12 characters.
Remedy: Specify a client name from one to 12 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEMID
member.summary: 10430 SQL MID Invalid Mail ID
member.remarks:
Reason: A mail ID was specified which is either too small or too large. Maximum size is 32 characters.
Remedy: Specify a mail ID from 1 to 32 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLENID
member.summary: 10431 SQL NID Invalid Network ID
member.remarks:
Reason: A network ID was specified which is either too small or too large. Maximum size is 32 characters.
Remedy: Specify a network ID from 1 to 32 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEAID
member.summary: 10432 SQL AID Invalid Adapter ID
member.remarks:
Reason: A adapter ID was specified which is either too small or too large. Maximum size is 32 characters.
Remedy: Specify an adapter ID from 1 to 32 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEUID
member.summary: 10433 SQL UID Invalid Application ID
member.remarks:
Reason: A application ID was specified which is either too small or too large. Maximum size is 32 characters.
Remedy: Specify an application ID from 1 to 32 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEIPN
member.summary: 10434 SQL IPN Invalid process number
member.remarks:
Reason: The application program is attempting to perform a function call and is using an invalid process number.
Remedy: Correct the application program. Verify that the process number is valid.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEBEV
member.summary: 10435 SQL BEV (Incompatible) server does not support attempted function
member.remarks:
Reason: Client and server do not have compatible versions for launching the attempted function/feature.
Remedy: Use a configuration consisting of compatible client and server.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLENPR
member.summary: 10436 SQL NPR No permission to access remote files
member.remarks:
Reason: The remote file server has been started with remote file access disallowed.
Remedy: Contact your system administrator to turn on the remote file access. File access can be turned on by adding "FILEACCESS=1" in the server section of the remote server's SQL.INI file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLETNS
member.summary: 10437 SQL TNS SQLTrace not supported on this platform
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt was made to access a SQLTrace procedure on an unsupported platform.
Remedy: Refrain from using SQLTrace procedures on unsupported platforms.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLENDT
member.summary: 10438 SQL NDT Distributed transactions are not supported by this back-end
member.remarks:
Reason: The user attempted to connect in distributed transaction mode to a back-end server that does not support distributed transactions (i.e., a pre-6.0 SQLBase server)
Remedy: Turn off distributed transaction mode and try to connect again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEDTR
member.summary: 10439 SQL DTR Connection handles are not supported in distributed transaction mode
member.remarks:
Reason: The user attempted to create a connection handle when distributed Ttransactions have been enabled. This is not currently supported.
Remedy: Turn off distributed transaction mode and try to connect again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLESDT
member.summary: 10440 SQL SDT Distributed transactions cannot be set when connection handles exist
member.remarks:
Reason: The user attempted to set Distributed Transaction mode on when Connection Handles exists. This is not currently supported.
Remedy: Close all connection handles and try the Set command again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLESIZ
member.summary: 10441 SQL SIZ Restore is over maximum file size (SQL SIZ)
member.remarks:
Reason: Calculated backup size is greater than 2 GB and restore is to a non-partitioned database.
Remedy: Do the restore to a partitioned database. (See Database Administrator's Guide)

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLELOD
member.summary: 10442 SQL LOD SQL API dynamic link library can not be found.
member.remarks:
Reason: The application program failed to load SQLBase API dynamic link library.
Remedy: Check CLIENTRUNTIMEDIR keyword in the SQL.INI configuration file. This keyword specifies the path of the local installation directory.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEINI
member.summary: 10443 SQL INI Configuration INI file is not found or INI file path name is too big.
member.remarks:
Reason: There is no such INI file or specified directory path is too long.
Remedy: Check configuration file location. The file path name should not exceed 255 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEIEX
member.summary: 10444 SQL IEX Failed to initialize SQLBase API.
member.remarks:
Reason: SQLBase API was already initialized and was not cleared by sqldon() call.
Remedy: Call sqldon() and make sure it was successful before sqliniEx call.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEDON
member.summary: 10445 SQL DON Failed to complete sqldon() method call.
member.remarks:
Reason: SQLBase API probably was initialized multiple threads.
Remedy: None. (it's temporary error and it's not exposed to the user now.)

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEUBC
member.summary: 10446 SQL UBC Unicode conversion failed.
member.remarks:
Reason: Failed to convert input( or output) buffer to (or from) Unicode format.
Remedy: None.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLELBV
member.summary: 10447 SQL LBV Programming Error: Bind type not supported for this operation
member.remarks:
Reason: The application program is attempting to perform a write long (sqlwlo) function call and the bind data type is not supported for this operation
Remedy: The bind parameters supported are SQLPLON (char), SQLPLBI (binary), and SQLPLNC (nchar).

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEMSM
member.summary: 10448 SQL MSM Message size exceeds maximum size of the message buffer.
member.remarks:
Reason: The current command input or output message size is too big and exceeds message size limit.
Remedy: Check current SQL command and try to reduce the size of the input(or output) message.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEIPW
member.summary: 10449 SQL IPW Invalid password
member.remarks:
Reason: An incorrect password was provided
Remedy: Enter correct password

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLEIFP
member.summary: 10450 SQL IFP Invalid function parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: An invalid parameter is being passed to function
Remedy: Check the parameters

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLENMP
member.summary: 10451 SQL NMP Not implemented
member.remarks:
Reason: This functionality is not implemented
Remedy: If this is a function, it may not be implemented in the current configuration. Look for an alternative method.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SQLELDL
member.summary: 10452 SQL LDL SQL API dynamic link library can not be found.
member.remarks:
Reason: The application program failed to load SQLBase API dynamic link library of version 11.7 or newer.
Remedy: Verify that SQLWNTM.DLL for version 11.7, or newer is installed in the same directory as the SQLWNTM10.DLL, or in the sqlbase subdirectory directly underneath.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NUMEBNP
member.summary: 10501 NUM BNP Pointer to number is bad
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to use the API function sqlxad, sqlxda, sqlxdp, sqlxdv sqlxml, sqlxnp, or sqlxsb and a specified pointer to a number or the specified length of the number is invalid. This is an application programming problem.
Remedy: If you are using a extended math API function, correct the API function call. If you are using an application that has generated this error, contact the supplier of the application program. If you have verified that you are not directly or indirectly calling a extended math API function then contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MDBENSC
member.summary: 10601 MDB NSC INTERNAL USE ONLY - No saved context for restore
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MDBECOI
member.summary: 10602 MDB COI Cannot open MAIN.INI
member.remarks:
Reason: Cannot open the MAIN.INI file.
Remedy: Copy MAIN.INI to user's working directory.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MDBEXXX
member.summary: 10603 MDB XXX Unused
member.remarks:
Reason: None
Remedy: None

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MDBEUME
member.summary: 10604 MDB UME User cannot name databases MAIN; please rename this database
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to name a database MAIN.
Remedy: Use a database name other than MAIN.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MDBEMMV
member.summary: 10605 MDB MMV SQLBase and MAIN.INI have mismatching versions
member.remarks:
Reason: The MAIN.INI file attempting to be used is not the proper version. That is, the software version number found on line one of MAIN.INI does not match the SQLBase version number.
Remedy: Use the correct version of the MAIN.INI file for this particular version of SQLBase.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MDBEICT
member.summary: 10606 MDB ICT 003 - Fatal SQLBase System Failure (MDB ICT)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MDBEIDT
member.summary: 10607 MDB IDT 003 - Fatal SQLBase System Failure (MDB IDT)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MDBEPNS
member.summary: 10608 MDB PNS Partitioned databases no longer supported
member.remarks:
Reason: SQLBase no longer supports partitioned databases.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSENEF
member.summary: 10701 PFS NEF NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSEIFH
member.summary: 10702 PFS IFH INTERNAL USE ONLY - Invalid file handle
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSEIEN
member.summary: 10703 PFS IEN Invalid extent number in MAIN database
member.remarks:
Reason: The MAIN database has been determined to be inconsistent.
Remedy: Stop all partitioned database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation on the MAIN database in single user mode. If an error is reported, attempt to correct the problem by either dropping and re-creating the offending object or restore the MAIN database from the most recent backup. If the CHECK DATABASE operation does not report a problem, then contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSEIAI
member.summary: 10704 PFS IAI NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSEIPE
member.summary: 10705 PFS IPE INTERNAL USE ONLY - I/O attempted past end-of-file
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSECOV
member.summary: 10706 PFS COV Out of memory at the database computer (PFS COV)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSECOD
member.summary: 10707 PFS COD Out of memory at the database computer (PFS COD)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.remarks:

member.remarks:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSECOA
member.summary: 10712 PFS COA Cannot open area file for MAIN database
member.remarks:
Reason: The MAIN database has been determined to be inconsistent.
Remedy: Stop all partitioned database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation on the MAIN database in single user mode. If an error is reported, attempt to correct the problem by either dropping and re-creating the offending object or restore the MAIN database from the most recent backup. If the CHECK DATABASE operation does not report a problem, then contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.summary: 10714 PFS 002 NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSECEF
member.summary: 10715 PFS CEF Cannot extend partitioned file
member.remarks:
Reason: There is insufficient disk space in a storage group.
Remedy: Check which storage group (database or log) is running out of disk space. Create a new DBAREA and add space to the storage group.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSECEE
member.summary: 10716 PFS CEE Out of memory at the database computer (PFS CEE)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSENPD
member.summary: 10717 PFS NPD INTERNAL USE ONLY - Not partitioned database
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.

If an error is reported, attempt to correct the problem by either dropping and re-creating the offending object or restore the MAIN database from the most recent backup. If the CHECK DATABASE operation does not report a problem, then contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSECAI

member.remarks:
Reason: There is insufficient disk space in a storage group.
Remedy: Check which storage group (database or log) is running out of disk space. Create a new DBAREA and add space to the storage group.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSECDO
member.summary: 10721 PFS CDO INTERNAL USE ONLY - Cannot delete open file
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSECEV
member.summary: 10722 PFS CEV Out of memory at the database computer (PFS CEV)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSECOR
member.summary: 10723 PFS COR Main database tables are corrupt
member.remarks:
Reason: The MAIN database has been determined to be inconsistent.
Remedy: Stop all partitioned database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation on the MAIN database in single user mode. If an error is reported, attempt to correct the problem by either dropping and re-creating the offending object or restore the MAIN database from the most recent backup. If the CHECK DATABASE operation does not report a problem, then contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PFSEMDC
member.summary: 10724 PFS MDC Incorrect extent table entries in the main database
member.remarks:
Reason: The partition entries for this partitioned database have been entered incorrectly. This could lead to database corruption.
Remedy: There is a known problem in SQLBase 5.1.4 that can cause this error. If the main database was created with that version, a utility named 'pdbfix' is available to fix the problem.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCECAT
member.summary: 10801 SVC CAT Out of memory at the database computer
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEVNM
member.summary: 10802 SVC VNM Main db set up improperly (stored cmd variables not matched)
member.remarks:
Reason: The main database was set up incorrectly. The number of bind variables in a stored command do not match the number of bind variables.
Remedy: Reinstall the main database or recover from a backup database.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCESNM
member.summary: 10803 SVC SNM Main db set up improperly (select col not matched w/stored cmd)
member.remarks:
Reason: The main database was incorrectly set up. The number of columns selected does not match the number columns in the previously stored command.
Remedy: Reinstall the main database or recovery from a backup database.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEDAN
member.summary: 10804 SVC DAN DBAREA <name> already exists or DBAREA not found
member.remarks:
Reason: Either attempting to CREATE a DBAREA and the DBAREA already exists, or attempting to ALTER a DBAREA and the DBAREA was not found.
Remedy: For a CREATE DBAREA, verify whether the DBAREA already exists and retry using a unique name. For ALTER DBAREA, verify that the DBAREA has been created.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEDSG
member.summary: 10805 SVC DSG Stogroup <name> already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE STOGROUP and the specified stogroup name already exists.
Remedy: Verify the stogroup name and retry with a unique stogroup name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEDSA
member.summary: 10806 SVC DSA DBAREA <name> already in stogroup
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE STOGROUP or ALTER STOGROUP and the specified DBAREA is already part of a previously defined stogroup.
Remedy: Retry using a different stogroup name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCENPD
member.summary: 10807 SVC NPD Not partitioned database, command not allowed
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an ALTER DATABASE command and the specified database is not a partitioned database.
Remedy: None. The ALTER DATABASE command can only be used for partitioned databases.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCESCD
member.summary: 10808 SVC SCD Specified DBAREA is associated with stogroup
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to drop a DBAREA and the specified DBAREA is associated with an established stogroup.
Remedy: Drop the associated stogroup before attempting to drop the DBAREA.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEECD
member.summary: 10809 SVC ECD Specified DBAREA is in use
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to drop a DBAREA and the specified DBAREA is being used as an extent area.
Remedy: None. You cannot drop a DBAREA that is in use.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEDCS
member.summary: 10810 SVC DCS Specified stogroup has been assigned to the database
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to drop a stogroup but the specified stogroup has been assigned to the database.
Remedy: None. You cannot drop a stogroup that has been assigned to the database.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEFCS
member.summary: 10811 SVC FCS Specified stogroup is the default stogroup
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to drop a stogroup but the specified stogroup is the default stogroup.
Remedy: Modify the default stogroup before attempting to drop the specified stogroup.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEANF
member.summary: 10812 SVC ANF DBAREA <name> not found
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an ALTER DBAREA, ALTER STOGROUP, CREATE STOGROUP, or DROP DBAREA, and the specified DBAREA was not found.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by specifying a valid DBAREA name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEDNF
member.summary: 10813 SVC DNF Database not found
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an ALTER DATABASE and the specified database was not found.
Remedy: Correct the ALTER DATABASE statement by specifying a valid database name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEDAE
member.summary: 10814 SVC DAE Database <name> already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE DATABASE and the specified database already exists.
Remedy: Correct the CREATE DATABASE statement by specifying a valid (unique) database name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEIRS
member.summary: 10815 SVC IRS Insufficient raw device space
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE DBAREA or ALTER DBAREA and the requested database area is larger than the amount of free raw device space available on the specified device.
Remedy: Correct the CREATE DBAREA or ALTER DBAREA statement by specifying a database area that is not larger than the amount of free raw device space available on the specified device.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEIFS
member.summary: 10816 SVC IFS Insufficient file space
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE DBAREA or ALTER DBAREA and the requested database area is larger than the amount of free disk space available on the specified device.
Remedy: Correct the CREATE DBAREA or ALTER DBAREA statement by specifying a database area that is not larger than the amount of free disk space available on the specified device.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEFAE
member.summary: 10817 SVC FAE File already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE DBAREA and the specified file name already exists.
Remedy: Correct the CREATE DBAREA statement by specifying a filename that does not already exist.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEFCE
member.summary: 10818 SVC FCE File <filename> Creation Failure
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to create a file and a failure has occurred.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the create failure. Run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the current operating system to verify the status of disk. Verify that sufficient disk space is available and verify that the number of files allowed open for the operating system permits the additional file, that is, check the FILES= configuration parameter setting.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEIOE
member.summary: 10819 SVC IOE Disk Write Failure
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to write to a file and a disk write failure has occurred.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the disk write failure. Most commonly, it may be because you have run out of available disk space. If sufficient disk space is available, then run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the current operating system to verify the status of the disk.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCECCD
member.summary: 10820 SVC CCD INTERNAL USE ONLY
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEAAE
member.summary: 10821 SVC AAE Auditname <name> already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a START AUDIT command and the specified auditname already exists.
Remedy: Start an audit with a different name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEFNF
member.summary: 10822 SVC FNF File associated with DBAREA not found
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an ALTER DBAREA to increase the size of the database area and a file associated with the DBAREA cannot be found.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the open file failure. Verify that the specified file exists. Verify the number of files allowed open for the operating system permits the additional file, that is, check the FILES= configuration parameter setting.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEMNE
member.summary: 10823 SVC MNE MAIN database does not exist
member.remarks:
Reason: Trying to use a server command and the command is related to a partitioned database while the MAIN database has not been created. For example, attempting to create a database with stogroup(s) specified in the command.
Remedy: Correct SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCECCM
member.summary: 10824 SVC CCM Cannot create Main database
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to create a database file and a failure has occurred.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the create failure. Run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the current operating system to verify the status of disk. Verify that sufficient disk space is available and verify that the number of files allowed open for the operating system permits the additional file, that is, check the FILES= configuration parameter setting.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCESGN
member.summary: 10825 SVC SGN Stogroup <name> not found
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE DATABASE, DROP STOGROUP, or SET DEFAULT STOGROUP and the specified stogroup name does not exist.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by specifying an existing stogroup name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEDSO
member.summary: 10826 SVC DSO Data stored outside specified area
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to decrease the size of the database area with an ALTER DBAREA but data is already stored outside of the specified area.
Remedy: None. The database area cannot be decreased if data already is stored outside of the specified area.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEANS
member.summary: 10827 SVC ANS DBAREA <name> is not in stogroup <name>
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an ALTER STOGROUP to drop a DBAREA but the specified database area is not in the specified storage group.
Remedy: None. A DBAREA cannot be dropped from a storage group unless the database area is associated with the storage group.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEDFE
member.summary: 10828 SVC DFE Delete file error
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a DROP DBAREA or DROP DATBASE and the file cannot be deleted.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the file delete failure. Run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the current operating system to verify the status of the disk.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEIRF
member.summary: 10829 SVC IRF Initialization reading failure
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to read a file and a disk read failure has occurred.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the disk read failure. Run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the current operating system to verify the status of the disk.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEIWF
member.summary: 10830 SVC IWF Initialization writing failure
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to write to a file and a disk write failure has occurred.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the disk write failure. Most commonly, it may be because you have run out of available disk space. If sufficient disk space is available, then run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the current operating system to verify the status of the disk.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEDNA
member.summary: 10831 SVC DNA Specified DBAREA is not allocable (internal error)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEMTF
member.summary: 10832 SVC MTF Cannot start another audit, maximum audit files exceeded
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to start a 33rd audit file. The maximum number of allowable audit files is 32.
Remedy: None. You cannot have more than 32 concurrent audit files.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEMZK
member.summary: 10833 SVC MZK Must have SIZE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE DBAREA and the SIZE keyword is either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the CREATE DBAREA statement by properly specifying a SIZE keyword.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCENOP
member.summary: 10834 SVC NOP MAIN database not open to public
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to create, delete, install, or uninstall the MAIN database, which cannot be modified by the general public.
Remedy: None. The MAIN database is not open to the public.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCETNF
member.summary: 10835 SVC TNF Audit does not exist
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an AUDIT command or STOP AUDIT command and a specified audit does not exist.
Remedy: Specify an existing audit name identifier.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEUSC
member.summary: 10836 SVC USC Unknown server command
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting an unknown database server command.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by specifying a valid database server command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEDNE
member.summary: 10837 SVC DNE Database <name> does not exist
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to delete or uninstall a non-existent database.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by specifying a valid, existing database name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEPDE
member.summary: 10838 SVC PDE Partitioned database is already enabled
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to enable a partitioned database when the database was already enabled.
Remedy: No remedy needed.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEPDD
member.summary: 10839 SVC PDD Partitioned database is already disabled
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to disable a partitioned database when the database was already disabled.
Remedy: No remedy needed.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEPIU
member.summary: 10840 SVC PIU Partitioned database in use
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to disable a partitioned database when the database was in use.
Remedy: Disconnect from all partitioned databases before trying to disable partitioned databases.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEIGP
member.summary: 10841 SVC IGP Illegal server get parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to use an invalid get parameter on a server connect.
Remedy: Use a correct server get parameter as defined in SQL.H

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCECSA
member.summary: 10842 SVC CSA 001 - Undocumented
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCECSD
member.summary: 10843 SVC CSD Commit service is already disabled
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to disable the COMMIT SERVICE when it was already disabled.
Remedy: None needed.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCECSE
member.summary: 10844 SVC CSE Commit service is already enabled
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to enable the COMMIT SERVICE when it was already enabled.
Remedy: None needed.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEATE
member.summary: 10845 SVC ATE AUDIT file <filename> does not exist
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to APPEND to an audit file that cannot be found.
Remedy: Verify that the audit file exists. Determine why operating system could not locate the specified file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCECOF
member.summary: 10846 SVC COF Cannot open AUDIT file <filename>
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a START AUDIT with an APPEND clause, and a failure occurred while attempting to open the existing file.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the open file failure. Verify that the specified file exists. Verify the number of files allowed open for the operating system permits the additional file, that is, check the FILES= configuration parameter setting.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEAAA
member.summary: 10847 SVC AAA AUDIT <auditname> already active
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a START AUDIT and the named audit is already active.
Remedy: None. You cannot start an audit that is already active. Choose another audit name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEAFE
member.summary: 10848 SVC AFE Audit file <filename> already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to start an audit (without the APPEND clause) and the specified file name already exists. Or the current audit file has reached its maximum SIZE and when attempting to roll over to the next audit file that file was found to already exist, and the OVERWRITE clause was not specified.
Remedy: Correct the problem by specifying an audit name that does not already exist as a file. Or append to an existing audit file using the APPEND option. Or restart the AUDIT with the OVERWRITE clause. Or delete the target file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCECCT
member.summary: 10849 SVC CCT Unable to create temporary file (failing MAIN database creation)
member.remarks:
Reason: Typically caused by the absence of the expected directory for temporary files.
Remedy: Verify the expected directory exists.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEUCM
member.summary: 10850 SVC UCM Unable to connect to the MAIN database
member.remarks:
Reason: May be due to the absence of the expected directory for temporary files.
Remedy: Verify the expected directory exists.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEISC
member.summary: 10851 SVC ISC Invalid SQL statement detected (failing MAIN database creation)
member.remarks:
Reason: May be due to a corrupted MAIN.INI or to misprocessing.
Remedy: Verify MAIN.INI is intact.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SVCEDNK
member.summary: 10852 SVC DNK Database <name> can not be a keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: The database name is a keyword.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by changing the database name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESECLM
member.summary: 10901 MES CLM Cannot locate message file
member.remarks:
Reason: The SQLBase system cannot find the file MESSAGE.SQL.
Remedy: Determine why the SQLBase system could not find the MESSAGE.SQL file and correct the problem.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESECOM
member.summary: 10902 MES COM Cannot open message file
member.remarks:
Reason: The SQLBase system cannot open the MESSAGE.SQL file.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the open file failure. Verify that the specified file exists. Verify the number of files allowed open for the operating system permits the additional file, that is, check the FILES= configuration parameter setting.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESEIXC
