member.summary: 10903 MES IXC Bad message file: invalid X-coordinate
member.remarks:
Reason: An invalid X-coordinate has been specified in the MESSAGE.SQL file. The X-coordinate and Y-coordinate specify the screen coordinates for certain messages.
Remedy: Correct the invalid X-coordinate.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESEIYC
member.summary: 10904 MES IYC Bad message file: invalid Y-coordinate
member.remarks:
Reason: An invalid Y-coordinate has been specified in the MESSAGE.SQL file. The X-coordinate and Y-coordinate specify the screen coordinates for certain messages.
Remedy: Correct the invalid Y-coordinate.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESEIMP
member.summary: 10905 MES IMP Bad message file: invalid message parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: An invalid message parameter has been specified in the MESSAGE.SQL file. The message parameters explain how the message is used. Currently, the only valid message parameters are S, T, X, and Y.
Remedy: Correct the invalid message parameter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESEISV
member.summary: 10906 MES ISV INTERNAL USE ONLY - Bad message file: invalid state value
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESEIMI
member.summary: 10907 MES IMI Bad message file: invalid message ID
member.remarks:
Reason: An invalid message ID has been specified in the MESSAGE.SQL file.
Remedy: Correct the invalid message ID.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESEMMC
member.summary: 10908 MES MMC Bad message file: missing message comment
member.remarks:
Reason: A message comment is missing from the MESSAGE.SQL file.
Remedy: Correct the MESSAGE.SQL file by adding the appropriate message comment.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESECAM
member.summary: 10909 MES CAM Cannot allocate message table
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESEEOF
member.summary: 10910 MES EOF Bad message file: unexpected EOF
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESEMEQ
member.summary: 10911 MES MEQ Bad message file: missing end quote
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESEEEC
member.summary: 10912 MES EEC Bad message file: expected end of comment
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESEIES
member.summary: 10913 MES IES Bad message file: invalid escape sequence
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESEMMS
member.summary: 10914 MES MMS Bad message file: missing message string
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESEMMV
member.summary: 10915 MES MMV SQLBase and MESSAGE.SQL file have mismatching versions
member.remarks:
Reason: The MESSAGE.SQL file attempting to be used is not the proper version. That is, the software version number found on line one of MESSAGE.SQL does not match the SQLBase version number.
Remedy: Use the correct version of the MESSAGE.SQL file for this particular version of SQLBase.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MESEAIN
member.summary: 10916 MES AIN Message table already initialized
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is currently undocumented.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center for assistance.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.HSHECSS
member.summary: 11001 HSH CSS Out of memory at the database computer
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.APAECNA
member.summary: 11101 APA CNA Out of memory at the database computer
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.APAEOOM
member.summary: 11102 APA OOM Out of memory at the database computer
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the necessary query optimization.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce the size of the CACHE. Or, split the query into simpler queries and try again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.APAETMB
member.summary: 11103 APA TMB Too many booleans in a query
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the necessary query optimization.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce the size of the CACHE. Or, reduce the number of boolean expressions in the query, especially the size of any IN list.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.APAECNC
member.summary: 11104 APA CNC Cannot create PLAN_TABLE due to error code: <database sql error code>
member.remarks:
Reason: PLANONLY ON mode creates query plans in PLAN_TABLE. The PLAN_TABLE could not be created due to certain errors such as no security privileges, or database in READONLY mode, or any other resource limitations.
Remedy: Remove the offending cause and try again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.APAECNU
member.summary: 11105 APA CNU Cannot update PLAN_TABLE due to error code: <database sql error code>
member.remarks:
Reason: PLANONLY ON mode updates the PLAN_TABLE with query plans. The PLAN_TABLE could not be updated due to certain errors such as no security privileges, or database in READONLY mode, or any other resource limitations.
Remedy: Remove the offending cause and try again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.APAEUSP
member.summary: 11106 APA USP The tables in the query cannot be ordered for a solution
member.remarks:
Reason: Probably, an ON clause references columns for tables outside the join. For instance: SELECT A.col1, B.col2, C.col3 FROM A LEFT JOIN B LEFT JOIN C ON B.col2 = A.col2 ON A.col1 = C.col1; In this case table C depends on tables A and B and table B depends on tables A and C. That's a circular reference and cannot be solved.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GFSEICF
member.summary: 11201 GFS ICF Fatal SQLBase System Failure (GFS ICF)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GFSEIVF
member.summary: 11202 GFS IVF Fatal SQLBase System Failure (GFS IVF)
member.remarks:
Reason: This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Stop all database operations and run a CHECK DATABASE operation. If a FAIL.SQL file is available, then save it. Attempt to reproduce the problem via a SQL script, scenario, or using the NETLOG utility (see the DBA Guide for how to produce a NETLOG). Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GFSECAV
member.summary: 11203 GFS CAV Out of memory at the database computer
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GFSECAD
member.summary: 11204 GFS CAD Out of memory at the database computer
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GFSEMAX
member.summary: 11205 GFS MAX Attempt to extend file beyond 2 gigabytes
member.remarks:
Reason: The file size is limited to 2 gigabytes. For standard maximum, the file cannot extend beyond this size.
Remedy: If this is a database file, either unload or back up the database, and load or recover into a partitioned database space. Limit extends to 2 gigabytes or less.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GFSELCM
member.summary: 11206 GFS LCM Log Checksum Mismatch (GFS LCM)
member.remarks:
Reason: Log checksum mismatch before the write.
Remedy: None. The log file is corrupted.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GFSEIFD
member.summary: 11207 GFS IFD Invalid file descriptor
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt is being made to access a file using an invalid file descriptor
Remedy: None. Internal error.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACECNE
member.summary: 11301 CAC CNE Command not properly ended
member.remarks:
Reason: The catalog command ended unexpectedly.
Remedy: Verify that the catalog command syntax is correct and that the statement was not somehow truncated.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEICC
member.summary: 11302 CAC ICC Invalid catalog command
member.remarks:
Reason: The next keyword immediately following a CATALOG verb is invalid.
Remedy: Verify that the keyword immediately following the CATALOG verb is either TABLE, COLUMN, INDEX, KEYS, RELS, TABAUTH, or COLAUTH.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEMTB
member.summary: 11303 CAC MTB Missing TBNAME keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: The TBNAME keyword is missing from a TABLE statement.
Remedy: Verify that the TBNAME keyword exists and that it is correctly entered after the TABLE keyword.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEUIO
member.summary: 11304 CAC UIO Unknown input option
member.remarks:
Reason: An unknown input option was encountered.
Remedy: Check the syntax of the statement to determine the correct input options.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEATY
member.summary: 11305 CAC ATY AUTHORITY keyword has already been specified
member.remarks:
Reason: AUTHORITY keyword has been specified and cannot be specified again.
Remedy: Check the statement to determine where the duplicate is and re-enter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACECTR
member.summary: 11306 CAC CTR CREATOR keyword has already been specified
member.remarks:
Reason: CREATOR keyword has been specified and cannot be specified again.
Remedy: Check the statement to determine where the duplicate is and re-enter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEGEE
member.summary: 11307 CAC GEE GRANTEE keyword has already been specified
member.remarks:
Reason: GRANTEE keyword has been specified and cannot be specified again.
Remedy: Check the statement to determine where the duplicate is and re-enter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEQNS
member.summary: 11308 CAC QNS QUALIFIER not supported
member.remarks:
Reason: QUALIFIER keyword is not supported in SQLBase.
Remedy: Check the statement, remove the option and re-enter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACETYP
member.summary: 11309 CAC TYP TYPE keyword has already been specified
member.remarks:
Reason: TYPE keyword has been specified and cannot be specified again.
Remedy: Check the statement to determine where the duplicate is and re-enter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEUTT
member.summary: 11310 CAC UTT Unknown table type
member.remarks:
Reason: An unknown table type is encountered.
Remedy: Check the syntax of the statement to determine the correct table types.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEUIT
member.summary: 11311 CAC UIT Unknown index type
member.remarks:
Reason: An unknown index type is encountered.
Remedy: Check the syntax of the statement to determine the correct index types.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEUOO
member.summary: 11312 CAC UOO Unknown output option
member.remarks:
Reason: An unknown output option is encountered.
Remedy: Check the syntax of the statement to determine the correct output options.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEOOM
member.summary: 11313 CAC OOM Out of memory at the database computer (CAC OOM)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the compilation.
Remedy: Check available memory at database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce the size of CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEUAO
member.summary: 11314 CAC UAO Unknown authority option
member.remarks:
Reason: An unknown authority option is encountered.
Remedy: Check the syntax of the statement to determine the correct authority options.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEUOC
member.summary: 11315 CAC UOC Unknown ORDER BY column
member.remarks:
Reason: An unknown ORDER BY column is encountered.
Remedy: Check the syntax of the statement to determine the correct ORDER BY column.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACESEL
member.summary: 11316 CAC SEL Output option is specified more than once
member.remarks:
Reason: Output option is specified more than once.
Remedy: Check the syntax of the statement to determine where the duplicate is.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACECNS
member.summary: 11317 CAC CNS Command not supported
member.remarks:
Reason: This command is currently not supported.
Remedy: None. Contact your local Gupta certified technical support center to find out when this command will be supported.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEMMI
member.summary: 11318 CAC MMI Missing mandatory input parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: Mandatory input parameter(s) is not present.
Remedy: Check the syntax of the statement to determine which parameter is missing and re-enter the command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEUCT
member.summary: 11319 CAC UCT Unknown column type
member.remarks:
Reason: An unknown column type is encountered.
Remedy: Check the syntax of the statement to determine the correct column types.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEITB
member.summary: 11320 CAC ITB Invalid character in TBNAME
member.remarks:
Reason: The TBNAME contains an invalid character.
Remedy: Verify the characters used for TBNAME are correctly entered.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEMCK
member.summary: 11321 CAC MCK Missing comma
member.remarks:
Reason: The comma is missing from an option list.
Remedy: Verify that the comma exists and that it is correctly entered in the option list.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEMAO
member.summary: 11322 CAC MAO Missing authority option
member.remarks:
Reason: Authority option is expected while separator is encountered in the option list.
Remedy: Verify that the authority options are correctly entered in the option list.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACENSC
member.summary: 11323 CAC NSC No select column
member.remarks:
Reason: SELECT keyword is specified while no select column is found.
Remedy: Verify that the select columns are correctly entered.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACENOB
member.summary: 11324 CAC NOB No ORDER BY column
member.remarks:
Reason: ORDER BY clause is specified while no ORDER BY column is found.
Remedy: Verify the ORDER BY columns are correctly entered.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEWNA
member.summary: 11325 CAC WNA Wild card characters not allowed here
member.remarks:
Reason: Wild card characters not allowed here.
Remedy: Verify that the wild card is not used and re-enter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACETBN
member.summary: 11326 CAC TBN TBNAME keyword has been specified
member.remarks:
Reason: TBNAME keyword has been specified and cannot be specified again.
Remedy: Check the statement to determine where the duplicate is and re-enter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEIXN
member.summary: 11327 CAC IXN IXNAME keyword has been specified
member.remarks:
Reason: IXNAME keyword has been specified and cannot be specified again.
Remedy: Check the statement to determine where the duplicate is and re-enter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACESYN
member.summary: 11328 CAC SYN SYNNAME keyword has been specified
member.remarks:
Reason: SYNNAME keyword has been specified and cannot be specified again.
Remedy: Check the statement to determine where the duplicate is and re-enter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACESCR
member.summary: 11329 CAC SCR SYNCREATOR keyword has been specified
member.remarks:
Reason: SYBCREATOR keyword has been specified and cannot be specified again.
Remedy: Check the statement to determine where the duplicate is and re-enter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEOCS
member.summary: 11330 CAC OCS ORDER BY column not in select list
member.remarks:
Reason: An ORDER BY column is found not in the select list.
Remedy: Check the statement to determine which ORDER BY column is not in the select list; correct the statement and re-enter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CACEMEL
member.summary: 11331 CAC MEL Missing equality sign or LIKE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: An equal(=) sign or LIKE keyword is missing.
Remedy: Check the statement to determine which part of the statement is missing. Correct and re-enter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DFSEEOF
member.summary: 11401 DFS EOF Cannot find End-of-File for Direct File System file
member.remarks:
Reason: The database system failed to locate the end of a Direct File System file. This is a fatal error.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DFSEVMI
member.summary: 11402 DFS VMI Cannot get volume mapping info for Direct File System file
member.remarks:
Reason: The database system failed to get the volume mapping information for a Direct File System file. This is a fatal error.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DFSEVMF
member.summary: 11403 DFS VMF Volume is full for Direct File System file
member.remarks:
Reason: The database system failed to write data to a Direct File System file because volume is full for the Direct File System file. This is a Fatal Error.
Remedy: Acquire additional storage space for the Direct File System file. A PURGE operation on the fileserver volumes is recommended.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DFSEEXP
member.summary: 11404 DFS EXP Cannot expand Direct File System file
member.remarks:
Reason: The database system encountered an unrecoverable failure in the process of extending a Direct File System file. This is a fatal error.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DFSEOSP
member.summary: 11405 DFS OSP Out of space for Direct File System file
member.remarks:
Reason: The database system failed to write data to a Direct File System file because there is no free space available.
Remedy: Acquire additional storage space for the Direct File System file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DFSEOOM
member.summary: 11406 DFS OOM Out of memory at the database computer
member.remarks:
Reason: Out of memory during Direct File System process.
Remedy: Acquire additional memory for the database computer.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TMPEOOM
member.summary: 11501 TMP OOM Out of memory in temporary file manipulation
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory for temporary file manipulation.
Remedy: Check memory availability at database server workstation.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TMPEOVF
member.summary: 11502 TMP OVF Temporary-file use count overflow
member.remarks:
Reason: Use count overflow is an internal error condition.
Remedy: None. Please report incident to Gupta technical support.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TMPEUND
member.summary: 11503 TMP UND Temporary-file use count underflow
member.remarks:
Reason: Use count underflow is an internal error condition.
Remedy: None. Please report incident to Gupta technical support.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOECTL
member.summary: 11601 DBO CTL Exceeded command time limit
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to perform a select, insert, update or delete and it took longer than the time limit set in SQL.INI.
Remedy: Increase the time limit. e.g., cmdtimeout=0 disabled. cmdtimeout=5 5 seconds. cmdtimeout=43,200 12 hours (maximum).

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOEICN
member.summary: 11602 DBO ICN Invalid client name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to name a process and the specified name is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the command by properly specifying a valid client name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOEIAC
member.summary: 11603 DBO IAC Invalid admin command
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to perform command with an administrative cursor.
Remedy: Use a database cursor or server handle to perform the command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOEDRO
member.summary: 11604 DBO DRO Distributed read-only transaction not currently supported
member.remarks:
Reason: Currently SQLBase does not support a distributed transaction in READONLY isolation.
Remedy: Use a different isolation; if READONLY isolation is needed, then turn off distributed transactions and run local transactions against each database.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOESCT
member.summary: 11605 DBO SCT Stored command text not available
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to retrieve stored command text using an internal cursor and the text has not been retrieved from the external dictionary.
Remedy: Use a database cursor to the database where the stored command text resides.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOEAWS
member.summary: 11606 DBO AWS Invalid OS Averaging window size
member.remarks:
Reason: OS Averaging window size exceeded the maximum.
Remedy: Valid window sizes. e.g., osavgwindow=0 no averaging. osavgwindow=1,255 1 to 255 values.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOECDR
member.summary: 11607 DBO CDR Selected cursor is not active
member.remarks:
Reason: Selected cursor is not currently selected as the active cursor for its process.
Remedy: Select the cursor that is active for its process.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOEIMI
member.summary: 11608 DBO IMI Invalid mail id parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: The mail ID parameter specified is either too small or toolarge. Maximum size is 32 characters.
Remedy: Correct the mail ID parameter to be from 1 to 32 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOEINI
member.summary: 11609 DBO INI Invalid network ID parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: The network ID parameter specified is either too small or too large. Maximum size is 32 characters.
Remedy: Correct the network ID parameter to be from 1 to 32 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOEIAI
member.summary: 11610 DBO IAI Invalid adapter ID parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: The adapter ID parameter specified is either too small or too large. Maximum size is 32 characters.
Remedy: Correct the adapter ID parameter to be from 1 to 32 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOEIUI
member.summary: 11611 DBO IUI Invalid application ID parameter
member.remarks:
Reason: The application ID parameter specified is either too small or too large. Maximum size is 32 characters.
Remedy: Correct the application ID parameter to be from 1 to 32 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOEOSR
member.summary: 11612 DBO OSR Invalid OS sample rate
member.remarks:
Reason: OS sample rate exceeded the maximum size.
Remedy: Valid sample rate times. e.g., ossamplerate=0 disabled. ossamplerate=1->255 1 sec to 4 min and 15 secs.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOEUSD
member.summary: 11613 DBO USD Unable to shutdown database
member.remarks:
Reason: The server is not listening on the specified database or the name is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the database name or connect to the database and then shutdown the database.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOETPD
member.summary: 11614 DBO TPD Too many processes on the 6.0 database server.
member.remarks:
Reason: There more than 255 processes active on 6.0 database server. A new client session cannot be created.
Remedy: Shutdown the server and restart it.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOECVS
member.summary: 11615 DBO CVS Command or operation is valid for multi-user servers only
member.remarks:
Reason: A command or operation was attempted that is valid only multi-user servers (for example, DBWServr) but not valid for single-user engines (for example DBWindow).
Remedy: Do not use this function or if function is needed, use a multi-user server.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOECNS
member.summary: 11616 DBO CNS NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOESPE
member.summary: 11617 DBO SPE Stored Procedure already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to execute a STORE command or C/API sqlsto function for a stored procedure and the procedure already exists.
Remedy: Either modify the STORE command to use a different procedure name, or drop the existing stored procedure.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOEEFE
member.summary: 11618 DBO EFE External function <name> already exists.
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to execute a STORE command or C/API sqlsto function for a stored procedure and an external function with the same name exists.
Remedy: Modify the STORE command to use a different procedure name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOEALT
member.summary: 11619 DBO ALT Invalid autolocktable <value>
member.remarks:
Reason: Autolocktable value must be 0 (never), 1 (smart), 2 (always) or 3 (default.)
Remedy: Use correct autolocktable value, 0 through 3.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DBOERCM
member.summary: 11620 DBO RCM RC mode cannot be changed while RC command is active
member.remarks:
Reason: RC mode cannot be changed while it is processing a command.
Remedy: Set the RC mode after a commit or when no commands are active.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENKC
member.summary: 11701 PRS NKC This is not a known update statistics column
member.remarks:
Reason: The column name is misspelled or index statistics columns are mixed with table statistics columns.
Remedy: Correct the column name or check to see that the statistics being updated belong to an index or table.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEQNA
member.summary: 11702 PRS QNA Qualified names are not permitted in update statistics
member.remarks:
Reason: Statistics columns are using qualified names.
Remedy: Remove the table qualification to column names and resubmit the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIOV
member.summary: 11703 PRS IOV Invalid OVERWRITE option
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid overwrite option with this file name.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. An overwrite option can be specified only with the load/unload files/control files.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEICF
member.summary: 11704 PRS ICF Invalid CONTROL option
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid CONTROL option with this file name
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. CONTROL option can be specified only with the load/unload control files.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEINT
member.summary: 11705 PRS INT Invalid INTO clause
member.remarks:
Reason: The INTO clause has already been processed.
Remedy: Remove the INTO clause.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEXDL
member.summary: 11706 PRS XDL Invalid object to LOCK or UNLOCK
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a LOCK DATABASE or UNLOCK DATABASE command and the keyword DATABASE is either missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the LOCK DATABASE or UNLOCK DATABASE command by properly specifying the keyword DATABASE immediately after the keyword LOCK or UNLOCK.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEISF
member.summary: 11707 PRS ISF Invalid SqlWindows function
member.remarks:
Reason: This is not a valid SqlWindows function.
Remedy: Use a valid SqlWindows function.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENFN
member.summary: 11708 PRS NFN No load/unload filename has been specified.
member.remarks:
Reason: No valid filename has been specified for either the load/unload file.
Remedy: Check your syntax and specify a valid filename.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENOV
member.summary: 11709 PRS NOV No output variables for FETCH section
member.remarks:
Reason: A FETCH section must generate output to variables for that purpose.
Remedy: Supply appropriate output parameters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSERVM
member.summary: 11710 PRS RVM Return value missing
member.remarks:
Reason: Return must be followed by a valid return value.
Remedy: Append a return value after the return statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSESFL
member.summary: 11711 PRS SFL Unload/load file name and messagelLog file name are same
member.remarks:
Reason: File names specified for load/unload external/control file and the message log file are the same. They need to have different file names/paths.
Remedy: Check your syntax and specify correct filenames.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENLF
member.summary: 11712 PRS NLF No Load/Unload message log file name has been specified
member.remarks:
Reason: No valid file name has been specified for either the load/unload message log file.
Remedy: Check your syntax and specify a valid file name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSESND
member.summary: 11713 PRS SND START AT clause is not supported for DIF format
member.remarks:
Reason: START AT clause is not supported for the DIF format.
Remedy: Partial load cannot be done with DIF format load files. Load has to be restarted from the beginning of the file without the START AT clause.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMLR
member.summary: 11714 PRS MLR Missing the keyword REFERENCING or left parenthesis
member.remarks:
Reason: Syntax was expecting either the REFERENCING keyword or a left parenthesis beginning a parameter list for the trigger.
Remedy: Check your syntax and make corrections.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENSP
member.summary: 11715 PRS NSP Database Events are not supported in this version
member.remarks:
Reason: Database Events are not currently supported in this version of SQLBase. They may be supported in the future versions.
Remedy: Check your script and remove the "create event" statement. Check the release notes for more details.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENUL
member.summary: 11716 PRS NUL Empty message received by the parser
member.remarks:
Reason: The parser received an empty message when expecting otherwise.
Remedy: The most likely cause of this problem is network problem. Edit the server side SQL.INI and place 'netcheck=1' under the server section (i.e., dbnservr). Retry the operations and if you get 1316 error, then check your network card and cabling.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIEV
member.summary: 11717 PRS IEV Event name expected
member.remarks:
Reason: The event name specified in CREATE EVENT or DROP EVENT statement is invalid.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. An event name can be a qualified or unqualified long identifier. The qualified form is a user id followed by a period and a long identifier. An unqualified handler name in a SQL statement is implicitly qualified by the ID of the user who issues the statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEEFK
member.summary: 11718 PRS EFK Expected FUNCTION keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE, DROP, or ALTER EXTERNAL FUNCTION and the FUNCTION keyword is missing or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIRT
member.summary: 11719 PRS IRT Invalid return datatype
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION statement and a specified datatype in the RETURNS clause is either invalid, missing, or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEEDT
member.summary: 11720 PRS EDT Invalid or missing external datatype
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION statement and a specified external datatype in the PARAMETERS clause or the RETURNS clause is either invalid, missing, or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEUDT
member.summary: 11721 PRS UDT NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION statement and the specified datatypes in the PARAMETERS clause or the RETURNS clause are mismatching. That is, the internal datatype specified does not support the external datatype specified.
Remedy: Review the documentation for more information on the allowable datatype combinations. Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBFN
member.summary: 11722 PRS BFN Invalid or missing function name
member.remarks:
Reason: The function name is either missing or not a valid long identifier.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by providing a valid long identifier for the function name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMMC
member.summary: 11723 PRS MMC Missing expected colon (:)
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION statement and the specified datatypes in the PARAMETERS clause or the RETURNS clause should be separated with a colon (:). The expected colon is missing or misplaced.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBLN
member.summary: 11724 PRS BLN Missing or invalid library name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION statement and the library name is either missing or invalid.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMLC
member.summary: 11725 PRS MLC Missing library name clause
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION statement and no library name clause has been specified.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by providing a library name clause. The library name clause is required.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMMN
member.summary: 11726 PRS MMN Missing or misspelled NAME keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION statement and the EXTERNAL NAME clause is missing the mandatory keyword NAME immediately after the EXTERNAL keyword.
Remedy: Correct the EXTERNAL NAME clause in the CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBFI
member.summary: 11727 PRS BFI Invalid function name
member.remarks:
Reason: The specified function name is not valid.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMMO
member.summary: 11728 PRS MMO Missing or misspelled ORDINAL keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION statement and the EXPORT ORDINAL clause is missing the mandatory keyword ORDINAL immediately after the EXPORT keyword.
Remedy: Correct the EXPORT ORDINAL clause in the CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEION
member.summary: 11729 PRS ION Missing or invalid ordinal number
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE or ALTER EXTERNAL FUNCTION statement and the EXPORT ORDINAL clause is missing an ordinal number or the EXPORT ORDINAL clause has specified an invalid ordinal number.
Remedy: Correct the ordinal number in the EXPORT ORDINAL clause of the CREATE or ALTER EXTERNAL FUNCTION SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMPW
member.summary: 11730 PRS MPW Missing or misspelled PROCESS keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION statement and the EXECUTE IN clause is missing the mandatory keyword PROCESS immediately after the SEPARATE keyword.
Remedy: Correct the EXECUTE IN SEPARATE PROCESS clause in the CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMTW
member.summary: 11731 PRS MTW Missing or misspelled THREAD keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION statement and the EXECUTE IN clause is missing the mandatory keyword THREAD immediately after the SAME keyword.
Remedy: Correct the EXECUTE IN SAME THREAD clause in the CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEESS
member.summary: 11732 PRS ESS Expected SEPARATE or SAME keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION statement and the EXECUTE IN clause is missing or has a misspelled SEPARATE or THREAD keyword.
Remedy: Correct the EXECUTE IN clause in the CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION SQL statement by specifying either EXECUTE IN SEPARATE PROCESS or EXECUTE IN SAME THREAD.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEEXF
member.summary: 11733 PRS EXF External functions are not supported in this environment
member.remarks:
Reason: External functions are not supported in this environment.
Remedy: None. External functions are only supported under Win32 and Win64 environments.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIEF
member.summary: 11734 PRS IEF Disallowed name <name> used as external function name
member.remarks:
Reason: Certain names are not allowed as external function names. An external function name cannot begin with an 'at sign' (@) or 'SQL' and they cannot be the same as the existing SQLBase functions like AVG, COUNT, MAX, MIN, and SUM.
Remedy: Modify the external function name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIQC
member.summary: 11735 PRS IQC Invalid sequence column format
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid format for pseudo column of a sequence. Sequence can be referred as <sequence-name>.<CURRVAL|NEXTVAL>.
Remedy: Correct the sql command in question to the correct format.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENAS
member.summary: 11736 PRS NAS No attributes specified
member.remarks:
Reason: DBATTRIBUTE command does not have any attributes specified.
Remedy: Correct the format of the SQL command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIDA
member.summary: 11737 PRS IDA Invalid database attribute specified
member.remarks:
Reason: Attribute name specified in the DBATTRIBUTE command is not a valid attribute name.
Remedy: Correct the SQL command to specify a valid attribute name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIDV
member.summary: 11738 PRS IDV Invalid database attribute value
member.remarks:
Reason: Attribute value specified in the DBATTRIBUTE command is not a valid attribute value.
Remedy: Correct the SQL command to specify a valid attribute value.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIAT
member.summary: 11739 PRS IAT Invalid Alter Trigger option
member.remarks:
Reason: Alter trigger option provided in the command is an invalid option.
Remedy: Correct the SQL command to specify a valid alter trigger option.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEEFT
member.summary: 11740 PRS EFT Expecting the keywords EXTERNAL FUNCTION or TABLE
member.remarks:
Reason: The "FOR" keyword in the DROP SYNONYM statement can be followed only by "EXTERNAL FUNCTION" or "TABLE".
Remedy: Check the syntax for DROP SYNONYM and correct statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEICT
member.summary: 11741 PRS ICT Invalid CALLSTYLE option
member.remarks:
Reason: Only STDCALL/CDECL are allowed on 32 bit systems. Only PASCAL/CDECL are allowed on 16 bit systems.
Remedy: Check the syntax for CREATE/ALTER EXTERNAL FUNCTION and correct statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENOA
member.summary: 11742 PRS NOA Nothing altered
member.remarks:
Reason: An ALTER EXTERNAL FUNCTION command was specified but no clauses were specified to alter either the library name, external name, export ordinal, or the execute mode.
Remedy: Modify the alter external function command by specifying the item to be altered.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSETOR
member.summary: 11743 PRS TOR Create Trigger ORDER value invalid
member.remarks:
Reason: The ORDER keyword must be followed by a numeric value in the range 0-399 or in the range 600-999.
Remedy: Correct the Create Trigger statement. Either eliminate the optional ORDER Seq_Num clause, or specify a sequence number in one of the valid ranges.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSELTL
member.summary: 11744 PRS LTL Identifier too long
member.remarks:
Reason: An identifier exceeds 64 characters.
Remedy: Correct the identifier that exceeds 64 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSESPN
member.summary: 11745 PRS SPN Separate process execution not allowed in the 16-bit servers
member.remarks:
Reason: Separate process execution mode is not supported for external functions in the 16-bit servers.
Remedy: Use the same thread execution model.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEPCT
member.summary: 11746 PRS PCT Primary key column's datatype cannot be a LONG VARCHAR
member.remarks:
Reason: Column defined in primary key cannot be a LONG VARCHAR
Remedy: Do not include a LONG VARCHAR column in the primary key.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMST
member.summary: 11747 PRS MST Expecting STRING keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: The keyword LONG should be followed by STRING.
Remedy: Add the keyword STRING.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIDT
member.summary: 11748 PRS IDT Invalid or missing internal datatype
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a CREATE EXTERNAL FUNCTION statement and a specified internal datatype in the PARAMETERS clause or the RETURNS clause is either invalid, missing, or misspelled.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSENSC
member.summary: 11749 PRS NSC Cannot use server cursor for this command
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting a database command and using a server cursor
Remedy: Use a database command cursor

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBSO
member.summary: 11750 PRS BSO Invalid security option
member.remarks:
Reason: When altering security, only one of the options NONE, LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, or EXTERNAL may be specified.
Remedy: Use a correct security option.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEBCO
member.summary: 11751 PRS BCO Invalid check option
member.remarks:
Reason: When altering check, only one of the options NONE, CRC, or SHA may be specified.
Remedy: Use a correct check option.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIKN
member.summary: 11752 PRS IKN Invalid key
member.remarks:
Reason: When altering export key, the characters for the key are not allowed.
Remedy: Check allowed characters and enter the key again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEDSO
member.summary: 11753 PRS DSO Invalid database security option
member.remarks:
Reason: When altering database security, the options can only be alter key, alter security, or alter check.
Remedy: Check option and enter the command again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMJN
member.summary: 11754 PRS MJN Missing JOIN keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: JOIN keyword is missing from a CROSS JOIN statement.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. The syntax is: "tablename {CROSS | INNER | {LEFT|RIGHT|FULL OUTER} | UNION} JOIN tablename...".

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMOR
member.summary: 11755 PRS MOR Missing outer join keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: The outer join specification is incorrect.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. The syntax is: "tablename {CROSS | INNER | {LEFT|RIGHT|FULL OUTER} | UNION} JOIN tablename...".

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMUS
member.summary: 11756 PRS MUS Missing USING keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: The outer join specification is incorrect.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. The syntax is: "tablename ... JOIN tablename USING ....

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEXON
member.summary: 11757 PRS XON Illegal ON or USING keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: A ON or USING clause can't be used with a NATURAL or UNION join.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. The syntax is: "tablename ... JOIN tablename {ON ...| USING column list}".

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMON
member.summary: 11758 PRS MON Missing ON or USING keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: A ON or USING clause must be used unless it's a NATURAL or UNION join.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. The syntax is: "tablename ... JOIN tablename {ON ...| USING column list}".

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMXT
member.summary: 11759 PRS MXT Expecting a JOIN specification
member.remarks:
Reason: A join specification is required after parenthesis.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement. The syntax is: " ... ( A JOIN tablename {ON ...| USING column list})".

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEMNI
member.summary: 11760 PRS MNI This feature is not yet implemented
member.remarks:
Reason: Not all ANSI join specification are supported by the execution engine.
Remedy: Contact your local Gupta technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEXNU
member.summary: 11761 PRS XNU Either NATURAL or UNION may be specified, but not both
member.remarks:
Reason: NATURAL and UNION are mutually exclusive.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEXNO
member.summary: 11762 PRS XNO If CROSS, NATURAL, or UNION is specified, neither ON nor USING may be specified
member.remarks:
Reason: NATURAL and UNION are mutually exclusive with ON and USING.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEXOU
member.summary: 11763 PRS XOU Either ON or USING may be specified, but not both
member.remarks:
Reason: ON and USING are mutually exclusing.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSETTL
member.summary: 11764 PRS TTL Token too long
member.remarks:
Reason: A token exceeds 8191 characters.
Remedy: Correct the token that exceeds 8191 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEONQ
member.summary: 11765 PRS ONQ Outer join needs to be qualified as either LEFT, RIGHT or FULL
member.remarks:
Reason: LEFT, RIGHT or FULL is required for an outer join.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEFTL
member.summary: 11766 PRS FTL File Name too long
member.remarks:
Reason: The file name exceeds 128 characters.
Remedy: Correct the file name that exceeds 128 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEOAI
member.summary: 11767 PRS OAI Only one auto_increment column is allowed on a table.
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt was made to create more than one auto_increment column on a table.
Remedy: Specify no more than one auto_increment column per table.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIDI
member.summary: 11768 PRS IDI Invalid datatype for auto_increment column
member.remarks:
Reason: Datatype for auto_increment column must be INTEGER or SMALLINT
Remedy: If auto_increment is specified for a column, the datatype for that column must be changed to a INTEGER (or INT) or SMALLINT type.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEST0
member.summary: 11769 PRS ST0 Step value for auto-increment column cannot be zero
member.remarks:
Reason: The step value for auto-increment cannot be zero
Remedy: Change the value for auto-increment to a non-zero value or don't specify it and allow it to default to the value of one.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEICG
member.summary: 11770 PRS ICG Invalid collation Name
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to create or alter a database/table/column and the collation name is incorrect or missing
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement by specifying a correct collation name.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEINS
member.summary: 11771 PRS INS Invalid NCHAR or NVARCHAR size
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to create or modify a column and the specified size exceeds 450 characters.
Remedy: Modify statement so NCHAR or NVARCHAR size does not exceed 450 characters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSETMA
member.summary: 11772 PRS TMA Too many stored procedure parameters
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to run a stored procedure with more than 255 parameters
Remedy: Modify the stored procedure to have fewer parameters.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSERCR
member.summary: 11773 PRS RCR Cannot REVOKE CONNECT from a role
member.remarks:
Reason: REVOKE CONNECT cannot be used to drop roles, only users.
Remedy: Use DROP ROLE to drop a role.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSERST
member.summary: 11774 PRS RST Duplicate role name <name> in list
member.remarks:
Reason: While parsing the list of roles, the same role name has been found to appear more than once.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEWOI
member.summary: 11775 PRS WOI Invalid WITHOUT INDEX clause
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to compile query with improper spelling or use of WITHOUT INDEX clause.
Remedy: Correct SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEINM
member.summary: 11776 PRS INM Invalid MODIFY clause
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to compile query with an ALTER TABLE with an invalid MODIFY clause.
Remedy: Correct SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIEU
member.summary: 11777 PRS IEU Invalid EXTERNAL clause
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to create a user with an invalid external user clause. The external user name must be a quoted string of 64 characters or less and may contain a maximum of one embedded backslash (\\) character.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEIUO
member.summary: 11778 PRS IUO Invalid UNLOAD option
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid UNLOAD command option used.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PRSEILM
member.summary: 11779 PRS ILM Invalid LIMIT clause
member.remarks:
Reason: Invalid LIMIT clause used. The LIMIT clause may not be used in a view definition or a subselect, and must specify an integer limit value from 1 to 2147483647.
Remedy: Correct the SQL statement.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE001
member.summary: 11901 PST 001 Not enough available stack space for psort
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: Reason#18

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE002
member.summary: 11902 PST 002 Stack overflow in sort
member.remarks:
Reason: Keys agree on too many leading bytes.
Remedy: Reduce number of bytes in sorting keys.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE003
member.summary: 11903 PST 003 Segment length too large
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE004
member.summary: 11904 PST 004 Attempt to send record to sort already terminated
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE005
member.summary: 11905 PST 005 Insufficient memory available
member.remarks:
Reason: Sort operation was not able to acquire the minimum required memory to proceed with the sort operation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. Also check the value of the 'sortcache' parameter value in SQL.INI. Check the documentation to choose appropriate values for this parameter. Author: 05/20/93 RMR

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE006
member.summary: 11906 PST 006 Allocation of psort data stack failed
member.remarks:
Reason: Sort operation was not able to acquire the minimum required memory to proceed with the sort operation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. Also check the value of the 'sortcache' parameter value in SQL.INI. Check the documentation to choose appropriate values for this parameter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE007
member.summary: 11907 PST 007 Allocation of sort work area failed
member.remarks:
Reason: Sort operation was not able to acquire the minimum required memory to proceed with the sort operation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. Also check the value of the 'sortcache' parameter value in SQL.INI. Check the documentation to choose appropriate values for this parameter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE008
member.summary: 11908 PST 008 Space exhausted while writing work file
member.remarks:
Reason: Available space in temporary file directory is insufficient.
Remedy: Change location for temporary files.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE010
member.summary: 11910 PST 010 Error in file read
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to read a file and a disk read failure has occurred.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the disk read failure. Run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the current operating system to verify the status of the disk.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE011
member.summary: 11911 PST 011 Temporary file name too long
member.remarks:
Reason: Temporary directory in environmental variable consists of too many characters.
Remedy: Shorten name of temporary directory in environmental variable.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE012
member.summary: 11912 PST 012 Stack overflow in calling psort
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE015
member.summary: 11915 PST 015 Programming error #2 in pstsio.c
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE017
member.summary: 11917 PST 017 Cannot allocate memory for sorting
member.remarks:
Reason: Sort operation was not able to acquire the minimum required memory to proceed with the sort operation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. Also check the value of the 'sortcache' parameter value in SQL.INI. Check the documentation to choose appropriate values for this parameter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE019
member.summary: 11919 PST 019 Couldn't get memory for workfile input buffer
member.remarks:
Reason: Sort operation was not able to acquire the minimum required memory to proceed with the sort operation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. Also check the value of the 'sortcache' parameter value in SQL.INI. Check the documentation to choose appropriate values for this parameter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE020
member.summary: 11920 PST 020 Couldn't get memory for workfile output buffer
member.remarks:
Reason: Sort operation was not able to acquire the minimum required memory to proceed with the sort operation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. Also check the value of the 'sortcache' parameter value in SQL.INI. Check the documentation to choose appropriate values for this parameter.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE022
member.summary: 11922 PST 022 Couldn't open working file for writing
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to create a file and a failure has occurred.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the create failure. Run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the current operating system to verify the status of disk. Verify that sufficient disk space is available and verify that the number of files allowed open for the operating system permits the additional file, that is, check the FILES= configuration parameter setting.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.PSTE023
member.summary: 11923 PST 023 Couldn't open working file for reading
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to read a file and a disk read failure has occurred.
Remedy: Determine and correct the cause of the disk read failure. Run a check disk utility (CHKDSK) for the current operating system to verify the status of the disk.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFOEMSK
member.summary: 12001 CFO MSK Missing SIZE keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: While Reading the control file, a system was looking for a keyword named "SIZE", but could not find it.
Remedy: Control file needs a SIZE keyword infront of the maximum allowed file size for this unload segment. Look into the manual for the syntax of a control file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFOEMSZ
member.summary: 12002 CFO MSZ Missing/Inappropriate SIZE value
member.remarks:
Reason: While Reading the control file, a system was looking for a value for size after the "SIZE" keyword, but could not find it OR found an inappropriate value such as a non-integer value or a value outside the range 1-2048 inclusive.
Remedy: Control file needs a SIZE value for the maximum allowed file size for this unload segment. Look into the manual for the syntax of a control file and provide a correct size.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFOEMDK
member.summary: 12003 CFO MDK Missing DIR keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: While Reading the control file a system was looking for a keyword named "DIR", but could not find it.
Remedy: Control file needs a DIR keyword in front of the directory path value for each unload or database backup segment. Look into the manual for the syntax of a control file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFOEMDR
member.summary: 12004 CFO MDR Missing DIR value
member.remarks:
Reason: While Reading the control file a system was looking for a value for directory after the "DIR" keyword, but could not find it.
Remedy: Control file needs a directory value after the DIR keyword for specifying the path value for this unload or database backup segment. Look into the manual for the syntax of control file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFOEFAE
member.summary: 12005 CFO FAE Segment File already exists
member.remarks:
Reason: The Load/Unload or Backup/Restore segment file already exists.
Remedy: A file of the specified name already exists in the path specified. If you want to overwrite this file, use the OVERWRITE option in the Unload command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFOEOPE
member.summary: 12006 CFO OPE Error opening Load/Unload or Backup/Restore segment file
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to load or unload the database or to backup or restore a segment file but the named segment file cannot be opened.
Remedy: If the file name was specified, check that the file name is correct. If the file name is correct or if its not necessary to specify a file name, determine why the file could not be opened. Also, in case of segmented load or restore operation, make sure that all the segment files mentioned in the control file are present.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFOELTL
member.summary: 12007 CFO LTL Line too long
member.remarks:
Reason: Attempting to read a line from the control file which exceeded the maximum allowable line length.
Remedy: Control file needs to be written using the exact syntax mentioned in the manual. Correct the control file and re-execute the command.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFOEMPK
member.summary: 12008 CFO MPK Missing FILEPREFIX keyword
member.remarks:
Reason: While Reading the control file a system was looking for a keyword named "FILEPREFIX", but could not find it.
Remedy: Control file needs a FILEPREFIX keyword in front of the fileprefix value to be used with all the unload or database backup segments. Look into the manual for the syntax of a control file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFOEMPX
member.summary: 12009 CFO MPX Missing FILEPREFIX value
member.remarks:
Reason: While Reading the control file a system was looking for a value for fileprefix after the "FILEPREFIX" keyword, but could not find it.
Remedy: Control file needs a fileprefix value after of the FILEPREFIX keyword for specifying the fileprefix value to be used with all the unload segments. Look into the manual for the syntax of control file.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFOENFS
member.summary: 12010 CFO NFS Not enough file segments
member.remarks:
Reason: Unload/Load command is looking for more file segments in the control file but could not find one. It is possible that the unload data is overflowing all the given file segments of specified size and needs more disk space/file segments to complete the unload operation.
Remedy: Edit the unload control file to increase the number of segments or the size of the file segments to accommodate all the unload data. See the manual for segmented unload and control file syntax.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFOECAM
member.summary: 12011 CFO CAM Cannot allocate memory
member.remarks:
Reason: Control file processor was not able to allocate memory for some internal structures.
Remedy: Check available memory resources available for SQLBase on your machine.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.CFOEDBS
member.summary: 12012 CFO DBS Cannot get database size for testing
member.remarks:
Reason: Backup could not obtain database size to determine whether there were sufficient backup file segments to cover the backup.
Remedy: This is an internal error which should not occur. Call your service representative.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GBSE001
member.summary: 12101 GBS 001 Couldn't get memory for file structure
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GBSE002
member.summary: 12102 GBS 002 Couldn't get memory for file buffer
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.GBSE003
member.summary: 12103 GBS 003 Seek from end-of-file not supported
member.remarks:
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TRCECCF
member.summary: 12201 TRC CCF Cannot create file <filename>
member.remarks:
Reason: Unknown.
Remedy: Check filename.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DMNECAD
member.summary: 12301 DMN CAD 008 - Out of memory at the database computer (DMN CAD)
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.DMNEBIP
member.summary: 12302 DMN BIP Internal error: Invalid interval parameter passed in to Daemon
member.remarks:
facility
Reason: This error is only used internally by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEEREG
member.summary: 12401 TLE REG Could not provide registration handle
member.remarks: Reason: Remedy:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEELNK
member.summary: 12402 TLE LNK Register could not allocate link structure
member.remarks:
Reason:
Remedy: Try registering again

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEETSK
member.summary: 12403 TLE TSK Register could not allocate task structure
member.remarks:
Reason:
Remedy: Try registering again

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEETLK
member.summary: 12404 TLE TLK Register could not allocate talk structure
member.remarks:
Reason:
Remedy: Try registering again

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEECUV
member.summary: 12405 TLE CUV Register could not allocate cursor vector
member.remarks:
Reason:
Remedy: Try registering again

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEECMD
member.summary: 12406 TLE CMD Register could not allocate command buffer
member.remarks:
Reason:
Remedy: Try registering again

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEECIS
member.summary: 12407 TLE CIS Could not allocate connect info structure
member.remarks: Reason: Remedy:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEESIS
member.summary: 12408 TLE SIS Could not allocate session info Sstructure
member.remarks: Reason: Remedy:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEEWKB
member.summary: 12409 TLE WKB Register could not allocate work buffer
member.remarks:
Reason:
Remedy: Try registering again

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEETNR
member.summary: 12411 TLE TNR Task not registered to the engine
member.remarks:
Reason: A task attempted to execute an engine command without previously registering itself.
Remedy: The task must call tlereg(...) and register itself.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEETIH
member.summary: 12412 TLE TIH Task invalid handle
member.remarks:
Reason: A task attempted to execute with an invalid handle.
Remedy: The task must use a valid handle given to it from tlereg.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEETRE
member.summary: 12413 TLE TRE Task re-entrancy error
member.remarks:
Reason: A task attempted to enter the engine an invalid number of times.
Remedy: The task must wait until the engine returns from its last invocation.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEEHRE
member.summary: 12414 TLE HRE Handle re-entrancy error
member.remarks:
Reason: A handle attempted to enter the engine when its task was not allowed.
Remedy: The task must wait until the engine returns from its last invocation.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEESPE
member.summary: 12415 TLE SPE Spool file exists; instructed not to create
member.remarks:
Reason: The spool file instructed to turn on exists and the API was instructed to error on exists.
Remedy: Change spool file name, instruct API to append or overwrite.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEEASE
member.summary: 12416 TLE ASE Allocated space error - not enough to perform operation
member.remarks:
Reason: A blob of memory passed was not large enough to process the command.
Remedy: Pass in a larger blob.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEEFTS
member.summary: 12417 TLE FTS Failed to set
member.remarks:
Reason: An API call was made to set a value and it could not and no other reason was given or could be given.
Remedy: Try again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEEBNL
member.summary: 12418 TLE BNL Block not large enough to hold data
member.remarks:
Reason:
Remedy: Try again with a block of the correct size.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEEBTL
member.summary: 12419 TLE BTL Block too large; incorrect size
member.remarks:
Reason:
Remedy: Try again with a block of the correct size.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEE020
member.summary: 12420 TLE 020 NOT USED
member.remarks:
Reason: This error code is currently not used by the SQLBase system.
Remedy: None. This error code should never occur. If you get this error, contact your local Gupta certified technical support center.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEECNA
member.summary: 12421 TLE CNA Connection not available
member.remarks:
Reason: The maximum number of connections (255) has already been established.
Remedy: Disconnect any connection.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEEOPF
member.summary: 12422 TLE OPF Error opening output file
member.remarks:
Reason: Output file could not be opened for writing
Remedy: Rerun batch/regression after making sure output file can be written to.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEEAFB
member.summary: 12423 TLE AFB Error allocation fetch buffer
member.remarks: Reason: Fetch buffer could not be allocated Remedy:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEEAWB
member.summary: 12424 TLE AWB Error allocation work buffer
member.remarks: Reason: Work buffer could not be allocated Remedy:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEEUAB
member.summary: 12425 TLE UAB Unable to allocate buffer
member.remarks: Reason: Buffer could not be allocated (TleBuf) Remedy:

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEEBNA
member.summary: 12426 TLE BNA Buffer not available
member.remarks:
Reason: Too many buffers already allocated and not released. (TleBuf)
Remedy: Report error to Gupta technical support.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEECNR
member.summary: 12427 TLE CNR Callback not registered
member.remarks:
Reason: Callback needed to complete the operation has not been registered.
Remedy: Report error to Gupta technical support.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.TLEESTS
member.summary: 12428 TLE STS Size too small
member.remarks:
Reason: Size of line is too small to work with. Use a larger size.
Remedy: Report error to Gupta technical support.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEECLL
member.summary: 12501 SPE CLL Cannot load library <name>
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt to load a dynamically linked library failed.
Remedy: Check to make sure that library exists and is not corrupt.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEGPA
member.summary: 12502 SPE GPA Cannot get address for external function <name>
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt to get the address for an external function failed.
Remedy: Check to make sure that the function exists and/or its ordinal number is correct.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEERTL
member.summary: 12503 SPE RTL Returned string too long
member.remarks:
Reason: When a string is passed as a receive parameter to an external function, the modified string returned to the stored procedure cannot be longer than the original string.
Remedy: Check your external function to make sure that the string manipulation is correct.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEEEFE
member.summary: 12504 SPE EFE Error number <number> occurred in external function <name>
member.remarks:
Reason: An error occurred during execution of an external function.
Remedy: Check your external function code for correctness.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SPEERSL
member.summary: 12505 SPE RSL Receive string too long
member.remarks:
Reason: RECEIVE STRING parameters cannot exceed 900 characters.
Remedy: Use RECEIVE LONG STRING datatype. The parameter will then be treated as a LONG VARCHAR column.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SEQEUSA
member.summary: 12601 SEQ USA Uninitialized sequence access
member.remarks:
Reason: Within a transaction session a SEQUENCE.CURRVAL was used before the sequence was initialized with a call to the SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL.
Remedy: Make sure that within a user transaction session, the sequence is initialized first with at least one call to SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL before accessing the CURRVAL for the sequence.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.SEQEOOM
member.summary: 12602 SEQ OOM Out Of Memory at the database computer
member.remarks:
Reason: Not enough memory at the database engine to perform the requested task.
Remedy: Check available memory at the database computer. Attempt to make more memory available. To make more memory available for the database engine, you can reduce size of the CACHE.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MTSETGV
member.summary: 12701 MTS TGV Failure to get Thread Local Storage
member.remarks:
Reason: TlsGetValue() Call failed.
Remedy: Consult Technical Support.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MTSETSV
member.summary: 12702 MTS TSV Failure to set Thread Local Storage
member.remarks:
Reason: TlsSetValue() Call failed.
Remedy: Consult Technical Support.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.MTSECSM
member.summary: 12703 MTS CSM Out of memory at the client (MTS CSM)
member.remarks:
Reason: The application has run out of memory at the client workstation.
Remedy: Check available memory at the client workstation. Attempt to make more memory available.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NDSENOE
member.summary: 12801 NDS NOE Cannot find user object in Directory Schema
member.remarks:
Reason: The user trying to login is not found in the Directory Schema.
Remedy: Contact the network administrator to define a user object.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NDSENOA
member.summary: 12802 NDS NOA Cannot find attribute definition in Directory Schema
member.remarks:
Reason: This attribute does not exist in the Directory Schema or has not yet been defined in the schema.
Remedy: Run Gupta's NDS Schema Extension utility to define the attribute and then try this operation again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NDSENOC
member.summary: 12803 NDS NOC Cannot find class definition in Directory Schema
member.remarks:
Reason: This class does not exist in the Directory Schema or has not yet been defined in the schema.
Remedy: Run Gupta's NDS Schema Extension utility to define the class and then try this operation again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NDSEAEX
member.summary: 12804 NDS AEX Attribute definition already exists in Directory Schema
member.remarks:
Reason: This attribute already exists in the Directory schema.
Remedy: Run Gupta's NDS Schema Extension utility to delete the attribute definition and try this operation again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NDSECEX
member.summary: 12805 NDS CEX Class definition already exists in Directory Schema
member.remarks:
Reason: This class already exists in the Directory Schema.
Remedy: Run Gupta's NDS Schema Extension utility to delete the class definition and try this operation again.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NDSEOOM
member.summary: 12806 NDS OOM Ran out of memory to allocate buffer for Dir. Services operation
member.remarks:
Reason: No memory available to allocate buffers for Directory Services.
Remedy: Unload and reload Gupta's NDS Schema Extension utility.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NDSEINP
member.summary: 12807 NDS INP Invalid password
member.remarks:
Reason: User entered an invalid password for this user ID.
Remedy: Try again with the correct password.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NDSENOR
member.summary: 12808 NDS NOR No rights to define new attributes or classes in Schema
member.remarks:
Reason: Logged in user has no rights to define attributes or classes in the Directory Schema.
Remedy: Contact your DBA or network administrator.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NDSEERR
member.summary: 12809 NDS ERR Directory Services returned error
member.remarks:
Reason: NetWare Directory Services returned an unlisted error.
Remedy: Contact Gupta Technical Support with the reported error#.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.NDSEECC
member.summary: 12810 NDS ECC Directory Services error context creation
member.remarks:
Reason: NetWare Directory Services returned error trying to create a context for the logged in user
Remedy: Contact Gupta Technical Support with the reported error#.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EXFECLL
member.summary: 12901 EXF CLL Load Library of <name> failed with error <error>
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt to load a dynamically linked library failed.
Remedy: Check to make sure that library exists and is not corrupt. Refer to the documentation on the LoadLibrary call in the Microsoft Function reference to get details about the failure error code.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EXFEGPA
member.summary: 12902 EXF GPA Cannot get address for external function <name>
member.remarks:
Reason: An attempt to get the address for an external function failed.
Remedy: Check to make sure that the function exists.

member.name: F:Gupta.SQLBase.Data.SQLBaseError.EXFERTL
